04261                   {
04262                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, END_DOCTOR, 1, TRUE );
04263                   }
04264                   else
04265                   {
04266                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, STANDING, 1, TRUE );
04267                   }
04268 
04269             }
04270             else if ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == REPAIR )
04271             {
04272                   if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
04273                   {
04274                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, END_REPAIRMAN, 1, TRUE );
04275                   }
04276                   else
04277                   {
04278                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, STANDING, 1, TRUE );
04279                   }
04280             }
04281             else if ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == PATIENT )
04282             {
04283                   if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
04284                   {
04285                         ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
04286                   }
04287                   else
04288                   {
04289                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, STANDING, 1, TRUE );
04290                   }
04291             }
04292       }
04293 
04294       if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL )
04295       {
04296             // hack - reset AbsoluteFinalDestination in case it was left non-nowhere
04297             pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination = NOWHERE;
04298       }
04299 
04300       if ( fSayQuote )
04301       {
04302             if ( ( fMeToo == FALSE ) && (pSoldier->bAssignment == TRAIN_TOWN  ) )
04303             {
04304                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_ASSIGNMENT_COMPLETE );
04305 
04306                   if( pSoldier -> bAssignment == TRAIN_TOWN )
04307                   {
04308                         AddSectorForSoldierToListOfSectorsThatCompletedMilitiaTraining( pSoldier );
04309                   }
04310             }
04311       }
04312       
04313       // don't bother telling us again about guys we already know about
04314       if ( !( pSoldier->usQuoteSaidExtFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_DONE_ASSIGNMENT ) )
04315       {
04316             pSoldier->usQuoteSaidExtFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_DONE_ASSIGNMENT;
04317 
04318             if ( fSayQuote )
04319             {
04320                   if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == DOCTOR || pSoldier->bAssignment == REPAIR ||
04321                                pSoldier->bAssignment == PATIENT || pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL )
04322                   {
04323                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_ASSIGNMENT_COMPLETE );
04324                   }
04325             }
04326 
04327 
04328             AddReasonToWaitingListQueue( ASSIGNMENT_FINISHED_FOR_UPDATE );
04329             AddSoldierToWaitingListQueue( pSoldier );
04330 
04331             // trigger a single call AddDisplayBoxToWaitingQueue for assignments done
04332             gfAddDisplayBoxToWaitingQueue = TRUE;
04333       }     
04334 
04335       // update mapscreen 
04336       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
04337       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04338       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
04339 }
04340 
04341 BOOLEAN CharacterIsBetweenSectors( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04342 {
04343       // is the character on the move
04344       if( pSoldier == NULL )
04345       {
04346             return ( FALSE );
04347       } 
04348       else
04349       {
04350             return( pSoldier -> fBetweenSectors );
04351       }
04352 }
04353 
04354 
04355 void HandleNaturalHealing( void )
04356 {
04357       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, *pTeamSoldier;
04358   INT32 cnt=0;
04359       INT32 iCounter=0;
04360       INT8 bNumberOfPeople = 0;
04361       
04362       // set psoldier as first in merc ptrs
04363       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
04364       
04365       // go through list of characters, find all who are on this assignment
04366       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier -> bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
04367       {
04368             if( pTeamSoldier -> bActive )
04369             {
04370                   // mechanical members don't regenerate!
04371                   if( !( pTeamSoldier -> uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !( AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) ) )
04372                   {
04373                         HandleHealingByNaturalCauses( pTeamSoldier );
04374                   }
04375             }
04376       }
04377 
04378       return;
04379 }
04380 
04381 
04382       // handle healing of this soldier by natural causes.
04383 void HandleHealingByNaturalCauses( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04384 {
04385       UINT32 uiPercentHealth = 0;
04386       INT8 bActivityLevelDivisor = 0;
04387 
04388 
04389       // check if soldier valid
04390       if( pSoldier == NULL )
04391       {
04392             return;
04393       }
04394 
04395       // dead
04396       if( pSoldier -> bLife == 0 )
04397       {
04398             return;
04399       }
04400 
04401       // lost any pts?
04402       if( pSoldier -> bLife == pSoldier -> bLifeMax )
04403       {
04404             return;
04405       }
04406 
04407       // any bleeding pts - can' recover if still bleeding!
04408       if( pSoldier -> bBleeding != 0 )
04409       {
04410             return;
04411       }
04412 
04413 
04414       // not bleeding and injured...
04415 
04416       if( pSoldier -> bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
04417       {
04418             // use high activity level to simulate stress, torture, poor conditions for healing
04419             bActivityLevelDivisor = gGameExternalOptions.ubHighActivityLevel;
04420       }
04421       if( ( pSoldier -> fMercAsleep == TRUE ) || ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == PATIENT ) || ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL ) )
04422       {
04423             bActivityLevelDivisor = gGameExternalOptions.ubLowActivityLevel;
04424       }
04425       else if ( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
04426       {
04427             // if time is being compressed, and the soldier is not moving strategically
04428             if ( IsTimeBeingCompressed() && !PlayerIDGroupInMotion( pSoldier->ubGroupID ) )
04429             {
04430                   // basically resting
04431                   bActivityLevelDivisor = gGameExternalOptions.ubLowActivityLevel;
04432             }
04433             else
04434             {
04435                   // either they're on the move, or they're being tactically active
04436                   bActivityLevelDivisor = gGameExternalOptions.ubHighActivityLevel;
04437             }
04438       }
04439       else  // this includes being in a vehicle - that's neither very strenous, nor very restful
04440       {
04441             bActivityLevelDivisor = gGameExternalOptions.ubMediumActivityLevel;
04442       }
04443 
04444 
04445       // what percentage of health is he down to
04446       uiPercentHealth = ( pSoldier->bLife * 100 ) / pSoldier->bLifeMax;
04447 
04448       // gain that many hundredths of life points back, divided by the activity level modifier
04449       pSoldier->sFractLife += ( INT16 ) ( uiPercentHealth / bActivityLevelDivisor );
04450 
04451       // now update the real life values
04452       UpDateSoldierLife( pSoldier );
04453 
04454       return;
04455 }
04456 
04457 
04458 void UpDateSoldierLife( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04459 {
04460       // update soldier life, make sure we don't go out of bounds
04461       pSoldier -> bLife += pSoldier -> sFractLife / 100;
04462       
04463       // keep remaining fract of life
04464       pSoldier -> sFractLife %= 100;
04465 
04466       // check if we have gone too far
04467       if( pSoldier -> bLife >= pSoldier -> bLifeMax )
04468       {
04469             // reduce
04470             pSoldier -> bLife = pSoldier -> bLifeMax;
04471             pSoldier -> sFractLife = 0;
04472       }
04473       return;
04474 }
04475 
04476 
04477 
04478 /*
04479 // merc is tired, put to sleep
04480 BOOLEAN AutoSleepMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04481 {
04482       if( pSoldier == NULL )
04483       {
04484             return ( FALSE );
04485       }
04486 
04487       // already asleep
04488       if( pSoldier -> fMercAsleep == TRUE )
04489       {
04490             return ( FALSE );
04491       }
04492 
04493       if( pSoldier -> bBreathMax > MIN_BREATH_TO_STAY_AWAKE )
04494       {
04495             if( ( pSoldier -> bAssignment < ON_DUTY ) )
04496             {
04497                   return ( FALSE );
04498             }
04499 
04500             if( pSoldier -> bLife < OKLIFE )
04501             {
04502                   // can't sleep
04503                   return ( FALSE );
04504             }
04505 
04506 
04507             // if  was forced to stay awake, leave
04508             if( pSoldier -> fForcedToStayAwake == TRUE )
04509             {
04510                   return( FALSE );
04511             }
04512       }
04513       else
04514       {
04515       //    ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s",  pMercFellAsleepString[ 0 ], pSoldier -> name );
04516       }
04517 
04518       
04519       // store old assignment
04520       pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
04521 
04522 
04523       if( pSoldier -> bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
04524       {
04525             RemoveCharacterFromASquad( pSoldier, pSoldier -> bAssignment );
04526       }
04527 
04528       if( SetMercAsleep( pSoldier, FALSE ) )
04529       {
04530             // change soldier state
04531             SoldierInSectorSleep( pSoldier, pSoldier -> usStrategicInsertionData );
04532 
04533             // update mapscreen 
04534             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
04535             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04536             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
04537 
04538             return( TRUE );
04539       }
04540       else
04541       {
04542             return( FALSE );
04543       }
04544 }
04545 */
04546 
04547 
04548 
04549 void CheckIfSoldierUnassigned( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04550 {
04551       if( pSoldier -> bAssignment == NO_ASSIGNMENT )
04552       {
04553             // unassigned
04554             AddCharacterToAnySquad( pSoldier );
04555             
04556             if( ( gfWorldLoaded ) && ( pSoldier->bInSector ) )
04557             {
04558                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, STANDING, 1, TRUE );
04559             }
04560       }
04561 
04562       return;
04563 }
04564 
04565 
04566 
04567 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForAssignmentMenu( void )
04568 {
04569       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
04570       UINT32 iCounter = 0;
04571       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
04572       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
04573       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
04574       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
04575       SGPPoint pPosition;
04576       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
04577       SGPRect pDimensions;
04578       static BOOLEAN fShowRemoveMenu = FALSE;
04579 
04580 
04581       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen assignment main menu
04582       // check if we can only remove character from team..not assign
04583       if( ( bSelectedAssignChar != -1 )|| ( fShowRemoveMenu == TRUE ) )
04584       {
04585             if( fShowRemoveMenu == TRUE )
04586             {
04587                   // dead guy handle menu stuff
04588                   fShowRemoveMenu = fShowAssignmentMenu | fShowContractMenu;
04589                   
04590                   CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForRemoveMenu( );
04591 
04592                   return;
04593             }
04594             if( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedAssignChar].usSolID].bLife == 0 ) || ( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedAssignChar].usSolID].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
04595             {
04596                   // dead guy handle menu stuff
04597                   fShowRemoveMenu = fShowAssignmentMenu | fShowContractMenu;
04598             
04599                   CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForRemoveMenu( );
04600 
04601                   return;
04602             }
04603       }
04604 
04605 
04606       if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
04607       {
04608 
04609             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
04610 
04611             if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu ) && ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) )
04612             {
04613               SetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, AssignmentPosition );
04614             }
04615 
04616             pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
04617 
04618             if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
04619             {
04620                   // grab height of font
04621                   iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghEpcBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghEpcBox ) ); 
04622 
04623                   // get x.y position of box
04624                   GetBoxPosition( ghEpcBox, &pPosition);
04625 
04626                   // grab box x and y position
04627                   iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
04628                   iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
04629 
04630                   // get dimensions..mostly for width
04631                   GetBoxSize( ghEpcBox, &pDimensions );
04632 
04633                   // get width
04634                   iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
04635 
04636                   SetCurrentBox( ghEpcBox );
04637             }
04638             else
04639             {
04640                   // grab height of font
04641                   iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghAssignmentBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghAssignmentBox ) ); 
04642 
04643                   // get x.y position of box
04644                   GetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, &pPosition);
04645 
04646                   // grab box x and y position
04647                   iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
04648                   iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
04649 
04650                   // get dimensions..mostly for width
04651                   GetBoxSize( ghAssignmentBox, &pDimensions );
04652 
04653                   // get width
04654                   iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
04655 
04656                   SetCurrentBox( ghAssignmentBox );
04657             }
04658             
04659 
04660             // define regions
04661             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghAssignmentBox ); iCounter++ )
04662             {
04663                   // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
04664                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
04665                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, AssignmentMenuMvtCallBack, AssignmentMenuBtnCallback );
04666 
04667                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
04668             }
04669 
04670             // created
04671             fCreated = TRUE;
04672 
04673             // unhighlight all strings in box
04674             UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
04675             CheckAndUpdateTacticalAssignmentPopUpPositions( );
04676 
04677             PositionCursorForTacticalAssignmentBox( );
04678       }
04679       else if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
04680       {
04681             // destroy 
04682             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghAssignmentBox ); iCounter++ )
04683             {
04684                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
04685             }
04686 
04687             fShownAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
04688 
04689             // not created
04690             fCreated = FALSE;
04691             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
04692 
04693       }
04694 }
04695 
04696 
04697 
04698 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionForVehicleMenu( void )
04699 {
04700       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
04701 
04702       UINT32 uiMenuLine = 0;
04703       INT32 iVehicleId = 0;
04704       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
04705       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
04706       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
04707       SGPPoint pPosition, pPoint;
04708       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
04709       SGPRect pDimensions;
04710       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
04711 
04712 
04713       if( fShowVehicleMenu )
04714       {
04715             GetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, &pPoint);
04716             
04717             // get dimensions..mostly for width
04718             GetBoxSize( ghAssignmentBox, &pDimensions );
04719 
04720             // vehicle position
04721             VehiclePosition.iX = pPoint.iX + pDimensions.iRight;
04722 
04723             SetBoxPosition( ghVehicleBox , VehiclePosition );
04724       }
04725 
04726 
04727       if( ( fShowVehicleMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
04728       {
04729             // grab height of font
04730             iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghVehicleBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghVehicleBox ) ); 
04731 
04732             // get x.y position of box
04733             GetBoxPosition( ghVehicleBox, &pPosition);
04734 
04735             // grab box x and y position
04736             iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
04737             iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
04738 
04739             // get dimensions..mostly for width
04740             GetBoxSize( ghVehicleBox, &pDimensions );
04741             SetBoxSecondaryShade( ghVehicleBox, FONT_YELLOW );
04742 
04743             // get width
04744             iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
04745 
04746             SetCurrentBox( ghVehicleBox );
04747 
04748             pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
04749 
04750             // run through list of vehicles in sector
04751             for ( iVehicleId = 0; iVehicleId < ubNumberOfVehicles; iVehicleId++ )
04752             { 
04753                   if ( pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].fValid == TRUE )
04754                   {
04755                         if ( IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iVehicleId ) )
04756                         {
04757                               // add mouse region for each accessible vehicle
04758                               MSYS_DefineRegion( &gVehicleMenuRegion[ uiMenuLine ], ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * uiMenuLine ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( uiMenuLine + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
04759                                                        MSYS_NO_CURSOR, VehicleMenuMvtCallback, VehicleMenuBtnCallback );
04760 
04761                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gVehicleMenuRegion[ uiMenuLine ], 0, uiMenuLine );
04762                               // store vehicle ID in the SECOND user data
04763                               MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gVehicleMenuRegion[ uiMenuLine ], 1, iVehicleId );
04764 
04765                               uiMenuLine++;
04766                         }
04767                   }
04768             }
04769 
04770 
04771             // cancel line
04772             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gVehicleMenuRegion[ uiMenuLine ],       ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * uiMenuLine ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( uiMenuLine + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
04773                                           MSYS_NO_CURSOR, VehicleMenuMvtCallback, VehicleMenuBtnCallback );
04774             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gVehicleMenuRegion[ uiMenuLine ], 0, VEHICLE_MENU_CANCEL );
04775 
04776             // created
04777             fCreated = TRUE;
04778 
04779             // pause game 
04780             PauseGame( );
04781 
04782             // unhighlight all strings in box
04783             UnHighLightBox( ghVehicleBox );
04784 
04785             fCreated = TRUE;
04786 
04787             HandleShadingOfLinesForVehicleMenu( );
04788       }
04789       else if( ( ( fShowVehicleMenu == FALSE ) || ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
04790       {
04791             fCreated = FALSE;
04792             
04793             // remove these regions
04794             for( uiMenuLine = 0; uiMenuLine < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghVehicleBox ); uiMenuLine++ )
04795             {
04796                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gVehicleMenuRegion[ uiMenuLine ] );
04797             }
04798 
04799             fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
04800 
04801             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
04802             
04803             HideBox( ghVehicleBox );
04804 
04805             if ( fShowAssignmentMenu )
04806             {
04807                   // remove highlight on the parent menu
04808                   UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
04809             }
04810       }
04811 
04812       return;
04813 }
04814 
04815 
04816 
04817 void HandleShadingOfLinesForVehicleMenu( void )
04818 {
04819       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
04820       INT32 iVehicleId;
04821       UINT32 uiMenuLine = 0;
04822       
04823 
04824       if ( ( fShowVehicleMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghVehicleBox == - 1 ) )
04825       {
04826             return;
04827       }
04828       
04829       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
04830 
04831       // run through list of vehicles
04832       for ( iVehicleId = 0; iVehicleId < ubNumberOfVehicles; iVehicleId++ )
04833   { 
04834             if ( pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].fValid == TRUE )
04835             {
04836                   // inaccessible vehicles aren't listed at all!
04837                   if ( IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iVehicleId ) )
04838                   {
04839                         if ( IsEnoughSpaceInVehicle( iVehicleId ) )
04840                         {
04841                               // legal vehicle, leave it green
04842                               UnShadeStringInBox( ghVehicleBox, uiMenuLine );
04843                               UnSecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghVehicleBox, uiMenuLine );
04844                         }
04845                         else
04846                         {
04847                               // unjoinable vehicle - yellow
04848                               SecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghVehicleBox, uiMenuLine );
04849                         }
04850 
04851                         uiMenuLine++;
04852                   }
04853             }
04854       }
04855 }
04856 
04857 
04858 
04859 void VehicleMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04860 {
04861       // btn callback handler for assignment region
04862       INT32 iValue = -1, iVehicleID;
04863       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
04864 
04865 
04866       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04867 
04868       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
04869       {
04870             if( iValue == VEHICLE_MENU_CANCEL )
04871             {
04872                   fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
04873                   UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
04874                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04875                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
04876                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
04877                   return;
04878             }
04879 
04880             pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
04881             iVehicleID = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 1 );
04882 
04883             // inaccessible vehicles shouldn't be listed in the menu!
04884             Assert( IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iVehicleID ) );
04885 
04886             if ( IsEnoughSpaceInVehicle( iVehicleID ) )
04887             {
04888                   PutSoldierInVehicle( pSoldier, ( INT8 ) iVehicleID );
04889             }
04890             else
04891             {
04892                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[ 18 ], zVehicleName[ pVehicleList[ iVehicleID ].ubVehicleType ] );
04893             }
04894 
04895             fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
04896 
04897             // update mapscreen
04898             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04899             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
04900             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
04901 
04902             giAssignHighLine = -1;
04903 
04904             SetAssignmentForList( VEHICLE, ( INT8 ) iVehicleID );
04905       }
04906 }
04907 
04908 
04909 void VehicleMenuMvtCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04910 {
04911       // mvt callback handler for assignment region
04912       INT32 iValue = -1;
04913       
04914       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04915 
04916       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
04917       {
04918             if( iValue != VEHICLE_MENU_CANCEL )
04919             {
04920                   // no shaded(disabled) lines actually appear in vehicle menus
04921                   if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghVehicleBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
04922                   {
04923                         // highlight vehicle line
04924                         HighLightBoxLine( ghVehicleBox, iValue );
04925                   }
04926             }
04927             else
04928             {
04929                   // highlight cancel line
04930              HighLightBoxLine( ghVehicleBox, GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghVehicleBox ) - 1 );
04931             }
04932       }
04933       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
04934       {
04935             // unhighlight all strings in box
04936             UnHighLightBox( ghVehicleBox );
04937 
04938             HandleShadingOfLinesForVehicleMenu( );
04939       }
04940 }
04941 
04942 
04943 
04944 BOOLEAN DisplayRepairMenu( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04945 {
04946       INT32 iVehicleIndex=0;
04947       INT32 hStringHandle=0;
04948 
04949 
04950       // run through list of vehicles in sector and add them to pop up box
04951       // first, clear pop up box
04952       RemoveBox(ghRepairBox);
04953       ghRepairBox = -1;
04954 
04955   CreateRepairBox();
04956       SetCurrentBox(ghRepairBox);   
04957 
04958       // PLEASE NOTE: make sure any changes you do here are reflected in all 3 routines which must remain in synch:
04959       // CreateDestroyMouseRegionForRepairMenu(), DisplayRepairMenu(), and HandleShadingOfLinesForRepairMenu().
04960 
04961       if( pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0 )
04962       {
04963             // run through list of vehicles and see if any in sector
04964             for ( iVehicleIndex = 0; iVehicleIndex < ubNumberOfVehicles; iVehicleIndex++ )
04965             {
04966                   if ( pVehicleList[ iVehicleIndex ].fValid == TRUE )
04967                   {
04968                         // don't even list the helicopter, because it's NEVER repairable...
04969                         if ( iVehicleIndex != iHelicopterVehicleId )
04970                         {
04971                               if ( IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iVehicleIndex ) )
04972                               {
04973                                     AddMonoString( (UINT32 *)&hStringHandle,pVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ iVehicleIndex ].ubVehicleType ] );
04974                               }
04975                         }
04976                   }
04977             }
04978       }
04979 
04980       
04981 /* No point in allowing SAM site repair any more.  Jan/13/99.  ARM
04982       // is there a SAM SITE Here?
04983       if( ( IsThisSectorASAMSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ ) == TRUE ) && ( IsTheSAMSiteInSectorRepairable( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ ) ) )
04984       {
04985             // SAM site
04986             AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, pRepairStrings[ 1 ] );
04987       }
04988 */
04989 
04990 
04991       // is the ROBOT here?
04992       if( IsRobotInThisSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ ) )
04993       {
04994             // robot
04995             AddMonoString((UINT32 *)&hStringHandle, pRepairStrings[ 3 ] );
04996       }
04997 
04998 
04999       // items
05000       AddMonoString((UINT32 *)&hStringHandle, pRepairStrings[ 0 ] );
05001 
05002 
05003       // cancel
05004       AddMonoString((UINT32 *)&hStringHandle, pRepairStrings[ 2 ] );
05005 
05006   SetBoxFont(ghRepairBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
05007   SetBoxHighLight(ghRepairBox, FONT_WHITE);
05008       SetBoxShade(ghRepairBox, FONT_GRAY7);
05009   SetBoxForeground(ghRepairBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
05010   SetBoxBackground(ghRepairBox, FONT_BLACK);
05011 
05012       // resize box to text
05013       ResizeBoxToText( ghRepairBox );
05014 
05015       CheckAndUpdateTacticalAssignmentPopUpPositions( );
05016   
05017       return TRUE;
05018 }
05019 
05020 
05021 void HandleShadingOfLinesForRepairMenu( void )
05022 {
05023       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
05024       INT32 iVehicleIndex = 0;
05025       INT32 iCount = 0;
05026 
05027 
05028       if( ( fShowRepairMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghRepairBox == -1 ) )
05029       {
05030             return;
05031       }
05032       
05033       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
05034 
05035 
05036       // PLEASE NOTE: make sure any changes you do here are reflected in all 3 routines which must remain in synch:
05037       // CreateDestroyMouseRegionForRepairMenu(), DisplayRepairMenu(), and HandleShadingOfLinesForRepairMenu().
05038 
05039       if ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0 )
05040       {
05041             for ( iVehicleIndex = 0; iVehicleIndex < ubNumberOfVehicles; iVehicleIndex++ )
05042             {      
05043                   if ( pVehicleList[ iVehicleIndex ].fValid == TRUE )
05044                   {
05045                         // don't even list the helicopter, because it's NEVER repairable...
05046                         if ( iVehicleIndex != iHelicopterVehicleId )
05047                         {
05048                               if ( IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iVehicleIndex ) )
05049                               {
05050                                     if( CanCharacterRepairVehicle( pSoldier, iVehicleIndex ) == TRUE )
05051                                     {
05052                                           // unshade vehicle line
05053                                           UnShadeStringInBox( ghRepairBox, iCount );
05054                                     }
05055                                     else
05056                                     {
05057                                           // shade vehicle line
05058                                           ShadeStringInBox( ghRepairBox, iCount );
05059                                     }
05060 
05061                                     iCount++;
05062                               }
05063                         }
05064                   }
05065             }
05066       }
05067 
05068             
05069 /* No point in allowing SAM site repair any more.  Jan/13/99.  ARM
05070       if( ( IsThisSectorASAMSector( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY, pSoldier -> bSectorZ ) == TRUE ) && ( IsTheSAMSiteInSectorRepairable( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY, pSoldier -> bSectorZ ) ) )
05071       {
05072             // handle enable disable of repair sam option
05073             if( CanSoldierRepairSAM( pSoldier, SAM_SITE_REPAIR_DIVISOR ) )
05074             {
05075                   // unshade SAM line
05076                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghRepairBox, iCount );
05077             }
05078             else
05079             {
05080                   // shade SAM line
05081                   ShadeStringInBox( ghRepairBox, iCount );
05082             }
05083 
05084             iCount++;
05085       }
05086 */
05087 
05088 
05089       if( IsRobotInThisSector( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY, pSoldier -> bSectorZ ) )
05090       {
05091             // handle shading of repair robot option
05092             if( CanCharacterRepairRobot( pSoldier ) )
05093             {
05094                   // unshade robot line
05095                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghRepairBox, iCount );
05096             }
05097             else
05098             {
05099                   // shade robot line
05100                   ShadeStringInBox( ghRepairBox, iCount );
05101             }
05102 
05103             iCount++;
05104       }
05105 
05106 
05107       if ( DoesCharacterHaveAnyItemsToRepair( pSoldier, FINAL_REPAIR_PASS ) )
05108       {
05109             // unshade items line
05110             UnShadeStringInBox( ghRepairBox, iCount );
05111       }
05112       else
05113       {
05114             // shade items line
05115             ShadeStringInBox( ghRepairBox, iCount );
05116       }
05117 
05118       iCount++;
05119 
05120 
05121       return;
05122 }
05123 
05124 
05125 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionForRepairMenu( void )
05126 {
05127       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
05128 
05129       UINT32 uiCounter = 0;
05130       INT32 iCount = 0;
05131       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
05132       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
05133       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
05134       SGPPoint pPosition;
05135       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
05136       SGPRect pDimensions;
05137       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
05138       INT32 iVehicleIndex = 0;
05139 
05140 
05141       if( ( fShowRepairMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
05142       {
05143             CheckAndUpdateTacticalAssignmentPopUpPositions( );
05144 
05145             if( ( fShowRepairMenu ) && ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) )
05146             {
05147           //SetBoxPosition( ghRepairBox ,RepairPosition);
05148             }
05149 
05150             // grab height of font
05151             iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghRepairBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghRepairBox ) ); 
05152 
05153             // get x.y position of box
05154             GetBoxPosition( ghRepairBox, &pPosition);
05155 
05156             // grab box x and y position
05157             iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
05158             iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
05159 
05160             // get dimensions..mostly for width
05161             GetBoxSize( ghRepairBox, &pDimensions );
05162 
05163             // get width
05164             iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
05165 
05166             SetCurrentBox( ghRepairBox );
05167 
05168 
05169             pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
05170 
05171             // PLEASE NOTE: make sure any changes you do here are reflected in all 3 routines which must remain in synch:
05172             // CreateDestroyMouseRegionForRepairMenu(), DisplayRepairMenu(), and HandleShadingOfLinesForRepairMenu().
05173 
05174             if ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0 )
05175             {
05176                   // vehicles
05177                   for ( iVehicleIndex = 0; iVehicleIndex < ubNumberOfVehicles; iVehicleIndex++ )
05178                   {
05179                         if ( pVehicleList[ iVehicleIndex ].fValid == TRUE )
05180                         {
05181                               // don't even list the helicopter, because it's NEVER repairable...
05182                               if ( iVehicleIndex != iHelicopterVehicleId )
05183                               {
05184                                     // other vehicles *in the sector* are listed, but later shaded dark if they're not repairable
05185                                     if ( IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iVehicleIndex ) )
05186                                     {
05187                                           // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
05188                                           MSYS_DefineRegion( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCount ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCount + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
05189                                                              MSYS_NO_CURSOR, RepairMenuMvtCallback, RepairMenuBtnCallback );
05190 
05191                                           MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 0, iCount );
05192                                           // 2nd user data is the vehicle index, which can easily be different from the region index!
05193                                           MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 1, iVehicleIndex );
05194                                           iCount++;
05195                                     }
05196                               }
05197                         }
05198                   }
05199             }
05200 
05201 
05202 /* No point in allowing SAM site repair any more.  Jan/13/99.  ARM
05203             // SAM site
05204             if( ( IsThisSectorASAMSector( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY, pSoldier -> bSectorZ ) == TRUE ) && ( IsTheSAMSiteInSectorRepairable( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY, pSoldier -> bSectorZ ) ) )
05205             {
05206                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCount ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCount + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
05207                                                  MSYS_NO_CURSOR, RepairMenuMvtCallback, RepairMenuBtnCallback );
05208 
05209                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 0, REPAIR_MENU_SAM_SITE );
05210                   iCount++;
05211             }
05212 */
05213 
05214 
05215             // robot
05216             if( IsRobotInThisSector( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY, pSoldier -> bSectorZ ) )
05217             {
05218                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCount ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCount + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
05219                                                  MSYS_NO_CURSOR, RepairMenuMvtCallback, RepairMenuBtnCallback );
05220 
05221                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 0, iCount );
05222                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 1, REPAIR_MENU_ROBOT );
05223                   iCount++;
05224             }
05225 
05226 
05227             // items
05228             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCount ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCount + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
05229                                                  MSYS_NO_CURSOR, RepairMenuMvtCallback, RepairMenuBtnCallback );
05230 
05231             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 0, iCount );
05232             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 1, REPAIR_MENU_ITEMS );
05233             iCount++;
05234 
05235 
05236             // cancel
05237             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCount ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCount + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
05238                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, RepairMenuMvtCallback, RepairMenuBtnCallback );
05239 
05240             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 0, iCount );
05241             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairMenuRegion[ iCount ], 1, REPAIR_MENU_CANCEL );
05242             
05243             
05244             PauseGame( );
05245 
05246             // unhighlight all strings in box
05247             UnHighLightBox( ghRepairBox );
05248 
05249             fCreated = TRUE;
05250       }
05251       else if( ( ( fShowRepairMenu == FALSE ) || ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
05252       {
05253             fCreated = FALSE;
05254 
05255             // remove these regions
05256             for( uiCounter = 0; uiCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghRepairBox ); uiCounter++ )
05257             {
05258                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gRepairMenuRegion[ uiCounter ] );
05259             }
05260 
05261             fShowRepairMenu = FALSE;
05262 
05263             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
05264 
05265             HideBox( ghRepairBox );
05266 
05267             if ( fShowAssignmentMenu )
05268             {
05269                   // remove highlight on the parent menu
05270                   UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
05271             }
05272       }
05273 
05274       return;
05275 }
05276 
05277 
05278 
05279 void RepairMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05280 {
05281       // btn callback handler for assignment region
05282       INT32 iValue = -1;
05283       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
05284       INT32 iRepairWhat;
05285 
05286 
05287       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
05288 
05289       // ignore clicks on disabled lines
05290       if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghRepairBox, iValue ) == TRUE )
05291       {
05292             return;
05293       }
05294 
05295       // WHAT is being repaired is stored in the second user data argument
05296       iRepairWhat = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 1 );
05297 
05298 
05299       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
05300 
05301 
05302       if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bActive && ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) )
05303       {
05304             if( ( iRepairWhat >= REPAIR_MENU_VEHICLE1 ) && ( iRepairWhat <= REPAIR_MENU_VEHICLE3 ) )
05305             {
05306                   // repair VEHICLE
05307 
05308                   pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
05309 
05310                   if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != REPAIR )|| ( pSoldier -> fFixingRobot ) || ( pSoldier -> fFixingSAMSite ) )
05311                   {
05312                         SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
05313                   }
05314 
05315                   if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
05316                   {
05317                         TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
05318                   }
05319 
05320                   // remove from squad
05321                   RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
05322                   MakeSureToolKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
05323 
05324                   ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, REPAIR );
05325 
05326                   pSoldier -> bVehicleUnderRepairID = ( INT8 ) iRepairWhat;
05327 
05328                   MakeSureToolKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
05329 
05330                   // assign to a movement group
05331                   AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
05332 
05333                   // set assignment for group
05334                   SetAssignmentForList( ( INT8 ) REPAIR, 0 );
05335                   fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
05336 
05337             }
05338 /* No point in allowing SAM site repair any more.  Jan/13/99.  ARM
05339             else if( iRepairWhat == REPAIR_MENU_SAM_SITE )
05340             {
05341                   // repair SAM site
05342 
05343                   // remove from squad
05344                   RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
05345                   MakeSureToolKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
05346 
05347                   if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != REPAIR )|| ( pSoldier -> fFixingSAMSite == FALSE ) )
05348                   {
05349                         SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
05350                   }
05351 
05352                   ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, REPAIR );
05353                   pSoldier -> fFixingSAMSite = TRUE;
05354 
05355                   // the second argument is irrelevant here, function looks at pSoldier itself to know what's being repaired
05356                   SetAssignmentForList( ( INT8 ) REPAIR, 0 );
05357                   fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
05358 
05359                   MakeSureToolKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
05360 
05361                   // assign to a movement group
05362                   AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
05363             }
05364 */
05365             else if( iRepairWhat == REPAIR_MENU_ROBOT )
05366             {
05367                   // repair ROBOT
05368                   pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
05369 
05370                   // remove from squad
05371                   if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
05372                   {
05373                         TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
05374                   }
05375 
05376                   RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
05377                   MakeSureToolKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
05378 
05379                   if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != REPAIR )|| ( pSoldier -> fFixingRobot == FALSE ) )
05380                   {
05381                         SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
05382                   }
05383 
05384                   ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, REPAIR );
05385                   pSoldier->fFixingRobot = TRUE;
05386 
05387                   // the second argument is irrelevant here, function looks at pSoldier itself to know what's being repaired
05388                   SetAssignmentForList( ( INT8 ) REPAIR, 0 );
05389                   fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
05390 
05391                   MakeSureToolKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
05392 
05393                   // assign to a movement group
05394                   AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
05395             }
05396             else if( iRepairWhat == REPAIR_MENU_ITEMS )
05397             {
05398                   // items
05399                   SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, REPAIR, FALSE, FALSE, -1 );
05400 
05401                   // the second argument is irrelevant here, function looks at pSoldier itself to know what's being repaired
05402                   SetAssignmentForList( ( INT8 ) REPAIR, 0 );
05403                   fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
05404             }
05405             else
05406             {
05407                   // CANCEL
05408                   fShowRepairMenu = FALSE;
05409             }
05410 
05411             // update mapscreen 
05412             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05413             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05414             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
05415 
05416             giAssignHighLine = -1;
05417       }
05418 }
05419 
05420 
05421 void RepairMenuMvtCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05422 {
05423       // mvt callback handler for assignment region
05424       INT32 iValue = -1;
05425 
05426       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
05427 
05428       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
05429       {
05430             if( iValue < REPAIR_MENU_CANCEL )
05431             {
05432                   if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghRepairBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
05433                   {
05434                         // highlight choice
05435                         HighLightBoxLine( ghRepairBox, iValue );
05436                   }
05437             }
05438             else
05439             {
05440                   // highlight cancel line
05441                   HighLightBoxLine( ghRepairBox, GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghRepairBox ) - 1 );
05442             }
05443       }
05444       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
05445       {
05446             // unhighlight all strings in box
05447             UnHighLightBox( ghRepairBox );
05448       }
05449 }
05450 
05451 
05452 
05453 void MakeSureToolKitIsInHand( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05454 {
05455       INT8 bPocket = 0;
05456 
05457       // if there isn't a toolkit in his hand
05458       if( !Item[pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS].usItem].toolkit )
05459       {
05460             // run through rest of inventory looking for toolkits, swap the first one into hand if found
05461             for (bPocket = SECONDHANDPOS; bPocket <= SMALLPOCK8POS; bPocket++)
05462             {
05463                   if( Item[pSoldier -> inv[ bPocket ].usItem].toolkit )
05464                   {
05465                         SwapObjs( &pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS ], &pSoldier -> inv[ bPocket ] );
05466                         break;
05467                   }
05468             }
05469       }
05470 }
05471 
05472 
05473 BOOLEAN MakeSureMedKitIsInHand( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05474 {
05475       INT8 bPocket = 0;
05476       BOOLEAN fFoundOne = FALSE;
05477 
05478 
05479       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05480 
05481       // if there is a MEDICAL BAG in his hand, we're set
05482       if ( Item[pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].medicalkit )
05483       {
05484             return(TRUE);
05485       }
05486 
05487       // run through rest of inventory looking 1st for MEDICAL BAGS, swap the first one into hand if found
05488       for (bPocket = SECONDHANDPOS; bPocket <= SMALLPOCK8POS; bPocket++)
05489       {
05490             if ( Item[pSoldier -> inv[ bPocket ].usItem].medicalkit )
05491             {
05492                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05493                   SwapObjs( &pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS ], &pSoldier -> inv[ bPocket ] );
05494                   return(TRUE);
05495             }
05496       }
05497 
05498       // we didn't find a medical bag, so settle for a FIRST AID KIT
05499       if ( Item[pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].firstaidkit )
05500       {
05501             return(TRUE);
05502       }
05503 
05504       // run through rest of inventory looking 1st for MEDICAL BAGS, swap the first one into hand if found
05505       for (bPocket = SECONDHANDPOS; bPocket <= SMALLPOCK8POS; bPocket++)
05506       {
05507             if ( Item[pSoldier -> inv[ bPocket ].usItem].firstaidkit )
05508             {
05509 //                if( ( Item[ pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].fFlags & IF_TWOHANDED_GUN ) && ( bPocket >= SMALLPOCK1POS ) )
05510                   if( ( Item[ pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].twohanded  ) && ( bPocket >= SMALLPOCK1POS ) )
05511                   {
05512                         // first move from hand to second hand
05513                         SwapObjs( &pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS ], &pSoldier -> inv[ SECONDHANDPOS ] );
05514 
05515                         // dirty mapscreen and squad panels
05516                         fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05517                         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05518                   }
05519                   
05520                   SwapObjs( &pSoldier -> inv[ HANDPOS ], &pSoldier -> inv[ bPocket ] );
05521                   
05522 
05523                   return(TRUE);
05524             }
05525       }
05526 
05527       // no medkit items in possession!
05528       return(FALSE);
05529 }
05530 
05531 
05532 
05533 void HandleShadingOfLinesForAssignmentMenus( void )
05534 {
05535       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
05536 
05537       // updates which menus are selectable based on character status
05538 
05539 
05540       if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghAssignmentBox == - 1 ) )
05541       {
05542             return;
05543       }
05544       
05545 
05546       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
05547 
05548       if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bActive )
05549       {
05550             if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
05551             {
05552                   // patient
05553                   if( CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier ) )
05554                   {
05555                         // unshade patient line
05556                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghEpcBox, EPC_MENU_PATIENT );
05557                   }
05558                   else
05559                   {
05560                         // shade patient line
05561                         ShadeStringInBox( ghEpcBox, EPC_MENU_PATIENT );
05562                   }
05563 
05564                   
05565                   if( CanCharacterOnDuty( pSoldier ) )
05566                   {
05567                         // unshade on duty line
05568                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghEpcBox, EPC_MENU_ON_DUTY );
05569                   }
05570                   else
05571                   {
05572                         // shade on duty line
05573                         ShadeStringInBox( ghEpcBox, EPC_MENU_ON_DUTY );
05574                   }
05575 
05576                   if( CanCharacterVehicle( pSoldier ) )
05577                   {
05578                         // unshade vehicle line
05579                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghEpcBox, EPC_MENU_VEHICLE );
05580                   }
05581                   else
05582                   {
05583                         // shade vehicle line
05584                         ShadeStringInBox( ghEpcBox, EPC_MENU_VEHICLE );
05585                   }
05586             }
05587             else
05588             {
05589                   // doctor
05590                   if( CanCharacterDoctor( pSoldier ) )
05591                   {
05592                         // unshade doctor line
05593                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_DOCTOR );
05594                         UnSecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_DOCTOR );
05595                   }
05596                   else
05597                   {
05598                         // only missing a med kit
05599                         if( CanCharacterDoctorButDoesntHaveMedKit( pSoldier ) )
05600                         {
05601                               SecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_DOCTOR );
05602                         }
05603                         else
05604                         {
05605                               // shade doctor line
05606                               ShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_DOCTOR );
05607                         }
05608 
05609                   }
05610 
05611                   // repair
05612                   if( CanCharacterRepair( pSoldier ) )
05613                   {
05614                         // unshade repair line
05615                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
05616                         UnSecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
05617                   }
05618                   else
05619                   {
05620                         // only missing a tool kit
05621                         if( CanCharacterRepairButDoesntHaveARepairkit( pSoldier ) )
05622                         {
05623                               SecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
05624                         }
05625                         else
05626                         {
05627                               // shade repair line
05628                               ShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
05629                         }
05630                   }
05631 
05632 
05633                   // patient
05634                   if( CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier ) )
05635                   {
05636                         // unshade patient line
05637                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_PATIENT );
05638                   }
05639                   else
05640                   {
05641                         // shade patient line
05642                         ShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_PATIENT );
05643                   }
05644                   
05645 
05646                   if( CanCharacterOnDuty( pSoldier ) )
05647                   {
05648                         // unshade on duty line
05649                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_ON_DUTY );
05650                   }
05651                   else
05652                   {
05653                         // shade on duty line
05654                         ShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_ON_DUTY );
05655                   }
05656 
05657 
05658                   if( CanCharacterPractise( pSoldier ) )
05659                   {
05660                         // unshade train line
05661                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN );
05662                   }
05663                   else
05664                   {
05665                         // shade train line
05666                         ShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN );
05667                   }
05668 
05669 
05670                   if( CanCharacterVehicle( pSoldier ) )
05671                   {
05672                         // unshade vehicle line
05673                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_VEHICLE );
05674                   }
05675                   else
05676                   {
05677                         // shade vehicle line
05678                         ShadeStringInBox( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_VEHICLE );
05679                   }
05680             }
05681       }
05682 
05683       // squad submenu
05684       HandleShadingOfLinesForSquadMenu( );
05685 
05686       // vehicle submenu
05687       HandleShadingOfLinesForVehicleMenu( );
05688 
05689       // repair submenu
05690       HandleShadingOfLinesForRepairMenu( );
05691 
05692       // training submenu
05693       HandleShadingOfLinesForTrainingMenu( );
05694 
05695       // training attributes submenu
05696       HandleShadingOfLinesForAttributeMenus( );
05697 
05698       return;
05699 }
05700 
05701 
05702 
05703 void DetermineWhichAssignmentMenusCanBeShown( void )
05704 {
05705       BOOLEAN fCharacterNoLongerValid = FALSE;
05706       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
05707 
05708       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05709       {
05710             if( fShowMapScreenMovementList == TRUE )
05711             {
05712                   if( bSelectedDestChar == -1 )
05713                   {
05714                         fCharacterNoLongerValid = TRUE;
05715                         HandleShowingOfMovementBox( );
05716                   }
05717                   else
05718                   {
05719                         fShowMapScreenMovementList = FALSE;
05720                         fCharacterNoLongerValid = TRUE;
05721                   }
05722             }
05723 /*
05724             else if( fShowUpdateBox )
05725             {
05726                   //handle showing of the merc update box
05727                   HandleShowingOfUpBox( );
05728             }
05729 */
05730             else if( bSelectedAssignChar == -1 )
05731             {
05732                   fCharacterNoLongerValid = TRUE;
05733             }
05734 
05735             // update the assignment positions
05736             UpdateMapScreenAssignmentPositions( );
05737       }
05738 
05739       // determine which assign menu needs to be shown
05740       if( ( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) )||( fCharacterNoLongerValid == TRUE ) )
05741       {
05742             // reset show assignment menus
05743             fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
05744             fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
05745             fShowRepairMenu = FALSE;
05746             
05747             // destroy mask, if needed
05748             CreateDestroyScreenMaskForAssignmentAndContractMenus( );
05749             
05750 
05751             // destroy menu if needed
05752             CreateDestroyMouseRegionForVehicleMenu( );
05753             CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForAssignmentMenu( );
05754             CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForTrainingMenu( );
05755             CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForAttributeMenu( );
05756             CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForSquadMenu( TRUE );
05757             CreateDestroyMouseRegionForRepairMenu( );
05758 
05759             // hide all boxes being shown
05760             if ( IsBoxShown( ghEpcBox ) )
05761             {
05762                   HideBox( ghEpcBox );
05763                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05764                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05765             }
05766             if ( IsBoxShown( ghAssignmentBox ) )
05767             {
05768                   HideBox( ghAssignmentBox );
05769                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05770                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05771             }
05772             if ( IsBoxShown( ghTrainingBox ) )
05773             {
05774                   HideBox( ghTrainingBox );
05775                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05776                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05777             }
05778             if ( IsBoxShown( ghRepairBox ) )
05779             {
05780                   HideBox( ghRepairBox );
05781                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05782                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05783             }
05784             if ( IsBoxShown( ghAttributeBox ) )
05785             {
05786                   HideBox( ghAttributeBox );
05787                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05788                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05789             }
05790             if ( IsBoxShown( ghVehicleBox ) )
05791             {
05792                   HideBox( ghVehicleBox );
05793                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05794                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05795             }
05796 
05797             // do we really want ot hide this box?
05798             if( fShowContractMenu == FALSE )
05799             {
05800                   if ( IsBoxShown( ghRemoveMercAssignBox ) )
05801       {
05802                     HideBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
05803                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05804                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05805       }
05806             }
05807             //HideBox( ghSquadBox );
05808 
05809 
05810             //SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
05811 
05812             // no menus, leave
05813             return;
05814       }
05815 
05816       // update the assignment positions
05817       UpdateMapScreenAssignmentPositions( );
05818 
05819       // create mask, if needed
05820       CreateDestroyScreenMaskForAssignmentAndContractMenus( );
05821 
05822 
05823       // created assignment menu if needed
05824       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForAssignmentMenu( );
05825       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForTrainingMenu( );
05826       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForAttributeMenu( );
05827       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForSquadMenu( TRUE );
05828       CreateDestroyMouseRegionForRepairMenu(  );
05829 
05830 
05831       if( ( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID].bLife == 0 )||( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedInfoChar].usSolID].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) ) && ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) ) )
05832       {
05833             // show basic assignment menu
05834             ShowBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
05835       }
05836       else
05837       {
05838             pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
05839 
05840             if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
05841             {
05842                   ShowBox( ghEpcBox );
05843             }
05844             else
05845             {
05846                   // show basic assignment menu
05847                   
05848                   ShowBox( ghAssignmentBox );
05849             }
05850       }
05851 
05852       // TRAINING menu
05853       if( fShowTrainingMenu == TRUE )
05854       {
05855             HandleShadingOfLinesForTrainingMenu( );
05856             ShowBox( ghTrainingBox );
05857       }
05858       else
05859       {
05860             if( IsBoxShown( ghTrainingBox ) )
05861             {
05862                   HideBox( ghTrainingBox );
05863                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05864                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05865                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05866             //    SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
05867             }
05868       }
05869 
05870       // REPAIR menu
05871       if( fShowRepairMenu == TRUE )
05872       {
05873             HandleShadingOfLinesForRepairMenu( );
05874             ShowBox( ghRepairBox );
05875       }
05876       else
05877       {
05878             // hide box
05879             if( IsBoxShown( ghRepairBox ) )
05880             {
05881                   HideBox( ghRepairBox );
05882                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05883                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05884                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05885             //    SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
05886             }
05887       }
05888 
05889       // ATTRIBUTE menu
05890       if( fShowAttributeMenu == TRUE )
05891       {
05892             HandleShadingOfLinesForAttributeMenus( );
05893             ShowBox( ghAttributeBox );
05894       }
05895       else
05896       {
05897             if( IsBoxShown( ghAttributeBox ) )
05898             {
05899                   HideBox( ghAttributeBox );
05900                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05901               fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05902               gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05903             //    SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
05904             }
05905 
05906       }
05907 
05908       // VEHICLE menu
05909       if( fShowVehicleMenu == TRUE )
05910       {
05911             ShowBox( ghVehicleBox );
05912       }
05913       else
05914       {
05915             if( IsBoxShown( ghVehicleBox ) )
05916             {
05917                   HideBox( ghVehicleBox );
05918                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05919               fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05920               gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
05921             //    SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
05922             }
05923       }
05924 
05925       CreateDestroyMouseRegionForVehicleMenu( );
05926 
05927       return;
05928 }
05929 
05930 
05931 
05932 void CreateDestroyScreenMaskForAssignmentAndContractMenus( void )
05933 {
05934 
05935       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
05936       // will create a screen mask to catch mouse input to disable assignment menus
05937       
05938       // not created, create
05939       if( ( fCreated == FALSE ) && ( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE )||( fShowContractMenu == TRUE ) || ( fShowTownInfo == TRUE) ) )
05940       {
05941             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gAssignmentScreenMaskRegion, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
05942                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, AssignmentScreenMaskBtnCallback );
05943         
05944             // created
05945             fCreated = TRUE;
05946 
05947             if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05948             {
05949                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor(  &gAssignmentScreenMaskRegion, 0 );
05950             }
05951             
05952       }
05953       else if( ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE )&&( fShowContractMenu == FALSE ) && ( fShowTownInfo == FALSE )  )
05954       {
05955             // created, get rid of it
05956             MSYS_RemoveRegion(  &gAssignmentScreenMaskRegion );
05957 
05958             // not created
05959             fCreated = FALSE;
05960       }
05961 
05962       return;
05963 }
05964 
05965 
05966 void AssignmentScreenMaskBtnCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05967 {
05968       // btn callback handler for assignment screen mask region
05969       
05970       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) || ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP ) )
05971       {
05972             if( fFirstClickInAssignmentScreenMask == TRUE )
05973             {
05974                   fFirstClickInAssignmentScreenMask = FALSE;
05975                   return;
05976             }
05977 
05978             // button event, stop showing menus
05979             fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
05980             
05981             fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
05982 
05983             fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
05984             
05985             // stop showing town mine info
05986             fShowTownInfo = FALSE;
05987 
05988             // reset contract character and contract highlight line
05989             giContractHighLine =-1;
05990             bSelectedContractChar = -1;
05991             fGlowContractRegion = FALSE;
05992 
05993             
05994             // update mapscreen
05995         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05996             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05997             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
05998 
05999         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
06000             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
06001 
06002       }
06003       return;
06004 }
06005 
06006 void ClearScreenMaskForMapScreenExit( void )
06007 {
06008 
06009       // reset show assignment menu
06010       fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
06011 
06012       // update the assignment positions
06013       UpdateMapScreenAssignmentPositions( );
06014 
06015       // stop showing town mine info too
06016       fShowTownInfo = FALSE;
06017 
06018       // destroy mask, if needed
06019       CreateDestroyScreenMaskForAssignmentAndContractMenus( );
06020 
06021       // destroy assignment menu if needed
06022       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForAssignmentMenu( );
06023       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForTrainingMenu( );
06024       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForAttributeMenu( );
06025       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForSquadMenu( TRUE );
06026       CreateDestroyMouseRegionForRepairMenu(  );
06027 
06028       return;
06029 }
06030 
06031 void CreateDestroyMouseRegions( void )
06032 {
06033       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
06034       UINT32 iCounter = 0;
06035       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
06036       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
06037       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
06038       SGPPoint pPosition;
06039       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
06040       SGPRect pDimensions;
06041 
06042       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen assignment main menu
06043 
06044 
06045       // do we show the remove menu
06046       if( fShowRemoveMenu )
06047       {
06048             CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForRemoveMenu( );
06049             return;
06050       }
06051 
06052       if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
06053       {
06054 
06055             // grab height of font
06056             iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghAssignmentBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghAssignmentBox ) ); 
06057 
06058             // get x.y position of box
06059             GetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, &pPosition);
06060 
06061             // grab box x and y position
06062             iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
06063             iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
06064 
06065             // get dimensions..mostly for width
06066             GetBoxSize( ghAssignmentBox, &pDimensions );
06067 
06068             // get width
06069             iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
06070 
06071             SetCurrentBox( ghAssignmentBox );
06072 
06073             // define regions
06074             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghAssignmentBox ); iCounter++ )
06075             {
06076                   // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
06077 
06078 
06079                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ],      ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
06080                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, AssignmentMenuMvtCallBack, AssignmentMenuBtnCallback );
06081 
06082                   // set user defines
06083                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
06084             }
06085 
06086             // created
06087             fCreated = TRUE;
06088 
06089             // pause game 
06090             PauseGame( );
06091 
06092             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06093             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty= TRUE;
06094             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06095             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06096 
06097             // unhighlight all strings in box
06098             UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
06099 
06100       }
06101       else if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
06102       {
06103             // destroy 
06104             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghAssignmentBox ); iCounter++ )
06105             {
06106                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
06107             }
06108 
06109             RestorePopUpBoxes();
06110             
06111             // not created
06112             fCreated = FALSE;
06113       }
06114 
06115 
06116 }
06117 
06118 
06119 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForContractMenu( void )
06120 {
06121       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
06122       UINT32 iCounter = 0;
06123       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
06124       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
06125       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
06126       SGPPoint pPosition;
06127       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
06128       SGPRect pDimensions;
06129       static BOOLEAN fShowRemoveMenu = FALSE;
06130 
06131       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen Contract main menu
06132       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen assignment main menu
06133       // check if we can only remove character from team..not assign
06134       if( ( bSelectedContractChar != -1 )|| ( fShowRemoveMenu == TRUE ) )
06135       {
06136             if( fShowRemoveMenu == TRUE )
06137             {
06138                   // dead guy handle menu stuff
06139                   fShowRemoveMenu =  fShowContractMenu;
06140 
06141       // ATE: Added this setting of global variable 'cause
06142       // it will cause an assert failure in GetSelectedAssignSoldier()
06143       bSelectedAssignChar = bSelectedContractChar;
06144 
06145                   CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForRemoveMenu( );
06146 
06147                   return;
06148             }
06149             if( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedContractChar].usSolID].bLife == 0 )
06150             {
06151 
06152                   // dead guy handle menu stuff
06153                   fShowRemoveMenu =  fShowContractMenu;
06154 
06155       // ATE: Added this setting of global variable 'cause
06156       // it will cause an assert failure in GetSelectedAssignSoldier()
06157       bSelectedAssignChar = bSelectedContractChar;
06158       
06159                   CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForRemoveMenu( );
06160 
06161                   return;
06162             }
06163       }
06164 
06165 
06166       if( ( fShowContractMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
06167       {
06168             if( bSelectedContractChar == -1 )
06169             {
06170                   return;
06171             }
06172 
06173             if( fShowContractMenu )
06174             {
06175               SetBoxPosition( ghContractBox , ContractPosition );
06176             }
06177             // grab height of font
06178             iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghContractBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghContractBox ) ); 
06179 
06180             // get x.y position of box
06181             GetBoxPosition( ghContractBox, &pPosition);
06182 
06183             // grab box x and y position
06184             iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
06185             iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
06186 
06187             // get dimensions..mostly for width
06188             GetBoxSize( ghContractBox, &pDimensions );
06189 
06190             // get width
06191             iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
06192 
06193             SetCurrentBox( ghContractBox );
06194 
06195             // define regions
06196             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghContractBox ); iCounter++ )
06197             {
06198                   // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
06199             
06200 
06201                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gContractMenuRegion[ iCounter ],  ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghContractBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghContractBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
06202                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, ContractMenuMvtCallback, ContractMenuBtnCallback );
06203 
06204                   // set user defines
06205                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gContractMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
06206             }
06207 
06208             // created
06209             fCreated = TRUE;
06210 
06211             // pause game 
06212             PauseGame( );
06213 
06214             // unhighlight all strings in box
06215             UnHighLightBox( ghContractBox );
06216 
06217       }
06218       else if( ( fShowContractMenu == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
06219       {
06220             // destroy 
06221             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghContractBox ); iCounter++ )
06222             {
06223                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gContractMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
06224             }
06225 
06226             fShownContractMenu = FALSE;
06227             //if( ( fProcessingAMerc ) && ( pProcessingSoldier ) )
06228             //{
06229             //    if( (UINT32)(pProcessingSoldier->iEndofContractTime) == GetWorldTotalMin() )
06230             //    {
06231             //          StrategicRemoveMerc( pProcessingSoldier, MERC_FIRED );
06232             //          pProcessingSoldier = NULL;
06233             //          fProcessingAMerc = FALSE;
06234             //    }
06235             //}
06236 
06237             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06238             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty= TRUE;
06239             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06240             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06241 
06242             RestorePopUpBoxes( );
06243 
06244             // not created
06245             fCreated = FALSE;
06246       }
06247 }
06248 
06249 
06250 
06251 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForTrainingMenu( void )
06252 {
06253       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
06254       UINT32 iCounter = 0;
06255       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
06256       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
06257       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
06258       SGPPoint pPosition;
06259       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
06260       SGPRect pDimensions;
06261 
06262       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen assignment main menu
06263 
06264 
06265 
06266       if( ( fShowTrainingMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
06267       {
06268 
06269             if( ( fShowTrainingMenu ) && ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) )
06270             {
06271               SetBoxPosition( ghTrainingBox, TrainPosition );
06272             }
06273
