06274             HandleShadingOfLinesForTrainingMenu( );
06275 
06276             CheckAndUpdateTacticalAssignmentPopUpPositions( );
06277 
06278             // grab height of font
06279             iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghTrainingBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghTrainingBox ) ); 
06280 
06281             // get x.y position of box
06282             GetBoxPosition( ghTrainingBox, &pPosition);
06283 
06284             // grab box x and y position
06285             iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
06286             iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
06287 
06288             // get dimensions..mostly for width
06289             GetBoxSize( ghTrainingBox, &pDimensions );
06290             SetBoxSecondaryShade( ghTrainingBox, FONT_YELLOW );
06291 
06292             // get width
06293             iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
06294 
06295             SetCurrentBox( ghTrainingBox );
06296 
06297             // define regions
06298             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghTrainingBox ); iCounter++ )
06299             {
06300                   // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
06301             
06302 
06303                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTrainingMenuRegion[ iCounter ],  ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghTrainingBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghTrainingBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 3 ,
06304                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TrainingMenuMvtCallBack, TrainingMenuBtnCallback );
06305 
06306                   // set user defines
06307                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTrainingMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
06308             }
06309 
06310             // created
06311             fCreated = TRUE;
06312 
06313             // unhighlight all strings in box
06314             UnHighLightBox( ghTrainingBox );
06315 
06316       }
06317       else if( ( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) || ( fShowTrainingMenu == FALSE ) ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
06318       {
06319             // destroy 
06320             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghTrainingBox ); iCounter++ )
06321             {
06322                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTrainingMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
06323             }
06324 
06325             // stop showing training menu
06326             if( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE )
06327             {
06328                   fShowTrainingMenu = FALSE;
06329             }
06330 
06331             RestorePopUpBoxes( );
06332 
06333             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06334             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty= TRUE;
06335             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06336             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06337             HideBox( ghTrainingBox );
06338             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
06339             
06340             // not created
06341             fCreated = FALSE;
06342 
06343             if ( fShowAssignmentMenu )
06344             {
06345                   // remove highlight on the parent menu
06346                   UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
06347             }
06348       }
06349 }
06350 
06351 
06352 
06353 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForAttributeMenu( void )
06354 {
06355       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
06356       UINT32 iCounter = 0;
06357       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
06358       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
06359       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
06360       SGPPoint pPosition;
06361       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
06362       SGPRect pDimensions;
06363 
06364       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen attribute  menu
06365 
06366 
06367 
06368       if( ( fShowAttributeMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
06369       {
06370 
06371             if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu ) && ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) )
06372             {
06373               SetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, AssignmentPosition );
06374             }
06375 
06376             HandleShadingOfLinesForAttributeMenus( );
06377             CheckAndUpdateTacticalAssignmentPopUpPositions( );
06378 
06379             // grab height of font
06380             iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghAttributeBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghAttributeBox ) ); 
06381 
06382             // get x.y position of box
06383             GetBoxPosition( ghAttributeBox, &pPosition);
06384 
06385             // grab box x and y position
06386             iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
06387             iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
06388 
06389             // get dimensions..mostly for width
06390             GetBoxSize( ghAttributeBox, &pDimensions );
06391 
06392             // get width
06393             iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
06394 
06395             SetCurrentBox( ghAttributeBox );
06396 
06397             // define regions
06398             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghAttributeBox ); iCounter++ )
06399             {
06400                   // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
06401             
06402 
06403                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gAttributeMenuRegion[ iCounter ],       ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAttributeBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAttributeBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2 ,
06404                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, AttributeMenuMvtCallBack, AttributesMenuBtnCallback );
06405 
06406                   // set user defines
06407                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gAttributeMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
06408             }
06409 
06410             // created
06411             fCreated = TRUE;
06412 
06413             // unhighlight all strings in box
06414             UnHighLightBox( ghAttributeBox );
06415 
06416       }
06417       else if( ( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) || ( fShowTrainingMenu == FALSE ) ||( fShowAttributeMenu == FALSE) ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
06418       {
06419             // destroy 
06420             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghAttributeBox ); iCounter++ )
06421             {
06422                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gAttributeMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
06423             }
06424 
06425             // stop showing training menu
06426             if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE )||(  fShowTrainingMenu == FALSE ) || ( fShowAttributeMenu == FALSE))
06427             {
06428                   fShowAttributeMenu = FALSE;
06429                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
06430             }
06431 
06432 
06433             RestorePopUpBoxes( );
06434 
06435             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06436             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty= TRUE;
06437             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06438             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06439             HideBox( ghAttributeBox );
06440             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
06441 
06442             // not created
06443             fCreated = FALSE;
06444 
06445             if ( fShowTrainingMenu )
06446             {
06447                   // remove highlight on the parent menu
06448                   UnHighLightBox( ghTrainingBox );
06449             }
06450       }
06451 }
06452 
06453 
06454 
06455 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForRemoveMenu( void )
06456 {
06457       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
06458       UINT32 iCounter = 0;
06459       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
06460       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
06461       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
06462       SGPPoint pPosition;
06463       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
06464       SGPRect pDimensions;
06465 
06466       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen attribute  menu
06467       if( ( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE ) || ( fShowContractMenu == TRUE ) ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
06468       {
06469 
06470             if( fShowContractMenu )
06471             {
06472               SetBoxPosition( ghContractBox , ContractPosition );
06473             }
06474             else
06475             {
06476                   SetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox , AssignmentPosition );
06477             }
06478 
06479             if( fShowContractMenu )
06480             {
06481                   // set box position to contract box position
06482                   SetBoxPosition( ghRemoveMercAssignBox , ContractPosition );
06483             }
06484             else
06485             {
06486                   // set box position to contract box position
06487                   SetBoxPosition( ghRemoveMercAssignBox , AssignmentPosition );
06488             }
06489 
06490             CheckAndUpdateTacticalAssignmentPopUpPositions( );
06491 
06492             // grab height of font
06493             iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghRemoveMercAssignBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghRemoveMercAssignBox ) ); 
06494 
06495             // get x.y position of box
06496             GetBoxPosition( ghRemoveMercAssignBox, &pPosition);
06497 
06498             // grab box x and y position
06499             iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
06500             iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
06501 
06502             // get dimensions..mostly for width
06503             GetBoxSize( ghRemoveMercAssignBox, &pDimensions );
06504 
06505             // get width
06506             iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
06507 
06508             SetCurrentBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
06509 
06510             // define regions
06511             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox ); iCounter++ )
06512             {
06513                   // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
06514             
06515 
06516                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gRemoveMercAssignRegion[ iCounter ],    ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAttributeBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghAttributeBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2 ,
06517                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, RemoveMercMenuMvtCallBack,  RemoveMercMenuBtnCallback );
06518 
06519                   // set user defines
06520                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRemoveMercAssignRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
06521             }
06522 
06523             // created
06524             fCreated = TRUE;
06525 
06526             // unhighlight all strings in box
06527             UnHighLightBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
06528 
06529       }
06530       else if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( fShowContractMenu == FALSE )  )
06531       {
06532             // destroy 
06533             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox ); iCounter++ )
06534             {
06535                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gRemoveMercAssignRegion[ iCounter ] );
06536             }
06537 
06538             fShownContractMenu = FALSE;
06539 
06540             // stop showing  menu
06541             if( fShowRemoveMenu == FALSE ) 
06542             {
06543                   fShowAttributeMenu = FALSE;
06544                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06545                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
06546 
06547             }
06548 
06549 
06550             RestorePopUpBoxes( );
06551 
06552             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06553             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty= TRUE;
06554             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06555             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06556 
06557             // turn off the GLOBAL fShowRemoveMenu flag!!!
06558             fShowRemoveMenu = FALSE;
06559             // and the assignment menu itself!!!
06560             fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
06561 
06562             // not created 
06563             fCreated = FALSE;
06564       }
06565 
06566 
06567 }
06568 
06569 
06570 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForSquadMenu( BOOLEAN fPositionBox )
06571 {
06572       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
06573       UINT32 iCounter = 0;
06574       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
06575       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
06576       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
06577       SGPPoint pPosition;
06578       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
06579       SGPRect pDimensions;
06580 
06581 
06582       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen attribute  menu
06583 
06584       if( ( fShowSquadMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
06585       {
06586             // create squad box
06587             CreateSquadBox( );
06588             GetBoxSize( ghAssignmentBox, &pDimensions );
06589 
06590             CheckAndUpdateTacticalAssignmentPopUpPositions( );
06591 
06592             // grab height of font
06593             iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghSquadBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghSquadBox ) ); 
06594 
06595             // get x.y position of box
06596             GetBoxPosition( ghSquadBox, &pPosition);
06597 
06598 
06599             // grab box x and y position
06600             iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
06601             iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
06602 
06603             // get dimensions..mostly for width
06604             GetBoxSize( ghSquadBox, &pDimensions );
06605 
06606             // get width
06607             iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
06608 
06609             SetCurrentBox( ghSquadBox );
06610 
06611             // define regions
06612             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghSquadBox ) - 1; iCounter++ )
06613             {
06614                   // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
06615                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSquadMenuRegion[ iCounter ],     ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghSquadBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghSquadBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2 ,
06616                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, SquadMenuMvtCallBack, SquadMenuBtnCallback );
06617 
06618                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSquadMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
06619             }
06620 
06621             // now create cancel region
06622             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSquadMenuRegion[ iCounter ], ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghSquadBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghSquadBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2 ,
06623                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, SquadMenuMvtCallBack, SquadMenuBtnCallback );
06624 
06625             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSquadMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, SQUAD_MENU_CANCEL );
06626 
06627 
06628             // created
06629             fCreated = TRUE;
06630 
06631             // show the box
06632             ShowBox( ghSquadBox );
06633 
06634             // unhighlight all strings in box
06635             UnHighLightBox( ghSquadBox );
06636 
06637             // update based on current squad
06638             HandleShadingOfLinesForSquadMenu( );
06639       }
06640       else if( ( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) || ( fShowSquadMenu == FALSE ) ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
06641       {
06642             // destroy 
06643             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghSquadBox ); iCounter++ )
06644             {
06645                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSquadMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
06646             }
06647 
06648             fShowSquadMenu = FALSE;
06649 
06650             // remove squad box
06651             RemoveBox(ghSquadBox);
06652             ghSquadBox = -1;
06653 
06654             RestorePopUpBoxes( );
06655 
06656             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06657             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty= TRUE;
06658             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06659             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06660             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
06661 
06662             // not created
06663             fCreated = FALSE;
06664             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06665 
06666             if ( fShowAssignmentMenu )
06667             {
06668                   // remove highlight on the parent menu
06669                   UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
06670             }
06671       }
06672 }
06673 
06674 
06675 
06676 void AssignmentMenuMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06677 {
06678       // mvt callback handler for assignment region
06679       INT32 iValue = -1;
06680       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
06681 
06682       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06683 
06684 
06685       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
06686 
06687       if( HandleAssignmentExpansionAndHighLightForAssignMenu( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
06688       {
06689             return;
06690       }
06691 
06692       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
06693       {
06694             // is the line shaded?..if so, don't highlight
06695             if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
06696             {
06697                   if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghEpcBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
06698                   {
06699                         HighLightBoxLine( ghEpcBox, iValue );
06700                   }
06701             }
06702             else
06703             {
06704                   if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghAssignmentBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
06705                   {
06706                         HighLightBoxLine( ghAssignmentBox, iValue );
06707                   }
06708             }
06709       }
06710       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06711       {
06712             if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
06713             {
06714                   // unhighlight all strings in box
06715                   UnHighLightBox( ghEpcBox );
06716             }
06717             else
06718             {
06719                   // unhighlight all strings in box
06720                   UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
06721             }
06722       }
06723 }
06724 
06725 
06726 void RemoveMercMenuMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06727 {
06728       // mvt callback handler for assignment region
06729       INT32 iValue = -1;
06730       
06731       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06732 
06733       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
06734       {
06735             // highlight string
06736 
06737             // get the string line handle
06738             // is the line shaded?..if so, don't highlight
06739             if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghRemoveMercAssignBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
06740             {
06741                   HighLightBoxLine( ghRemoveMercAssignBox, iValue );
06742             }
06743       }
06744       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06745       {
06746             // unhighlight all strings in box
06747             UnHighLightBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
06748       }
06749 }
06750 
06751 
06752 void ContractMenuMvtCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06753 {
06754       // mvt callback handler for Contract region
06755       INT32 iValue = -1;
06756       
06757       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06758 
06759       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
06760       {
06761             // highlight string
06762 
06763             if( iValue != CONTRACT_MENU_CURRENT_FUNDS )
06764             {
06765                   if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghContractBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
06766                   {
06767                         // get the string line handle
06768                         HighLightBoxLine( ghContractBox, iValue );
06769                   }
06770             }
06771       }
06772       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06773       {
06774             // unhighlight all strings in box
06775             UnHighLightBox( ghContractBox );
06776       }
06777 }
06778 
06779 
06780 
06781 void SquadMenuMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06782 {
06783       // mvt callback handler for assignment region
06784       INT32 iValue = -1;
06785       
06786       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06787 
06788       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
06789       {
06790             // highlight string
06791 
06792             if( iValue != SQUAD_MENU_CANCEL )
06793             {
06794                   if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghSquadBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
06795                   {
06796                         // get the string line handle
06797                         HighLightBoxLine( ghSquadBox, iValue );
06798                   }
06799             }
06800             else
06801             {
06802                   // highlight cancel line
06803              HighLightBoxLine( ghSquadBox, GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghSquadBox ) - 1 );
06804             }
06805       }
06806       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06807       {
06808             // unhighlight all strings in box
06809             UnHighLightBox( ghSquadBox );
06810 
06811             // update based on current squad
06812             HandleShadingOfLinesForSquadMenu( );
06813       }
06814 }
06815 
06816 
06817 void RemoveMercMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06818 {
06819       // btn callback handler for contract region
06820       INT32 iValue = -1;
06821       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier = NULL;
06822 
06823 
06824       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
06825 
06826       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06827 
06828       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
06829       {
06830             switch( iValue )
06831             {
06832               case( REMOVE_MERC_CANCEL ):
06833 
06834                         // stop showing menus
06835                         fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
06836                         fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
06837 
06838                         // reset characters
06839                         bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
06840                         bSelectedContractChar = -1;
06841                         giAssignHighLine = -1;
06842 
06843                         // dirty regions
06844                         fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
06845                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06846                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06847                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
06848 
06849                         
06850                         // stop contratc glow if we are
06851                         fGlowContractRegion = FALSE;
06852                         giContractHighLine = -1;
06853 
06854                         break;
06855                   case( REMOVE_MERC ):
06856                         StrategicRemoveMerc( pSoldier );
06857 
06858                         // dirty region
06859                         fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
06860                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06861                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06862                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
06863 
06864                         // stop contratc glow if we are
06865                         fGlowContractRegion = FALSE;
06866                         giContractHighLine = -1;
06867 
06868                         // reset selected characters
06869                         bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
06870                         bSelectedContractChar = -1;
06871                         giAssignHighLine = -1;
06872 
06873                         // stop showing menus
06874                         fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
06875                         fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
06876 
06877                         //Def: 10/13/99:  When a merc is either dead or a POW, the Remove Merc popup comes up instead of the 
06878                         // Assign menu popup.  When the the user removes the merc, we need to make sure the assignment menu
06879                         //doesnt come up ( because the both assign menu and remove menu flags are needed for the remove pop up to appear
06880                         //dont ask why?!! )
06881                         fShownContractMenu = FALSE;
06882                         fShownAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
06883                         fShowRemoveMenu = FALSE;
06884 
06885                         break;
06886             }
06887       }
06888 }
06889 
06890 void BeginRemoveMercFromContract( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06891 {
06892       // This function will setup the quote, then start dialogue beginning the actual leave sequence
06893       if( ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
06894       {
06895             if( ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC ) || ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__NPC ) )
06896             {
06897                   HandleImportantMercQuote( pSoldier,  QUOTE_RESPONSE_TO_MIGUEL_SLASH_QUOTE_MERC_OR_RPC_LETGO );
06898 
06899                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_LOCK_INTERFACE,0 ,MAP_SCREEN ,0 ,0 ,0 );
06900                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_CONTRACT_ENDING, 1,0 );
06901 
06902             }
06903             else
06904             // quote is different if he's fired in less than 48 hours
06905             if( ( GetWorldTotalMin() - pSoldier->uiTimeOfLastContractUpdate ) < 60 * 48 )
06906             {
06907                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_LOCK_INTERFACE,1 ,MAP_SCREEN ,0 ,0 ,0 );
06908                   if( ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC ) )
06909                   {
06910                         // Only do this if they want to renew.....
06911                         if ( WillMercRenew( pSoldier, FALSE ) )
06912                         {
06913                               HandleImportantMercQuote( pSoldier, QUOTE_DEPART_COMMET_CONTRACT_NOT_RENEWED_OR_TERMINATED_UNDER_48 );
06914                         }
06915                   }
06916 
06917                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_LOCK_INTERFACE,0 ,MAP_SCREEN ,0 ,0 ,0 );
06918                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_CONTRACT_ENDING, 1,0 );
06919 
06920             }
06921             else
06922             {
06923                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_LOCK_INTERFACE,1 ,MAP_SCREEN ,0 ,0 ,0 );
06924                   if( ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC ) )
06925                   {
06926                         // Only do this if they want to renew.....
06927                         if ( WillMercRenew( pSoldier, FALSE ) )
06928                         {
06929                               HandleImportantMercQuote( pSoldier,  QUOTE_DEPARTING_COMMENT_CONTRACT_NOT_RENEWED_OR_48_OR_MORE );
06930                         }
06931                   }
06932                   else if( ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC ) || ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__NPC ) )
06933                   {
06934                         HandleImportantMercQuote( pSoldier,  QUOTE_RESPONSE_TO_MIGUEL_SLASH_QUOTE_MERC_OR_RPC_LETGO );
06935                   }
06936 
06937                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_LOCK_INTERFACE,0 ,MAP_SCREEN ,0 ,0 ,0 );
06938                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_CONTRACT_ENDING, 1,0 );
06939             }
06940 
06941             if( ( GetWorldTotalMin() - pSoldier->uiTimeOfLastContractUpdate ) < 60 * 3 )
06942             {
06943                   // this will cause him give us lame excuses for a while until he gets over it
06944                   // 3-6 days (but the first 1-2 days of that are spent "returning" home)
06945                   gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubDaysOfMoraleHangover = (UINT8) (3 + Random(4));
06946 
06947                   // if it's an AIM merc, word of this gets back to AIM...  Bad rep.
06948                   if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
06949                   {
06950                         ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_EARLY_FIRING);
06951                   }
06952             }
06953 
06954       }
06955 }
06956 
06957 
06958 void MercDismissConfirmCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
06959 {
06960   if ( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
06961   {
06962         // Setup history code
06963         gpDismissSoldier->ubLeaveHistoryCode = HISTORY_MERC_FIRED;
06964 
06965         BeginRemoveMercFromContract( gpDismissSoldier );
06966   }
06967 }
06968 
06969 
06970 void ContractMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06971 {
06972       // btn callback handler for contract region
06973       INT32 iValue = -1;
06974       BOOLEAN fOkToClose = FALSE;
06975       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier = NULL;
06976 
06977 
06978       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
06979       {
06980             pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
06981       }
06982       else
06983       {
06984             // can't renew contracts from tactical!
06985       }
06986 
06987       Assert( pSoldier && pSoldier->bActive );
06988 
06989 
06990       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06991 
06992       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
06993       {
06994             fOkToClose = TRUE;
06995       }
06996 
06997       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
06998       {
06999             if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghContractBox, iValue ) == TRUE )
07000             {
07001                   // not valid
07002                   return;
07003             }
07004 
07005 
07006             if( iValue == CONTRACT_MENU_CANCEL )
07007             {
07008                   // reset contract character and contract highlight line
07009                   giContractHighLine =-1;
07010                   bSelectedContractChar = -1;
07011                   fGlowContractRegion = FALSE;
07012 
07013                   fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
07014                   // dirty region
07015                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07016                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07017                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
07018                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07019 
07020                   if ( gfInContractMenuFromRenewSequence )
07021                   {
07022                         BeginRemoveMercFromContract( pSoldier );
07023                   }
07024                   return;
07025             }
07026 
07027             // else handle based on contract
07028 
07029             switch( iValue )
07030             {
07031               case( CONTRACT_MENU_DAY ):
07032                         MercContractHandling( pSoldier, CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_DAY );
07033                         PostContractMessage( pSoldier, CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_DAY );
07034                         fOkToClose = TRUE;
07035                   break;
07036                   case( CONTRACT_MENU_WEEK ):
07037                         MercContractHandling( pSoldier, CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_WEEK );
07038                         PostContractMessage( pSoldier, CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_WEEK );
07039                         fOkToClose = TRUE;
07040                   break;
07041                   case( CONTRACT_MENU_TWO_WEEKS ):
07042                         MercContractHandling( pSoldier, CONTRACT_EXTEND_2_WEEK );
07043                         PostContractMessage( pSoldier, CONTRACT_EXTEND_2_WEEK );
07044                         fOkToClose = TRUE;
07045                   break;
07046 
07047                   case( CONTRACT_MENU_TERMINATE ):
07048         gpDismissSoldier = pSoldier;
07049 
07050         // If in the renewal sequence.. do right away...
07051         // else put up requester.
07052                   if ( gfInContractMenuFromRenewSequence )
07053         {
07054           MercDismissConfirmCallBack( MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES );
07055         }
07056         else
07057         {
07058                     DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)gzLateLocalizedString[ 48 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, MercDismissConfirmCallBack );
07059         }
07060 
07061         fOkToClose = TRUE;
07062 
07063                   break;
07064             }
07065 
07066             pProcessingSoldier = NULL;
07067             fProcessingAMerc = FALSE;
07068       }
07069 
07070 
07071       if( fOkToClose == TRUE )
07072       {
07073             // reset contract character and contract highlight line
07074             giContractHighLine =-1;
07075             bSelectedContractChar = -1;
07076             fGlowContractRegion = FALSE;
07077             fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
07078 
07079         // dirty region
07080             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07081             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07082             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
07083         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07084       }
07085 
07086 
07087       return;
07088 }
07089 
07090 
07091 
07092 void TrainingMenuMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07093 {
07094       // mvt callback handler for assignment region
07095       INT32 iValue = -1;
07096       
07097       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07098 
07099       if( HandleAssignmentExpansionAndHighLightForTrainingMenu( ) == TRUE )
07100       {
07101             return;
07102       }
07103 
07104       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
07105       {
07106             // highlight string
07107 
07108             // do not highlight current balance
07109             if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghTrainingBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
07110             {
07111               // get the string line handle
07112               HighLightBoxLine( ghTrainingBox, iValue );
07113             }
07114       }
07115       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
07116       {
07117             // unhighlight all strings in box
07118             UnHighLightBox( ghTrainingBox );
07119       }
07120 }
07121 
07122 
07123 
07124 void AttributeMenuMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07125 {
07126       // mvt callback handler for assignment region
07127       INT32 iValue = -1;
07128       
07129       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07130 
07131       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
07132       {
07133             // highlight string
07134             if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghAttributeBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
07135             {
07136                   // get the string line handle
07137                   HighLightBoxLine( ghAttributeBox, iValue );
07138             }
07139       }
07140       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
07141       {
07142             // unhighlight all strings in box
07143             UnHighLightBox( ghAttributeBox );
07144       }
07145 }
07146 
07147 
07148 void SquadMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07149 {
07150       // btn callback handler for assignment region
07151       INT32 iValue = -1;
07152       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier = NULL;
07153       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
07154       INT8  bCanJoinSquad;
07155 /* ARM: Squad menu is now disabled for anyone between sectors
07156       UINT8 ubNextX, ubNextY, ubPrevX, ubPrevY;
07157       UINT32 uiTraverseTime, uiArriveTime;
07158       INT32 iOldSquadValue = -1;
07159       BOOLEAN fCharacterWasBetweenSectors = FALSE;
07160 */
07161 
07162 
07163       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
07164 
07165       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07166 
07167       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
07168       {
07169             if( iValue == SQUAD_MENU_CANCEL )
07170             {
07171                   // stop displaying, leave
07172                   fShowSquadMenu = FALSE;
07173                   
07174                   // unhighlight the assignment box
07175                   UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
07176 
07177                   // dirty region
07178                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07179                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07180                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
07181                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07182 
07183                   return;
07184             }
07185 
07186             bCanJoinSquad =  CanCharacterSquad( pSoldier, ( INT8 )iValue );
07187             // can the character join this squad?  (If already in it, accept that as a legal choice and exit menu)
07188             if ( ( bCanJoinSquad == CHARACTER_CAN_JOIN_SQUAD ) ||
07189                          ( bCanJoinSquad == CHARACTER_CANT_JOIN_SQUAD_ALREADY_IN_IT ) )
07190             {
07191                   if ( bCanJoinSquad == CHARACTER_CAN_JOIN_SQUAD )
07192                   {
07193                         // able to add, do it
07194 
07195 /* ARM: Squad menu is now disabled for anyone between sectors
07196                         // old squad character was in
07197                         iOldSquadValue = SquadCharacterIsIn( pSoldier );
07198 
07199                         // grab if char was between sectors
07200                         fCharacterWasBetweenSectors = pSoldier -> fBetweenSectors;
07201 
07202                         if( fCharacterWasBetweenSectors )
07203                         {
07204                               if( pSoldier -> bAssignment == VEHICLE )
07205                               {
07206                                     if( GetNumberInVehicle( pSoldier -> iVehicleId ) == 1 )
07207                                     {
07208                                           // can't change, go away
07209                                           return;
07210                                     }
07211                               }
07212                         }
07213 
07214                         if( pSoldier -> ubGroupID )
07215                         {
07216                               GetGroupPosition(&ubNextX, &ubNextY, &ubPrevX, &ubPrevY, &uiTraverseTime, &uiArriveTime, pSoldier -> ubGroupID );
07217                         }
07218 */
07219                         pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
07220 
07221                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
07222                         {
07223                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
07224                         }
07225 
07226                         AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, ( INT8 )iValue );
07227 
07228         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
07229                         {
07230           SetSoldierExitVehicleInsertionData( pSoldier, pSoldier->iVehicleId );
07231                         }
07232 
07233                         //Clear any desired squad assignments -- seeing the player has physically changed it!
07234                         pSoldier -> ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge = 0;
07235                         pSoldier -> ubDesiredSquadAssignment = NO_ASSIGNMENT;
07236                         
07237 
07238 /* ARM: Squad menu is now disabled for anyone between sectors
07239                         if( fCharacterWasBetweenSectors )
07240                         {
07241                               // grab location of old squad and set this value for new squad
07242                               if( iOldSquadValue != -1 )
07243                               {
07244                                     GetSquadPosition( &ubNextX, &ubNextY, &ubPrevX, &ubPrevY, &uiTraverseTime, &uiArriveTime,  ( UINT8 )iOldSquadValue );
07245                               }
07246 
07247                               SetGroupPosition( ubNextX, ubNextY, ubPrevX, ubPrevY, uiTraverseTime, uiArriveTime, pSoldier -> ubGroupID );
07248                         }
07249 */
07250 
07251                         MakeSoldiersTacticalAnimationReflectAssignment( pSoldier );
07252                   }
07253 
07254                   // stop displaying, leave
07255                   fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07256                   giAssignHighLine = -1;
07257 
07258                   // dirty region
07259                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07260                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07261                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
07262                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07263             }
07264             else
07265             {
07266                   BOOLEAN fDisplayError = TRUE;
07267 
07268                   switch( bCanJoinSquad )
07269                   {
07270                         case CHARACTER_CANT_JOIN_SQUAD_SQUAD_MOVING:
07271                               swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 36 ], pSoldier->name, pLongAssignmentStrings[ iValue ] );
07272                               break;
07273                         case CHARACTER_CANT_JOIN_SQUAD_VEHICLE:
07274                               swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 37 ], pSoldier->name );
07275                               break;
07276                         case CHARACTER_CANT_JOIN_SQUAD_TOO_FAR:
07277                               swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 20 ], pSoldier->name, pLongAssignmentStrings[ iValue ] );
07278                               break;
07279                         case CHARACTER_CANT_JOIN_SQUAD_FULL:
07280                               swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 19 ], pSoldier->name, pLongAssignmentStrings[ iValue ] );
07281                               break;
07282                         default:
07283                               // generic "you can't join this squad" msg
07284                               swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 38 ], pSoldier->name, pLongAssignmentStrings[ iValue ] );
07285                               break;
07286                   }
07287 
07288                   if ( fDisplayError )
07289                   {
07290                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
07291                   }
07292 
07293             }
07294 
07295             // set this assignment for the list too
07296             SetAssignmentForList( ( INT8 ) iValue, 0 );
07297       }
07298 
07299       return;
07300 }
07301 
07302 
07303 
07304 
07305 void TrainingMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07306 {
07307       // btn callback handler for assignment region
07308       INT32 iValue = -1;
07309       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier = NULL;
07310       INT8 bTownId;
07311       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
07312       CHAR16 sStringA[ 128 ];
07313 
07314 
07315       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
07316 
07317       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07318 
07319       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN ) || ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN ) )
07320       {
07321             if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) && !fShowMapInventoryPool )
07322             {
07323                   UnMarkButtonDirty( giMapBorderButtons[ MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN ] );
07324             }
07325       }
07326 
07327       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
07328       {
07329             if( fShowAttributeMenu )
07330             {
07331                   // cancel attribute submenu
07332                   fShowAttributeMenu = FALSE;
07333                   // rerender tactical stuff
07334                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07335 
07336                   return;
07337             }
07338 
07339             switch( iValue )
07340             {
07341                   case( TRAIN_MENU_SELF):
07342 
07343                         // practise in stat
07344                         gbTrainingMode = TRAIN_SELF;
07345 
07346                         // show menu
07347                         fShowAttributeMenu = TRUE;
07348                         DetermineBoxPositions( );
07349 
07350                   break;
07351                   case( TRAIN_MENU_TOWN):
07352                         if( BasicCanCharacterTrainMilitia(pSoldier) ) 
07353                         {
07354                               bTownId = GetTownIdForSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY );
07355 
07356                               // if it's a town sector (the following 2 errors can't happen at non-town SAM sites)
07357                               if( bTownId != BLANK_SECTOR )
07358                               {
07359                                     // can we keep militia in this town?
07360                                     if( MilitiaTrainingAllowedInSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ ) == FALSE )
07361                                     {
07362                                           swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 31 ], pTownNames[ bTownId ] );
07363                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
07364                                           break;
07365                                     }
07366 
07367                                     // is the current loyalty high enough to train some?
07368                                     if( DoesSectorMercIsInHaveSufficientLoyaltyToTrainMilitia( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
07369                                     {
07370                                           DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( zMarksMapScreenText[ 20 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
07371                                           break;
07372                                     }
07373                               }
07374 
07375                               if( IsMilitiaTrainableFromSoldiersSectorMaxed( pSoldier ) )
07376                               {
07377                                     if( bTownId == BLANK_SECTOR )
07378                                     {
07379                                           // SAM site
07380                                           GetShortSectorString(  pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, sStringA );
07381                                           swprintf( sString, zMarksMapScreenText[ 21 ], sStringA );
07382                                     }
07383                                     else
07384                                     {
07385                                           // town
07386                                           swprintf( sString, zMarksMapScreenText[ 21 ], pTownNames[ bTownId ] );
07387                                     }
07388 
07389                                     DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
07390                                     break;
07391                               }
07392 
07393                               if ( CountMilitiaTrainersInSoldiersSector( pSoldier ) >= gGameExternalOptions.ubMaxMilitiaTrainersPerSector )
07394                               {
07395                                     swprintf( sString, gzLateLocalizedString[ 47 ], gGameExternalOptions.ubMaxMilitiaTrainersPerSector );
07396                                     DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
07397                                     break;
07398                               }
07399 
07400 
07401                               // PASSED ALL THE TESTS - ALLOW SOLDIER TO TRAIN MILITIA HERE
07402 
07403                               pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
07404                               
07405                               if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != TRAIN_TOWN ) )
07406                               {
07407                                     SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
07408                               }
07409 
07410                               MakeSoldiersTacticalAnimationReflectAssignment( pSoldier );
07411 
07412                               // stop showing menu
07413                           fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07414                               giAssignHighLine = -1;
07415 
07416                               // remove from squad
07417 
07418                               if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
07419                               {
07420                                     TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
07421                               }
07422                               RemoveCharacterFromSquads(  pSoldier );
07423                               
07424                               ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_TOWN );
07425 
07426                               // assign to a movement group
07427                               AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
07428                               if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY ) ].fMilitiaTrainingPaid == FALSE )
07429                               {
07430                                     // show a message to confirm player wants to charge cost
07431                                     HandleInterfaceMessageForCostOfTrainingMilitia( pSoldier );
07432                               }
07433                               else
07434                               {
07435                                     SetAssignmentForList( TRAIN_TOWN, 0 );
07436                               }
07437                               
07438                               gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07439 
07440                         }
07441                   break;
07442                   case( TRAIN_MENU_TEAMMATES):
07443 
07444                         if( CanCharacterTrainTeammates( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
07445                         {
07446                               // train teammates
07447                               gbTrainingMode = TRAIN_TEAMMATE;
07448 
07449                               // show menu
07450                               fShowAttributeMenu = TRUE;
07451                               DetermineBoxPositions( );
07452                         }
07453                   break;
07454                   case( TRAIN_MENU_TRAIN_BY_OTHER ):
07455 
07456                         if( CanCharacterBeTrainedByOther( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
07457                         {
07458                               // train teammates
07459                               gbTrainingMode = TRAIN_BY_OTHER;
07460 
07461                               // show menu
07462                               fShowAttributeMenu = TRUE;
07463                               DetermineBoxPositions( );
07464                         }
07465                   break;
07466                   case( TRAIN_MENU_CANCEL ):
07467                         // stop showing menu
07468                    fShowTrainingMenu = FALSE;
07469                         
07470                    // unhighlight the assignment box
07471                    UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
07472 
07473                    // reset list
07474                    ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( );
07475                    gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07476 
07477                   break;
07478             }
07479 
07480             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07481             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07482       }
07483       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
07484       {
07485             if( fShowAttributeMenu )
07486             {
07487                   // cancel attribute submenu
07488                   fShowAttributeMenu = FALSE;
07489                   // rerender tactical stuff
07490                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07491 
07492                   return;
07493             }
07494       }
07495 }
07496 
07497 
07498 void AttributesMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07499 {
07500       // btn callback handler for assignment region
07501       INT32 iValue = -1;
07502       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier = NULL;
07503 
07504 
07505       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
07506 
07507       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07508 
07509 
07510       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
07511       {
07512             if( iValue == ATTRIB_MENU_CANCEL )
07513             {
07514                   // cancel, leave
07515 
07516                   // stop showing menu
07517                   fShowAttributeMenu = FALSE;
07518 
07519                   // unhighlight the training box
07520                   UnHighLightBox( ghTrainingBox );
07521             }
07522             else if( CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, ( INT8 )( iValue ), ( BOOLEAN )( ( gbTrainingMode == TRAIN_SELF ) || ( gbTrainingMode == TRAIN_BY_OTHER ) ), ( BOOLEAN )( gbTrainingMode == TRAIN_TEAMMATE ) ) ) 
07523             {
07524                   pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
07525 
07526                   if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != gbTrainingMode ) )
07527                   {
07528                         SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
07529                   }
07530 
07531                   // set stat to train
07532                   pSoldier -> bTrainStat = ( INT8 )iValue;
07533 
07534                   MakeSoldiersTacticalAnimationReflectAssignment( pSoldier );
07535 
07536                   // stop showing ALL menus
07537                   fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07538                   giAssignHighLine = -1;
07539 
07540                   // remove from squad/vehicle
07541                   if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
07542                   {
07543                         TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
07544                   }
07545                   RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
07546 
07547                   // train stat
07548                   ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, gbTrainingMode );
07549 
07550                   // assign to a movement group
07551                   AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
07552 
07553                   // set assignment for group
07554                   SetAssignmentForList( gbTrainingMode, ( INT8 )iValue );
07555             }
07556 
07557             // rerender tactical stuff
07558             gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07559 
07560             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07561             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07562       }
07563 
07564 };
07565 
07566 void AssignmentMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07567 {
07568       // btn callback handler for assignment region
07569       INT32 iValue = -1;
07570       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
07571 
07572       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier = NULL;
07573 
07574 
07575       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
07576 
07577       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07578 
07579 
07580       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
07581       {
07582 
07583             if( ( fShowAttributeMenu )||( fShowTrainingMenu ) || ( fShowRepairMenu ) || ( fShowVehicleMenu ) ||( fShowSquadMenu ) )
07584             {
07585                   return;
07586             }
07587 
07588             UnHighLightBox( ghAssignmentBox );
07589 
07590             if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
07591             {
07592                   switch( iValue )
07593                   {
07594                         case( EPC_MENU_ON_DUTY ):
07595                               if( CanCharacterOnDuty( pSoldier ) )
07596                                     {
07597                                           // put character on a team
07598                                           fShowSquadMenu = TRUE;
07599                                           fShowTrainingMenu = FALSE;
07600                                           fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
07601                                           fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07602                                           fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07603 
07604                                     }
07605                         break;
07606                         case( EPC_MENU_PATIENT ):
07607                                     // can character doctor?
07608                               if( CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier ) )
07609                               {
07610 
07611 /* Assignment distance limits removed.  Sep/11/98.  ARM
07612                                     if( IsSoldierCloseEnoughToADoctor( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
07613                                     {
07614                                           return;
07615                                     }
07616 */
07617 
07618                                     pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
07619 
07620                                     if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != PATIENT ) )
07621                                     {
07622                                           SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
07623                                     }
07624 
07625                                     // stop showing menu
07626                                     fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07627                                     giAssignHighLine = -1;
07628 
07629                                     MakeSoldiersTacticalAnimationReflectAssignment( pSoldier );
07630 
07631                                     // set dirty flag
07632                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07633                                     fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07634 
07635                                     // remove from squad
07636 
07637                                     if ( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
07638                                     {
07639                                           TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
07640                                     }
07641                                     RemoveCharacterFromSquads(  pSoldier );
07642                                     ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, PATIENT );
07643                                     AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
07644 
07645                                     // set assignment for group
07646                                     SetAssignmentForList( ( INT8 ) PATIENT, 0 );
07647                               }
07648                         break;
07649                         
07650                         case( EPC_MENU_VEHICLE ):
07651                               if ( CanCharacterVehicle( pSoldier ) )
07652                               {
07653                                     if( DisplayVehicleMenu( pSoldier ) )
07654                                     {
07655                                           fShowVehicleMenu = TRUE;
07656                                           ShowBox( ghVehicleBox );
07657                                     }
07658                                     else
07659                                     {
07660                                           fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
07661                                     }
07662                               }
07663                         break;
07664 
07665                         case( EPC_MENU_REMOVE ):
07666 
07667                               fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07668           UnEscortEPC( pSoldier );
07669                         break;
07670 
07671                         case( EPC_MENU_CANCEL ):
07672                               fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07673                               giAssignHighLine = -1;
07674 
07675                               // set dirty flag
07676                               fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07677                               fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07678 
07679                               // reset list of characters
07680                               ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( );
07681                         break;
07682                   }
07683             }
07684             else
07685             {
07686                   switch( iValue )
07687                   {
07688                         case( ASSIGN_MENU_ON_DUTY ):
07689                                     if( CanCharacterOnDuty( pSoldier ) )
07690                                     {
07691                                           // put character on a team
07692                                           fShowSquadMenu = TRUE;
07693                                           fShowTrainingMenu = FALSE;
07694                                           fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
07695                                           fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07696                                           fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07697                                           fShowRepairMenu = FALSE;
07698                                     }
07699                         break;
07700                         case( ASSIGN_MENU_DOCTOR ):
07701 
07702                               // can character doctor?
07703                               if( CanCharacterDoctor( pSoldier ) )
07704                               {
07705                                     // stop showing menu
07706                                     fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07707                                     giAssignHighLine = -1;
07708 
07709                                     
07710                                     pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
07711 
07712                                     if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != DOCTOR ) )
07713                                     {
07714                                           SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
07715                                     }
07716                                     
07717                                     // remove from squad
07718 
07719                                     if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
07720                                     {
07721                                           TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
07722                                     }
07723                                     RemoveCharacterFromSquads(  pSoldier );
07724 
07725                                     ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, DOCTOR );
07726 
07727                                     MakeSureMedKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
07728                                     AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
07729 
07730                                     MakeSoldiersTacticalAnimationReflectAssignment( pSoldier );
07731 
07732                                     // set dirty flag
07733                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07734                                     fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07735 
07736 
07737                                     // set assignment for group
07738                                     SetAssignmentForList( ( INT8 ) DOCTOR, 0 );
07739                               }
07740                               else if( CanCharacterDoctorButDoesntHaveMedKit( pSoldier ) )
07741                               {
07742                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07743                                     fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07744                                     swprintf( sString, zMarksMapScreenText[ 19 ], pSoldier->name );
07745 
07746                                     DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString , MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
07747                               }
07748 
07749                         break;
07750                         case( ASSIGN_MENU_PATIENT ):
07751 
07752                               // can character patient?
07753                               if( CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier ) )
07754                               {
07755                               
07756 /* Assignment distance limits removed.  Sep/11/98.  ARM
07757                                     if( IsSoldierCloseEnoughToADoctor( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
07758                                     {
07759                                           return;
07760                                     }
07761 */
07762 
07763                                     pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
07764 
07765                                     if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != PATIENT ) )
07766                                     {
07767                                           SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
07768                                     }
07769 
07770                                     MakeSoldiersTacticalAnimationReflectAssignment( pSoldier );
07771 
07772                                     // stop showing menu
07773                                     fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07774                                     giAssignHighLine = -1;
07775 
07776                                     // set dirty flag
07777                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07778                                     fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07779 
07780                                     // remove from squad
07781 
07782                                     if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
07783                                     {
07784                                           TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
07785                                     }
07786                                     RemoveCharacterFromSquads(  pSoldier );
07787                                     ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, PATIENT );
07788 
07789                                     AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
07790 
07791                                     // set assignment for group
07792                                     SetAssignmentForList( ( INT8 ) PATIENT, 0 );
07793 
07794                               }
07795                         break;
07796                         
07797                         case( ASSIGN_MENU_VEHICLE ):
07798                               if ( CanCharacterVehicle( pSoldier ) )
07799                               {
07800                                     if( DisplayVehicleMenu( pSoldier ) )
07801                                     {
07802                                           fShowVehicleMenu = TRUE;
07803                                           ShowBox( ghVehicleBox );
07804                                     }                                   
07805                                     else
07806                                     {
07807                                           fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
07808                                     }
07809                               }
07810                         break;
07811                         case( ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR ):
07812                               if( CanCharacterRepair( pSoldier ) )
07813                               {
07814 
07815                                     fShowSquadMenu = FALSE;
07816                                     fShowTrainingMenu = FALSE;
07817                                     fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
07818                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07819                                     fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07820                                     
07821                                     pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
07822                                     
07823 
07824                                     if( pSoldier -> bSectorZ ==0 )
07825                                     {
07826                                           fShowRepairMenu = FALSE;
07827 
07828                                           if( DisplayRepairMenu( pSoldier ) )
07829                                           {
07830                                                 fShowRepairMenu = TRUE;
07831                                           }
07832                               
07833                                     }
07834                                     
07835                               }
07836                               else if( CanCharacterRepairButDoesntHaveARepairkit( pSoldier ) )
07837                               {
07838                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07839                                     fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07840                                     swprintf( sString, zMarksMapScreenText[ 18 ], pSoldier->name );
07841 
07842                                     DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString , MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
07843                               }
07844                         break;
07845                         case( ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN ):
07846                               if( CanCharacterPractise( pSoldier ) )
07847                               {
07848                                     fShowTrainingMenu = TRUE;
07849                                     DetermineBoxPositions( );
07850                                     fShowSquadMenu = FALSE;
07851                                     fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
07852                                     fShowRepairMenu = FALSE;
07853 
07854                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07855                                     fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07856                               }
07857                         break;
07858                         case( ASSIGN_MENU_CANCEL ):
07859                               fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
07860                               giAssignHighLine = -1;
07861 
07862                               // set dirty flag
07863                               fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07864                               fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07865 
07866                               // reset list of characters
07867                               ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( );
07868                         break;
07869                   }
07870             }
07871             gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07872 
07873       }
07874       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
07875       {
07876             if( ( fShowAttributeMenu )||( fShowTrainingMenu ) || ( fShowRepairMenu ) || ( fShowVehicleMenu ) ||( fShowSquadMenu ) )
07877             {
07878                   fShowAttributeMenu = FALSE;
07879                   fShowTrainingMenu = FALSE;
07880                   fShowRepairMenu = FALSE;
07881                   fShowVehicleMenu = FALSE;
07882                   fShowSquadMenu = FALSE;
07883 
07884                   // rerender tactical stuff
07885                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07886 
07887                   // set dirty flag
07888           fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07889                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07890 
07891                   return;
07892             }
07893       }
07894 }
07895 
07896 
07897 
07898 void RestorePopUpBoxes( void )
07899 {
07900       ContractPosition.iX = OrigContractPosition.iX;
07901   AttributePosition.iX = OrigAttributePosition.iX;
07902   SquadPosition.iX = OrigSquadPosition.iX ;
07903   AssignmentPosition.iX = OrigAssignmentPosition.iX ;
07904   TrainPosition.iX = OrigTrainPosition.iX;
07905   VehiclePosition.iX = OrigVehiclePosition.iX;
07906 
07907       return;
07908 }
07909 
07910 
07911 void CreateSquadBox( void )
07912 {
07913       // will create a pop up box for squad selection
07914       SGPPoint pPoint;
07915       SGPRect pDimensions;
07916   UINT32 hStringHandle;
07917   UINT32 uiCounter;
07918       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
07919       UINT32 uiMaxSquad;
07920       
07921 
07922  // create basic box
07923  CreatePopUpBox(&ghSquadBox, SquadDimensions, SquadPosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
07924  
07925  // which buffer will box render to
07926  SetBoxBuffer(ghSquadBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
07927 
07928  // border type?
07929  SetBorderType(ghSquadBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
07930 
07931  // background texture
07932  SetBackGroundSurface(ghSquadBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
07933 
07934  // margin sizes
07935  SetMargins( ghSquadBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
07936 
07937  // space between lines
07938  SetLineSpace(ghSquadBox, 2);
07939 
07940  // set current box to this one
07941  SetCurrentBox( ghSquadBox );
07942 
07943 
07944  uiMaxSquad = GetLastSquadListedInSquadMenu();
07945 
07946  // add strings for box
07947  for(uiCounter=0; uiCounter <= uiMaxSquad; uiCounter++)
07948  {
07949        // get info about current squad and put in  string 
07950        swprintf( sString, L"%s ( %d/%d )", pSquadMenuStrings[uiCounter], NumberOfPeopleInSquad( ( INT8 )uiCounter ), NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD );
07951        AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString ); 
07952 
07953        // make sure it is unhighlighted
07954        UnHighLightLine(hStringHandle);
07955  }
07956 
07957  // add cancel line
07958  AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, pSquadMenuStrings[ NUMBER_OF_SQUADS ]); 
07959 
07960  // set font type
07961  SetBoxFont(ghSquadBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
07962 
07963  // set highlight color
07964  SetBoxHighLight(ghSquadBox, FONT_WHITE);
07965 
07966  // unhighlighted color
07967  SetBoxForeground(ghSquadBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
07968 
07969  // the secondary shade color
07970  SetBoxSecondaryShade( ghSquadBox, FONT_YELLOW );
07971 
07972  // background color
07973  SetBoxBackground(ghSquadBox, FONT_BLACK);
07974 
07975  // shaded color..for darkened text
07976  SetBoxShade( ghSquadBox, FONT_GRAY7 );
07977 
07978  // resize box to text
07979  ResizeBoxToText( ghSquadBox );
07980 
07981  DetermineBoxPositions( );
07982 
07983  GetBoxPosition( ghSquadBox, &pPoint);
07984  GetBoxSize( ghSquadBox, &pDimensions );
07985  
07986  if( giBoxY + pDimensions.iBottom > 479 )
07987  {
07988             pPoint.iY = SquadPosition.iY = 479 - pDimensions.iBottom;
07989       }
07990 
07991       SetBoxPosition( ghSquadBox, pPoint );
07992 }
07993 
07994 void CreateEPCBox( void )
07995 {
07996       // will create a pop up box for squad selection
07997       SGPPoint pPoint;
07998       SGPRect pDimensions;
07999   UINT32 hStringHandle;
08000   INT32 iCount;
08001       
08002        // create basic box
08003        CreatePopUpBox(&ghEpcBox, SquadDimensions, AssignmentPosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CENTER_TEXT ));
08004 
08005        // which buffer will box render to
08006        SetBoxBuffer(ghEpcBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
08007 
08008        // border type?
08009        SetBorderType(ghEpcBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08010 
08011        // background texture
08012        SetBackGroundSurface(ghEpcBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
08013 
08014        // margin sizes
08015        SetMargins( ghEpcBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
08016 
08017        // space between lines
08018        SetLineSpace(ghEpcBox, 2);
08019 
08020        // set current box to this one
08021        SetCurrentBox( ghEpcBox );
08022 
08023        for(iCount=0; iCount < MAX_EPC_MENU_STRING_COUNT; iCount++)
08024        {
08025              AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, pEpcMenuStrings[ iCount]); 
08026        }
08027 
08028        // set font type
08029        SetBoxFont(ghEpcBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
08030 
08031        // set highlight color
08032        SetBoxHighLight(ghEpcBox, FONT_WHITE);
08033 
08034        // unhighlighted color
08035        SetBoxForeground(ghEpcBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
08036 
08037        // background color
08038        SetBoxBackground(ghEpcBox, FONT_BLACK);
08039 
08040        // shaded color..for darkened text
08041        SetBoxShade( ghEpcBox, FONT_GRAY7 );
08042 
08043        // resize box to text
08044        ResizeBoxToText( ghEpcBox );
08045 
08046        GetBoxPosition( ghEpcBox, &pPoint);
08047 
08048        GetBoxSize( ghEpcBox, &pDimensions );
08049  
08050        if( giBoxY + pDimensions.iBottom > 479 )
08051        {
08052                   pPoint.iY = AssignmentPosition.iY = 479 - pDimensions.iBottom;
08053        }
08054 
08055             SetBoxPosition( ghEpcBox, pPoint );
08056 }
08057 
08058 
08059 
08060 void HandleShadingOfLinesForSquadMenu( void )
08061 {
08062       // find current squad and set that line the squad box a lighter green
08063       UINT32 uiCounter;
08064       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
08065       UINT32 uiMaxSquad;
08066       INT8 bResult;
08067 
08068 
08069       if ( ( fShowSquadMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghSquadBox == -1 ) )
08070       {
08071             return;
08072       }
08073 
08074 
08075       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
08076 
08077       uiMaxSquad = GetLastSquadListedInSquadMenu();
08078 
08079       for( uiCounter = 0; uiCounter <= uiMaxSquad; uiCounter++ )
08080       {
08081             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
08082             {
08083                   bResult = CanCharacterSquad( pSoldier, (INT8) uiCounter );
08084             }
08085 
08086             // if no soldier, or a reason which doesn't have a good explanatory message
08087             if ( ( pSoldier == NULL ) || ( bResult == CHARACTER_CANT_JOIN_SQUAD ) )
08088             {
08089                   // darken /disable line
08090                   ShadeStringInBox( ghSquadBox, uiCounter );
08091             }
08092             else
08093             {
08094                   if ( bResult == CHARACTER_CAN_JOIN_SQUAD )
08095                   {
08096                         // legal squad, leave it green
08097                         UnShadeStringInBox( ghSquadBox, uiCounter );
08098                         UnSecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghSquadBox, uiCounter );
08099                   }
08100                   else
08101                   {
08102                         // unjoinable squad - yellow
08103                         SecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghSquadBox, uiCounter );
08104                   }
08105             }
08106       }
08107 }
08108 
08109 
08110 
08111 void PostContractMessage( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter, INT32 iContract )
08112 {
08113 
08114       // do nothing
08115       return;
08116 
08117       // send a message stating that offer of contract extension made
08118       //MapScreenMessage(FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Offered to extend %s's contract by another %s.", pCharacter -> name, pContractExtendStrings[ iContract ] );
08119       
08120       return;
08121 }
08122 
08123 void PostTerminateMessage( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
08124 {
08125             
08126       // do nothing
08127       return;
08128       
08129       // send a message stating that termination of contract done
08130       //MapScreenMessage(FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s's contract has been terminated.", pCharacter -> name );
08131       
08132 }
08133 
08134 BOOLEAN DisplayVehicleMenu( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08135 {
08136       BOOLEAN fVehiclePresent=FALSE;
08137       INT32 iCounter=0;
08138       INT32 hStringHandle=0;
08139 
08140       // first, clear pop up box
08141       RemoveBox(ghVehicleBox);
08142       ghVehicleBox = -1;
08143 
08144   CreateVehicleBox();
08145       SetCurrentBox(ghVehicleBox);  
08146 
08147       // run through list of vehicles in sector and add them to pop up box
08148       for ( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ubNumberOfVehicles; iCounter++ )
08149   { 
08150             if ( pVehicleList[iCounter].fValid == TRUE )
08151             {
08152                   if ( IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iCounter ) )
08153                   {
08154                         AddMonoString((UINT32 *)&hStringHandle, pVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ iCounter ].ubVehicleType ]);
08155                         fVehiclePresent = TRUE;
08156                   }
08157             }
08158       }
08159 
08160       // cancel string (borrow the one in the squad menu)
08161       AddMonoString((UINT32 *)&hStringHandle, pSquadMenuStrings[ SQUAD_MENU_CANCEL ]);
08162 
08163   SetBoxFont(ghVehicleBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
08164   SetBoxHighLight(ghVehicleBox, FONT_WHITE);
