08165   SetBoxForeground(ghVehicleBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
08166   SetBoxBackground(ghVehicleBox, FONT_BLACK);
08167       
08168   return fVehiclePresent;
08169 }
08170 
08171 void CreateVehicleBox()
08172 {
08173  CreatePopUpBox(&ghVehicleBox, VehicleDimensions, VehiclePosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CENTER_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
08174  SetBoxBuffer(ghVehicleBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
08175  SetBorderType(ghVehicleBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08176  SetBackGroundSurface(ghVehicleBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
08177  SetMargins( ghVehicleBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
08178  SetLineSpace(ghVehicleBox, 2);
08179 }
08180 
08181 
08182 void CreateRepairBox( void )
08183 {
08184  CreatePopUpBox(&ghRepairBox, RepairDimensions, RepairPosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CENTER_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
08185  SetBoxBuffer(ghRepairBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
08186  SetBorderType(ghRepairBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08187  SetBackGroundSurface(ghRepairBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
08188  SetMargins( ghRepairBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
08189  SetLineSpace(ghRepairBox, 2);
08190 }
08191 
08192 
08193 void CreateContractBox( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
08194 {
08195  UINT32 hStringHandle;
08196  UINT32 uiCounter;
08197  CHAR16 sString[ 50 ];
08198  CHAR16 sDollarString[ 50 ];
08199 
08200  ContractPosition.iX = OrigContractPosition.iX;
08201 
08202  if( giBoxY != 0 )
08203  {
08204        ContractPosition.iX = giBoxY;
08205  }
08206 
08207  CreatePopUpBox(&ghContractBox, ContractDimensions, ContractPosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
08208  SetBoxBuffer(ghContractBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
08209  SetBorderType(ghContractBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08210  SetBackGroundSurface(ghContractBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
08211  SetMargins( ghContractBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
08212  SetLineSpace(ghContractBox, 2);
08213 
08214  // set current box to this one
08215  SetCurrentBox( ghContractBox );
08216 
08217  // not null character?
08218  if( pCharacter != NULL )
08219  {
08220        for(uiCounter=0; uiCounter < MAX_CONTRACT_MENU_STRING_COUNT; uiCounter++)
08221        {
08222              switch( uiCounter )
08223              {
08224                    case( CONTRACT_MENU_CURRENT_FUNDS ):
08225 /*
08226                         // add current balance after title string
08227                          swprintf( sDollarString, L"%d", LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance);
08228                          InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sDollarString );
08229                          InsertDollarSignInToString( sDollarString );
08230                          swprintf( sString, L"%s %s",  pContractStrings[uiCounter], sDollarString );
08231                          AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString);
08232 */
08233                          AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, pContractStrings[uiCounter]);
08234                    break;
08235                    case( CONTRACT_MENU_DAY ):
08236                         
08237                          if( pCharacter -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
08238                          {
08239                                swprintf( sDollarString, L"%d", 0 );
08240                          }
08241                          else
08242                          {
08243                                 swprintf( sDollarString, L"%d", gMercProfiles[ pCharacter -> ubProfile ].sSalary );
08244                          }
08245                          InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sDollarString );
08246                          InsertDollarSignInToString( sDollarString );
08247                          swprintf( sString, L"%s ( %s )",  pContractStrings[uiCounter], sDollarString);
08248                          AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString);
08249                    break;
08250                    case( CONTRACT_MENU_WEEK ):
08251 
08252                          if( pCharacter -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
08253                          {
08254                                swprintf( sDollarString, L"%d", 0 );
08255                          }
08256                          else
08257                          {
08258                                 swprintf( sDollarString, L"%d", gMercProfiles[ pCharacter -> ubProfile ].uiWeeklySalary );
08259                          }
08260 
08261                          InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sDollarString );
08262                          InsertDollarSignInToString( sDollarString );
08263                          swprintf( sString, L"%s ( %s )",  pContractStrings[uiCounter], sDollarString );
08264                          AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString);
08265                    break;
08266                    case( CONTRACT_MENU_TWO_WEEKS ):
08267 
08268                          if( pCharacter -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
08269                          {
08270                                swprintf( sDollarString, L"%d", 0 );
08271                          }
08272                          else
08273                          {
08274                                swprintf( sDollarString, L"%d", gMercProfiles[ pCharacter -> ubProfile ].uiBiWeeklySalary );
08275                          }
08276 
08277                         
08278                          InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sDollarString );
08279                          InsertDollarSignInToString( sDollarString );
08280                          swprintf( sString, L"%s ( %s )",  pContractStrings[uiCounter], sDollarString);
08281                          AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString);
08282                    break;
08283                    default:
08284                          AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, pContractStrings[uiCounter] );
08285                          break;
08286              }
08287              UnHighLightLine(hStringHandle);
08288        }
08289  }
08290 
08291 
08292  SetBoxFont(ghContractBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
08293  SetBoxHighLight(ghContractBox, FONT_WHITE);
08294  SetBoxForeground(ghContractBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
08295  SetBoxBackground(ghContractBox, FONT_BLACK);
08296 
08297  // shaded color..for darkened text
08298  SetBoxShade( ghContractBox, FONT_GRAY7 );
08299  
08300  if( pCharacter != NULL )
08301  {
08302        // now set the color for the current balance value
08303        SetBoxLineForeground( ghContractBox, 0, FONT_YELLOW );
08304  }
08305 
08306  // resize box to text
08307  ResizeBoxToText( ghContractBox );
08308 
08309 }
08310 
08311 void CreateAttributeBox( void )
08312 {
08313  UINT32 hStringHandle;
08314  UINT32 uiCounter;
08315 
08316  // will create attribute pop up menu for mapscreen assignments
08317 
08318 
08319  AttributePosition.iX = OrigAttributePosition.iX;
08320 
08321  if( giBoxY != 0 )
08322  {
08323        AttributePosition.iY = giBoxY;
08324  }
08325 
08326  // update screen assignment positions
08327  UpdateMapScreenAssignmentPositions( );
08328 
08329  // create basic box
08330  CreatePopUpBox(&ghAttributeBox, AttributeDimensions, AttributePosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CENTER_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
08331  
08332  // which buffer will box render to
08333  SetBoxBuffer(ghAttributeBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
08334 
08335  // border type?
08336  SetBorderType(ghAttributeBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08337 
08338  // background texture
08339  SetBackGroundSurface(ghAttributeBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
08340 
08341  // margin sizes
08342  SetMargins( ghAttributeBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
08343 
08344  // space between lines
08345  SetLineSpace(ghAttributeBox, 2);
08346 
08347  // set current box to this one
08348  SetCurrentBox( ghAttributeBox );
08349 
08350 
08351 
08352  // add strings for box
08353  for(uiCounter=0; uiCounter < MAX_ATTRIBUTE_STRING_COUNT; uiCounter++)
08354  {
08355   AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, pAttributeMenuStrings[uiCounter]);
08356   
08357       // make sure it is unhighlighted
08358       UnHighLightLine(hStringHandle);
08359  }
08360 
08361  // set font type
08362  SetBoxFont(ghAttributeBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
08363 
08364  // set highlight color
08365  SetBoxHighLight(ghAttributeBox, FONT_WHITE);
08366 
08367  // unhighlighted color
08368  SetBoxForeground(ghAttributeBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
08369 
08370  // background color
08371  SetBoxBackground(ghAttributeBox, FONT_BLACK);
08372 
08373  // shaded color..for darkened text
08374  SetBoxShade( ghAttributeBox, FONT_GRAY7 );
08375 
08376  // resize box to text
08377  ResizeBoxToText( ghAttributeBox );
08378 
08379 
08380 }
08381 
08382 void CreateTrainingBox( void )
08383 {
08384  UINT32 hStringHandle;
08385  UINT32 uiCounter;
08386 
08387  // will create attribute pop up menu for mapscreen assignments
08388 
08389  TrainPosition.iX = OrigTrainPosition.iX;
08390 
08391  if( giBoxY != 0 )
08392  {
08393        TrainPosition.iY = giBoxY + ( ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN * GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) );
08394  }
08395 
08396  // create basic box
08397  CreatePopUpBox(&ghTrainingBox, TrainDimensions, TrainPosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CENTER_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
08398 
08399  // which buffer will box render to
08400  SetBoxBuffer(ghTrainingBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
08401 
08402  // border type?
08403  SetBorderType(ghTrainingBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08404 
08405  // background texture
08406  SetBackGroundSurface(ghTrainingBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
08407 
08408  // margin sizes
08409  SetMargins(ghTrainingBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
08410 
08411  // space between lines
08412  SetLineSpace(ghTrainingBox, 2);
08413 
08414  // set current box to this one
08415  SetCurrentBox( ghTrainingBox );
08416 
08417 
08418  // add strings for box
08419  for(uiCounter=0; uiCounter < MAX_TRAIN_STRING_COUNT; uiCounter++)
08420  {
08421   AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, pTrainingMenuStrings[uiCounter]);
08422   
08423       // make sure it is unhighlighted
08424       UnHighLightLine(hStringHandle);
08425  }
08426 
08427  // set font type
08428  SetBoxFont(ghTrainingBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
08429 
08430  // set highlight color
08431  SetBoxHighLight(ghTrainingBox, FONT_WHITE);
08432 
08433  // unhighlighted color
08434  SetBoxForeground(ghTrainingBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
08435 
08436  // background color
08437  SetBoxBackground(ghTrainingBox, FONT_BLACK);
08438 
08439  // shaded color..for darkened text
08440  SetBoxShade( ghTrainingBox, FONT_GRAY7 );
08441 
08442  // resize box to text
08443  ResizeBoxToText( ghTrainingBox );
08444 
08445  DetermineBoxPositions( );
08446 
08447 }
08448 
08449 
08450 void CreateAssignmentsBox( void )
08451 {
08452  UINT32 hStringHandle;
08453  UINT32 uiCounter;
08454  CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
08455  SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
08456 
08457 
08458  // will create attribute pop up menu for mapscreen assignments
08459 
08460       AssignmentPosition.iX = OrigAssignmentPosition.iX;
08461 
08462       if( giBoxY != 0 )
08463       {
08464             AssignmentPosition.iY = giBoxY;
08465       }
08466 
08467 
08468       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( TRUE );
08469       // pSoldier NULL is legal here!  Gets called during every mapscreen initialization even when nobody is assign char
08470 
08471       // create basic box
08472       CreatePopUpBox(&ghAssignmentBox, AssignmentDimensions, AssignmentPosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CENTER_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
08473  
08474       // which buffer will box render to
08475       SetBoxBuffer(ghAssignmentBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
08476 
08477       // border type?
08478       SetBorderType(ghAssignmentBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08479 
08480       // background texture
08481       SetBackGroundSurface(ghAssignmentBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
08482 
08483       // margin sizes
08484       SetMargins(ghAssignmentBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
08485 
08486       // space between lines
08487       SetLineSpace(ghAssignmentBox, 2);
08488 
08489       // set current box to this one
08490       SetCurrentBox( ghAssignmentBox );
08491 
08492       // add strings for box
08493       for(uiCounter=0; uiCounter < MAX_ASSIGN_STRING_COUNT; uiCounter++)
08494       {
08495             // if we have a soldier, and this is the squad line
08496             if( ( uiCounter == ASSIGN_MENU_ON_DUTY ) && ( pSoldier != NULL ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY ) )
08497             {
08498                   // show his squad # in brackets
08499                   swprintf( sString, L"%s(%d)", pAssignMenuStrings[uiCounter], pSoldier->bAssignment + 1 );
08500             }
08501             else
08502             {
08503                   swprintf( sString, pAssignMenuStrings[uiCounter] );
08504             }
08505 
08506             AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
08507   
08508             // make sure it is unhighlighted
08509             UnHighLightLine(hStringHandle);
08510       }
08511 
08512       // set font type
08513       SetBoxFont(ghAssignmentBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
08514 
08515       // set highlight color
08516       SetBoxHighLight(ghAssignmentBox, FONT_WHITE);
08517 
08518       // unhighlighted color
08519       SetBoxForeground(ghAssignmentBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
08520 
08521       // background color
08522       SetBoxBackground(ghAssignmentBox, FONT_BLACK);
08523 
08524       // shaded color..for darkened text
08525       SetBoxShade( ghAssignmentBox, FONT_GRAY7 );
08526       SetBoxSecondaryShade( ghAssignmentBox, FONT_YELLOW );
08527 
08528        // resize box to text
08529       ResizeBoxToText( ghAssignmentBox );
08530 
08531       DetermineBoxPositions( );
08532 }
08533 
08534 
08535 void CreateMercRemoveAssignBox( void )
08536 {
08537             // will create remove mercbox to be placed in assignment area
08538 
08539  UINT32 hStringHandle;
08540  UINT32 uiCounter;
08541  // create basic box
08542  CreatePopUpBox(&ghRemoveMercAssignBox, AssignmentDimensions, AssignmentPosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CENTER_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
08543  
08544  // which buffer will box render to
08545  SetBoxBuffer(ghRemoveMercAssignBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
08546 
08547  // border type?
08548  SetBorderType(ghRemoveMercAssignBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08549 
08550  // background texture
08551  SetBackGroundSurface(ghRemoveMercAssignBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
08552 
08553  // margin sizes
08554  SetMargins( ghRemoveMercAssignBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
08555 
08556  // space between lines
08557  SetLineSpace(ghRemoveMercAssignBox, 2);
08558 
08559  // set current box to this one
08560  SetCurrentBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
08561 
08562  // add strings for box
08563  for(uiCounter=0; uiCounter < MAX_REMOVE_MERC_COUNT; uiCounter++)
08564  {
08565   AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, pRemoveMercStrings[uiCounter]);
08566   
08567       // make sure it is unhighlighted
08568       UnHighLightLine(hStringHandle);
08569  }
08570 
08571  // set font type
08572  SetBoxFont(ghRemoveMercAssignBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
08573 
08574  // set highlight color
08575  SetBoxHighLight(ghRemoveMercAssignBox, FONT_WHITE);
08576 
08577  // unhighlighted color
08578  SetBoxForeground(ghRemoveMercAssignBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
08579 
08580  // background color
08581  SetBoxBackground(ghRemoveMercAssignBox, FONT_BLACK);
08582 
08583  // shaded color..for darkened text
08584  SetBoxShade( ghRemoveMercAssignBox, FONT_GRAY7 );
08585 
08586  // resize box to text
08587  ResizeBoxToText( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
08588 }
08589 
08590 
08591 BOOLEAN CreateDestroyAssignmentPopUpBoxes( void )
08592 {
08593       static BOOLEAN fCreated= FALSE;
08594       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
08595   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc; 
08596 
08597 
08598       if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
08599       {
08600             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
08601             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\popup.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
08602             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPOPUPBORDERS));
08603 
08604             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_FROMFILE | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
08605             strcpy(vs_desc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\popupbackground.pcx");
08606             CHECKF(AddVideoSurface(&vs_desc, &guiPOPUPTEX));
08607 
08608             // these boxes are always created while in mapscreen...
08609             CreateEPCBox( );
08610             // WANNE 2 <ab>
08611             CreateAssignmentsBox( );
08612             CreateTrainingBox( );
08613             CreateAttributeBox();
08614             CreateVehicleBox();
08615             CreateRepairBox( );
08616 
08617             UpdateMapScreenAssignmentPositions( );
08618 
08619             fCreated = TRUE;
08620       }
08621       else if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
08622       {
08623             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPOPUPBORDERS);
08624             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiPOPUPTEX);
08625 
08626             RemoveBox(ghAttributeBox);
08627             ghAttributeBox = -1;
08628 
08629             RemoveBox(ghVehicleBox);
08630             ghVehicleBox = -1;
08631 
08632             RemoveBox(ghAssignmentBox);
08633             ghAssignmentBox = -1;
08634 
08635             RemoveBox(ghEpcBox);
08636             ghEpcBox = -1;
08637 
08638             RemoveBox(ghRepairBox);
08639             ghRepairBox = -1;
08640 
08641             RemoveBox(ghTrainingBox);
08642             ghTrainingBox = -1;
08643 
08644             fCreated = FALSE;
08645             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
08646             RebuildCurrentSquad( );
08647       }
08648 
08649       return( TRUE );
08650 }
08651 
08652 
08653 
08654 void DetermineBoxPositions( void )
08655 {
08656       // depending on how many boxes there are, reposition as needed
08657       SGPPoint pPoint;
08658       SGPPoint pNewPoint;
08659       SGPRect pDimensions;
08660       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
08661 
08662 
08663       if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghAssignmentBox == -1 ) )
08664       {
08665             return;
08666       }
08667 
08668       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( TRUE );
08669       // pSoldier NULL is legal here!  Gets called during every mapscreen initialization even when nobody is assign char
08670       if ( pSoldier == NULL )
08671       {
08672             return;
08673       }
08674 
08675       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
08676       {
08677             GetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, &pPoint );
08678             gsAssignmentBoxesX = ( INT16 )pPoint.iX;
08679             gsAssignmentBoxesY = ( INT16 )pPoint.iY;
08680       }
08681 
08682       pPoint.iX = gsAssignmentBoxesX;
08683       pPoint.iY = gsAssignmentBoxesY;
08684 
08685       if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
08686       {
08687             SetBoxPosition( ghEpcBox, pPoint );
08688             GetBoxSize( ghEpcBox, &pDimensions );
08689       }
08690       else
08691       {
08692             SetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, pPoint );
08693             GetBoxSize( ghAssignmentBox, &pDimensions );
08694       }
08695 
08696 
08697       // hang it right beside the assignment/EPC box menu
08698       pNewPoint.iX = pPoint.iX + pDimensions.iRight;
08699       pNewPoint.iY = pPoint.iY;
08700 
08701       if( ( fShowSquadMenu == TRUE ) && ( ghSquadBox != -1 ) )
08702       {
08703             SetBoxPosition( ghSquadBox, pNewPoint );
08704       }
08705 
08706       if( ( fShowRepairMenu == TRUE ) && ( ghRepairBox != -1 ) )
08707       {
08708             CreateDestroyMouseRegionForRepairMenu( );
08709             pNewPoint.iY += ( ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
08710 
08711             SetBoxPosition( ghRepairBox, pNewPoint );
08712       }
08713 
08714       if( ( fShowTrainingMenu == TRUE ) && ( ghTrainingBox != -1 ) )
08715       {
08716             pNewPoint.iY += ( ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN );
08717             SetBoxPosition( ghTrainingBox, pNewPoint );
08718             TrainPosition.iX = pNewPoint.iX;
08719             TrainPosition.iY = pNewPoint.iY;
08720             OrigTrainPosition.iY = pNewPoint.iY;
08721             OrigTrainPosition.iX = pNewPoint.iX;
08722 
08723             GetBoxSize( ghTrainingBox, &pDimensions );
08724             GetBoxPosition( ghTrainingBox, &pPoint );
08725 
08726             if( ( fShowAttributeMenu == TRUE ) && ( ghAttributeBox != -1 ) )
08727             {
08728                   // hang it right beside the training box menu
08729                   pNewPoint.iX = pPoint.iX + pDimensions.iRight;
08730                   pNewPoint.iY = pPoint.iY;
08731                   SetBoxPosition( ghAttributeBox, pNewPoint );
08732             }
08733       }
08734 
08735       return;
08736 }
08737 
08738 
08739 
08740 void SetTacticalPopUpAssignmentBoxXY( void )
08741 {
08742       INT16 sX, sY;
08743       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
08744 
08745 
08746       //get the soldier
08747       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
08748 
08749       // grab soldier's x,y screen position
08750       GetSoldierScreenPos( pSoldier, &sX, &sY );
08751 
08752       if( sX < 0 )
08753       {
08754             sX = 0;
08755       }
08756 
08757       gsAssignmentBoxesX = sX + 30;
08758       
08759       if( sY < 0 )
08760       {
08761             sY = 0;
08762       }
08763       
08764       gsAssignmentBoxesY = sY;
08765 
08766 
08767       // WANNE 2
08768       // ATE: Check if we are past tactical viewport....
08769       // Use estimate width's/heights
08770       if ( ( gsAssignmentBoxesX + 100 ) > SCREEN_WIDTH )
08771       {
08772             //gsAssignmentBoxesX = 540;
08773             gsAssignmentBoxesX = SCREEN_WIDTH - 100;
08774       }
08775 
08776       // WANNE 2
08777       if ( ( gsAssignmentBoxesY + 130 ) > (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 160) )
08778       {
08779             gsAssignmentBoxesY = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 290;
08780       }
08781 
08782       return;
08783 }
08784 
08785 
08786 
08787 void RepositionMouseRegions( void )
08788 {
08789       INT16 sDeltaX, sDeltaY;
08790       INT32 iCounter = 0;
08791 
08792       if( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE )
08793       {
08794             sDeltaX = gsAssignmentBoxesX - gAssignmentMenuRegion[ 0 ].RegionTopLeftX;
08795             sDeltaY = ( INT16 ) ( gsAssignmentBoxesY - gAssignmentMenuRegion[ 0 ].RegionTopLeftY + GetTopMarginSize( ghAssignmentBox ) );
08796 
08797             // find the delta from the old to the new, and alter values accordingly
08798             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ( INT32 )GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghAssignmentBox ); iCounter++ )
08799             {
08800                   gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ].RegionTopLeftX += sDeltaX;
08801                   gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ].RegionTopLeftY += sDeltaY;
08802 
08803                   gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ].RegionBottomRightX += sDeltaX;
08804                   gAssignmentMenuRegion[ iCounter ].RegionBottomRightY += sDeltaY;
08805             }
08806 
08807             gfPausedTacticalRenderFlags = RENDER_FLAG_FULL;
08808       }
08809 }
08810 
08811 
08812 
08813 void CheckAndUpdateTacticalAssignmentPopUpPositions( void )
08814 {
08815       SGPRect pDimensions, pDimensions2, pDimensions3;
08816       SGPPoint pPoint;
08817       INT16 sLongest;
08818       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
08819 
08820 
08821       if( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE )
08822       {
08823             return;
08824       }
08825 
08826       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
08827       {
08828             return;
08829       }
08830 
08831 
08832       //get the soldier
08833       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
08834 
08835       if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
08836       {
08837             GetBoxSize( ghEpcBox, &pDimensions2 );
08838       }
08839       else
08840       {
08841             GetBoxSize( ghAssignmentBox, &pDimensions2 );
08842       }
08843 
08844       if( fShowRepairMenu == TRUE )
08845       {
08846             GetBoxSize( ghRepairBox, &pDimensions );
08847 
08848             // WANNE 2
08849             if( gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
08850             {
08851                   gsAssignmentBoxesX = ( INT16 ) ( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 1) - ( pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight ) );
08852                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08853             }
08854 
08855             if( pDimensions2.iBottom >  pDimensions.iBottom )
08856             {
08857                   sLongest = ( INT16 )pDimensions2.iBottom + (  ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
08858             }
08859             else
08860             {
08861                   sLongest  = ( INT16 )pDimensions.iBottom + (  ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
08862             }
08863 
08864             // WANNE 2
08865             if( gsAssignmentBoxesY + sLongest >= (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 120) )
08866             {
08867                   gsAssignmentBoxesY = ( INT16 )( (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 121) - ( sLongest ) );
08868                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08869             }
08870             
08871             pPoint.iX = gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight;
08872             pPoint.iY = gsAssignmentBoxesY + (  ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
08873                   
08874             SetBoxPosition( ghRepairBox, pPoint );
08875       }
08876       else if( fShowSquadMenu == TRUE )
08877       {
08878             GetBoxSize( ghSquadBox, &pDimensions );
08879       
08880 
08881             if( gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
08882             {
08883                   gsAssignmentBoxesX = ( INT16 ) ( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 1) - ( pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight ) );
08884                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08885             }
08886 
08887             if( pDimensions2.iBottom >  pDimensions.iBottom )
08888             {
08889                   sLongest = ( INT16 )pDimensions2.iBottom;
08890             }
08891             else
08892             {
08893                   sLongest  = ( INT16 )pDimensions.iBottom;
08894             }
08895 
08896             // WANNE 2
08897             if( gsAssignmentBoxesY + sLongest >= (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 120) )
08898             {
08899                   gsAssignmentBoxesY = ( INT16 )( (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 121) - ( sLongest ) );
08900                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08901             }
08902             
08903             pPoint.iX = gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight;
08904             pPoint.iY = gsAssignmentBoxesY;
08905 
08906             SetBoxPosition( ghSquadBox, pPoint );
08907       }
08908       else if( fShowAttributeMenu == TRUE )
08909       {
08910             GetBoxSize( ghTrainingBox, &pDimensions );
08911             GetBoxSize( ghAttributeBox, &pDimensions3 );
08912 
08913             // WANNE 2
08914             if( gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight + pDimensions3.iRight >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
08915             {
08916                   gsAssignmentBoxesX = ( INT16 ) ( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 1) - ( pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight + pDimensions3.iRight ) );
08917                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08918             }
08919 
08920             // WANNE 2
08921             if( gsAssignmentBoxesY + pDimensions3.iBottom + ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) * ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN ) >= (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 120) )
08922             {
08923                   gsAssignmentBoxesY = ( INT16 )( (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 121) - ( pDimensions3.iBottom ) );
08924                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08925             }
08926             
08927             pPoint.iX = gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight;
08928             pPoint.iY = gsAssignmentBoxesY;
08929             
08930             pPoint.iY += (  ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN );
08931             SetBoxPosition( ghAttributeBox, pPoint );
08932 
08933             pPoint.iX = gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight;
08934             pPoint.iY = gsAssignmentBoxesY;
08935 
08936             pPoint.iY += (  ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN );
08937 
08938             SetBoxPosition( ghTrainingBox, pPoint );
08939 
08940 
08941       }
08942       else if( fShowTrainingMenu == TRUE )
08943       {
08944             GetBoxSize( ghTrainingBox, &pDimensions );
08945 
08946             // WANNE 2
08947             if( gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight  >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
08948             {
08949                   gsAssignmentBoxesX = ( INT16 ) ( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 1) - ( pDimensions2.iRight + pDimensions.iRight  ) );
08950                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08951             }
08952 
08953             // WANNE 2
08954             if( gsAssignmentBoxesY + pDimensions2.iBottom +  ( ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN ) >= (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 120) )
08955             {
08956                   gsAssignmentBoxesY = ( INT16 )( (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 121) - ( pDimensions2.iBottom ) - (  ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN ) );
08957                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08958             }
08959       
08960       
08961 
08962             pPoint.iX = gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight;
08963             pPoint.iY = gsAssignmentBoxesY;
08964             pPoint.iY += ( ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN );
08965             
08966             SetBoxPosition( ghTrainingBox, pPoint );
08967       }
08968       else
08969       {
08970             // WANNE 2
08971             // just the assignment box
08972             if( gsAssignmentBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight  >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
08973             {
08974                   gsAssignmentBoxesX = ( INT16 ) ( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 1) - ( pDimensions2.iRight  ) );
08975                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08976             }
08977 
08978             if( gsAssignmentBoxesY + pDimensions2.iBottom  >= (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 120) )
08979             {
08980                   gsAssignmentBoxesY = ( INT16 )( (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 121) - ( pDimensions2.iBottom  ) );
08981                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
08982             }
08983             
08984             pPoint.iX = gsAssignmentBoxesX;
08985             pPoint.iY = gsAssignmentBoxesY;
08986             
08987             if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC)
08988             {
08989                   SetBoxPosition( ghEpcBox, pPoint );
08990             }
08991             else
08992             {
08993                   SetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, pPoint );
08994             }
08995       }
08996 
08997       RepositionMouseRegions( );
08998 }
08999 
09000 
09001 
09002 void PositionCursorForTacticalAssignmentBox( void )
09003 {
09004       // position cursor over y of on duty in tactical assignments
09005       SGPPoint pPosition;
09006       SGPRect pDimensions;
09007       INT32 iFontHeight;
09008 
09009       // get x.y position of box
09010       GetBoxPosition( ghAssignmentBox, &pPosition);
09011 
09012       // get dimensions..mostly for width
09013       GetBoxSize( ghAssignmentBox, &pDimensions );
09014 
09015       iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghAssignmentBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghAssignmentBox ) ); 
09016 
09017       // WANNE 2
09018       if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_DONT_MOVE_MOUSE ] == FALSE )
09019       {
09020             //SimulateMouseMovement( pPosition.iX + pDimensions.iRight - 6, pPosition.iY + ( iFontHeight / 2 ) + 2 );
09021       }
09022 }
09023 
09024 
09025 
09026 void HandleRestFatigueAndSleepStatus( void )
09027 {
09028       INT32 iCounter = 0, iNumberOnTeam = 0;
09029       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
09030       BOOLEAN fReasonAdded = FALSE;
09031       BOOLEAN fBoxSetUp = FALSE;
09032       BOOLEAN fMeToo = FALSE;
09033 
09034 
09035       iNumberOnTeam =gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
09036 
09037       // run through all player characters and handle their rest, fatigue, and going to sleep
09038       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOnTeam; iCounter++ )
09039       {
09040             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
09041 
09042             if( pSoldier -> bActive )
09043             {
09044                   if( ( pSoldier -> uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
09045                   {
09046                         continue;
09047                   }
09048 
09049                   if( ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) || ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) )
09050                   {
09051                         continue;
09052                   }
09053 
09054                   // if character CAN sleep, he doesn't actually have to be put asleep to get some rest,
09055                   // many other assignments and conditions allow for automatic recovering from fatigue.
09056                   if( CharacterIsTakingItEasy( pSoldier ) )
09057                   {
09058                         // let them rest some
09059                         RestCharacter( pSoldier );
09060                   }
09061                   else
09062                   {     
09063                         // wear them down
09064                         FatigueCharacter( pSoldier );
09065                   }
09066 
09067 
09068                   // CHECK FOR MERCS GOING TO SLEEP
09069 
09070                   // if awake
09071                   if ( !pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
09072                   {
09073                         // if dead tired
09074                         if( pSoldier -> bBreathMax <= BREATHMAX_ABSOLUTE_MINIMUM )
09075                         {
09076                               // if between sectors, don't put tired mercs to sleep...  will be handled when they arrive at the next sector
09077                               if ( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
09078                               {
09079                                     continue;
09080                               }
09081 
09082                               // he goes to sleep, provided it's at all possible (it still won't happen in a hostile sector, etc.)
09083                               if( SetMercAsleep( pSoldier, FALSE ) )
09084                               {
09085                                     if( ( pSoldier -> bAssignment < ON_DUTY ) || ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == VEHICLE ) )
09086                                     {
09087                                           // on a squad/vehicle, complain, then drop
09088                                           TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_NEED_SLEEP );
09089                                           TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, QUOTE_NEED_SLEEP, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SLEEP, 1,0 );
09090                                           fMeToo = TRUE;
09091                                     }
09092 
09093                                     // guy collapses
09094                                     pSoldier -> fMercCollapsedFlag = TRUE;
09095                               }
09096                         }
09097                         // if pretty tired, and not forced to stay awake
09098                         else if( ( pSoldier -> bBreathMax < BREATHMAX_PRETTY_TIRED ) && ( pSoldier -> fForcedToStayAwake == FALSE ) )
09099                         {
09100                               // if not on squad/ in vehicle
09101                               if( ( pSoldier -> bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && ( pSoldier -> bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
09102                               {
09103                                     // try to go to sleep on your own
09104                                     if( SetMercAsleep( pSoldier, FALSE ) )
09105                                     {
09106                                           if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SLEEPWAKE_NOTIFICATION ] )
09107                                           {
09108                                                 // if the first one
09109                                                 if( fReasonAdded == FALSE )
09110                                                 {
09111                                                       // tell player about it
09112                                                       AddReasonToWaitingListQueue( ASLEEP_GOING_AUTO_FOR_UPDATE );
09113                                                       TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOW_UPDATE_MENU, 0,0 );
09114 
09115                                                       fReasonAdded = TRUE;
09116                                                 }
09117 
09118                                                 AddSoldierToWaitingListQueue( pSoldier );
09119                                                 fBoxSetUp = TRUE;
09120                                           }
09121 
09122                                           // seems unnecessary now?  ARM
09123                                           pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09124                                     }
09125                               }
09126                               else  // tired, in a squad / vehicle
09127                               {
09128                                     // if he hasn't complained yet
09129                                     if ( !pSoldier->fComplainedThatTired )
09130                                     {
09131                                           // say quote
09132                                           if( fMeToo == FALSE )
09133                                           {
09134                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_NEED_SLEEP );
09135                                                 fMeToo = TRUE;
09136                                           }
09137                                           else
09138                                           {
09139                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_ME_TOO );
09140                                           }
09141 
09142                                           pSoldier->fComplainedThatTired = TRUE;
09143                                     }
09144                               }     
09145                         }
09146                   }
09147             }
09148       }
09149 
09150       if( fBoxSetUp )
09151       {
09152             UnPauseGameDuringNextQuote( );
09153             AddDisplayBoxToWaitingQueue( );
09154             fBoxSetUp = FALSE;
09155       }
09156 
09157       fReasonAdded = FALSE;
09158 
09159 
09160       // now handle waking (needs seperate list queue, that's why it has its own loop)
09161       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOnTeam; iCounter++ )
09162       {
09163             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
09164             
09165             if( pSoldier -> bActive )
09166             {
09167                   if( ( pSoldier -> uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
09168                   {
09169                         continue;
09170                   }
09171 
09172                   if( ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) || ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) )
09173                   {
09174                         continue;
09175                   }
09176 
09177                   // guys between sectors CAN wake up while between sectors (sleeping in vehicle)...
09178 
09179 
09180                   // CHECK FOR MERCS WAKING UP
09181 
09182                   if ( pSoldier->bBreathMax >= BREATHMAX_CANCEL_COLLAPSE ) 
09183                   {
09184                         // reset the collapsed flag well before reaching the wakeup state
09185                         pSoldier -> fMercCollapsedFlag = FALSE;
09186                   }
09187 
09188 
09189                   // if asleep
09190                   if ( pSoldier -> fMercAsleep )
09191                   {
09192                         // but has had enough rest?
09193                         if( pSoldier -> bBreathMax >= BREATHMAX_FULLY_RESTED )
09194                         {
09195                               // try to wake merc up
09196                               if( SetMercAwake( pSoldier, FALSE, FALSE ) )
09197                               {
09198                                     // if not on squad/ in vehicle, tell player about it
09199                                     if( ( pSoldier -> bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && ( pSoldier -> bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
09200                                     {
09201                                           if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SLEEPWAKE_NOTIFICATION ] )
09202                                           {
09203                                                 if( fReasonAdded == FALSE )
09204                                                 {
09205                                                       AddReasonToWaitingListQueue( ASSIGNMENT_RETURNING_FOR_UPDATE );                                       
09206                                                       fReasonAdded = TRUE;
09207                                                 }
09208 
09209                                                 AddSoldierToWaitingListQueue( pSoldier );
09210                                                 fBoxSetUp = TRUE;
09211                                           }
09212                                     }
09213                               }
09214                         }
09215                   }
09216             }
09217       }
09218 
09219       if( fBoxSetUp )
09220       {
09221             UnPauseGameDuringNextQuote( );
09222             AddDisplayBoxToWaitingQueue( );
09223             fBoxSetUp = FALSE;
09224       }
09225 
09226       return;
09227 }
09228 
09229 
09230 
09231 BOOLEAN CanCharacterRepairVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iVehicleId )
09232 {
09233       // is the vehicle valid?
09234       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iVehicleId ) == FALSE )
09235       {
09236             return( FALSE ); 
09237       }
09238 
09239       // is vehicle destroyed?
09240       if( pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].fDestroyed )
09241       {
09242             return(FALSE);
09243       }
09244 
09245       // is it damaged at all?
09246       if ( !DoesVehicleNeedAnyRepairs( iVehicleId ) )
09247       {
09248             return(FALSE);
09249       }
09250 
09251       // it's not Skyrider's helicopter (which isn't damagable/repairable)
09252       if ( iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId )
09253       {
09254             return( FALSE );
09255       }
09256 
09257       // same sector, neither is between sectors, and OK To Use (player owns it) ?
09258       if ( !IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iVehicleId ) )
09259       {
09260             return( FALSE );
09261       }
09262 
09263 /* Assignment distance limits removed.  Sep/11/98.  ARM
09264       // if currently loaded sector, are we close enough?
09265       if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX ) && ( pSoldier->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY ) && ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ ) )
09266       {
09267             if( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier -> sGridNo, pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].sGridNo ) > MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_REPAIR )
09268             {
09269               return( FALSE );
09270             }
09271       }
09272 */    
09273 
09274       return( TRUE );
09275 }
09276 
09277 
09278 
09279 BOOLEAN IsRobotInThisSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
09280 {
09281       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
09282 
09283       pSoldier = GetRobotSoldier( );
09284 
09285       if ( pSoldier != NULL )
09286       {
09287             if( ( pSoldier -> sSectorX == sSectorX ) && ( pSoldier -> sSectorY == sSectorY ) && ( pSoldier -> bSectorZ == bSectorZ ) && ( pSoldier -> fBetweenSectors == FALSE ) )
09288             {
09289                   return( TRUE );
09290             }
09291       }
09292 
09293       return( FALSE );
09294 }
09295 
09296 
09297 
09298 SOLDIERTYPE * GetRobotSoldier( void )
09299 {
09300       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL, *pTeamSoldier = NULL;
09301   INT32 cnt=0;
09302 
09303       // set pSoldier as first in merc ptrs
09304       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
09305       
09306       // go through list of characters, find all who are on this assignment
09307       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier -> bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
09308       {
09309             if( pTeamSoldier -> bActive )
09310             {
09311                   if( AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )
09312                   {
09313                         return (pTeamSoldier);
09314                   }
09315             }
09316       }
09317 
09318       return( NULL );
09319 }
09320 
09321 
09322 BOOLEAN CanCharacterRepairRobot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09323 {
09324       SOLDIERTYPE *pRobot = NULL;
09325 
09326       // do we in fact have the robot on the team?
09327       pRobot = GetRobotSoldier( );
09328       if( pRobot == NULL )
09329       {
09330             return( FALSE );
09331       }
09332 
09333       // if robot isn't damaged at all
09334       if( pRobot -> bLife == pRobot -> bLifeMax )
09335       {
09336             return( FALSE );
09337       }
09338 
09339       // is the robot in the same sector
09340       if( IsRobotInThisSector( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY, pSoldier -> bSectorZ ) == FALSE )
09341       {
09342             return( FALSE );
09343       }
09344 
09345 /* Assignment distance limits removed.  Sep/11/98.  ARM
09346       // if that sector is currently loaded, check distance to robot
09347       if( ( pSoldier -> sSectorX == gWorldSectorX ) && ( pSoldier -> sSectorY == gWorldSectorY ) && ( pSoldier -> bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ ) )
09348       {
09349             if( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier -> sGridNo, pRobot -> sGridNo ) > MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_REPAIR )
09350             {
09351               return( FALSE );
09352             }
09353       }
09354 */
09355 
09356       return( TRUE );
09357 }
09358 
09359 
09360 
09361 UINT8 HandleRepairOfRobotBySoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubRepairPts, BOOLEAN *pfNothingLeftToRepair )
09362 {
09363       SOLDIERTYPE *pRobot = NULL;
09364 
09365       pRobot = GetRobotSoldier( );
09366 
09367       // do the actual repairs
09368       return( RepairRobot( pRobot, ubRepairPts, pfNothingLeftToRepair ) );
09369 }
09370 
09371 
09372 UINT8 RepairRobot( SOLDIERTYPE *pRobot, UINT8 ubRepairPts, BOOLEAN *pfNothingLeftToRepair  )
09373 {
09374       UINT8 ubPointsUsed = 0;
09375 
09376 
09377       // is it "dead" ?
09378       if( pRobot -> bLife == 0 )
09379       {
09380             *pfNothingLeftToRepair = TRUE;
09381             return( ubPointsUsed );
09382       }
09383       
09384       // is it "unhurt" ?
09385       if( pRobot -> bLife == pRobot -> bLifeMax )
09386       {
09387             *pfNothingLeftToRepair = TRUE;
09388             return( ubPointsUsed );
09389       }
09390 
09391       // if we have enough or more than we need
09392       if( pRobot -> bLife + ubRepairPts >= pRobot -> bLifeMax )
09393       {
09394             ubPointsUsed = ( pRobot -> bLifeMax - pRobot -> bLife );
09395             pRobot -> bLife = pRobot -> bLifeMax; 
09396       }
09397       else
09398       {
09399             // not enough, do what we can
09400             ubPointsUsed = ubRepairPts;
09401             pRobot -> bLife += ubRepairPts; 
09402       }
09403 
09404       if ( pRobot->bLife == pRobot->bLifeMax )
09405       {
09406             *pfNothingLeftToRepair = TRUE;
09407       }
09408       else
09409       {
09410             *pfNothingLeftToRepair = FALSE;
09411       }
09412 
09413       return( ubPointsUsed );
09414 }
09415 
09416 
09417 void SetSoldierAssignment( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bAssignment, INT32 iParam1, INT32 iParam2, INT32 iParam3 )
09418 {
09419       switch( bAssignment )
09420       {
09421             case( ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL ):
09422                   if( CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier ) )
09423                   {
09424                         
09425                         pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09426                         pSoldier->bBleeding = 0;
09427             
09428                         // set dirty flag
09429                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09430                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09431 
09432                         // remove from squad
09433 
09434                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads(  pSoldier );
09435 
09436                         // remove from any vehicle
09437                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09438                         {
09439                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09440                         }
09441 
09442                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL ) )
09443                         {
09444                               SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09445                         }
09446 
09447                         
09448                         RebuildCurrentSquad( );
09449 
09450                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL );
09451 
09452                         AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09453                   }
09454                   break;
09455             case( PATIENT ):
09456                   if( CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier ) )
09457                   {
09458                         // set as doctor
09459                   
09460 /* Assignment distance limits removed.  Sep/11/98.  ARM
09461                         if( IsSoldierCloseEnoughToADoctor( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
09462                         {
09463                               return;
09464                         }
09465 */
09466 
09467                         pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09468                         
09469             
09470                         // set dirty flag
09471                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09472                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09473 
09474                         // remove from squad
09475                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads(  pSoldier );
09476 
09477                         // remove from any vehicle
09478                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09479                         {
09480                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09481                         }
09482 
09483                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != PATIENT ) )
09484                         {
09485                               SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09486                         }
09487 
09488                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, PATIENT );
09489 
09490                         AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09491                   }
09492 
09493             break;
09494             case( DOCTOR ):
09495                   if( CanCharacterDoctor( pSoldier ) )
09496                   {
09497                   
09498                         pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09499                         
09500                   
09501                               // set dirty flag
09502                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09503                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09504                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
09505 
09506                         // remove from squad
09507                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads(  pSoldier );   
09508 
09509                         // remove from any vehicle
09510                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09511                         {
09512                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09513                         }
09514 
09515                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != DOCTOR ) )
09516                         {
09517                               SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09518                         }
09519 
09520                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, DOCTOR );
09521 
09522                         MakeSureMedKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
09523                         AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09524                   }
09525             break;
09526             case( TRAIN_TOWN ):
09527                   if( CanCharacterTrainMilitia( pSoldier ) )
09528                   {
09529                         // train militia
09530                         pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09531                   
09532                         // set dirty flag
09533                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09534                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09535 
09536                         // remove from squad
09537                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads(  pSoldier );   
09538 
09539                         // remove from any vehicle
09540                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09541                         {
09542                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09543                         }
09544 
09545                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != TRAIN_TOWN ) )
09546                         {
09547                               SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09548                         }
09549 
09550                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_TOWN );
09551 
09552                         if( pMilitiaTrainerSoldier == NULL )
09553                         {
09554                               if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY ) ].fMilitiaTrainingPaid == FALSE )
09555                               {
09556                                     // show a message to confirm player wants to charge cost
09557                                     HandleInterfaceMessageForCostOfTrainingMilitia( pSoldier );
09558                               }
09559                         }
09560 
09561                         AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09562                         // set dirty flag
09563                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09564                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09565                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
09566                   }
09567             break;
09568             case( TRAIN_SELF ):
09569                   if( CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, ( INT8 )iParam1, TRUE, FALSE ) )
09570                   {
09571                         // train stat
09572                         pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09573 
09574                         // remove from squad
09575                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
09576 
09577                         // remove from any vehicle
09578                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09579                         {
09580                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09581                         }
09582 
09583                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != TRAIN_SELF ) )
09584                         {
09585                               SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09586                         }
09587 
09588                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_SELF );
09589                         
09590                         AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09591 
09592                         // set stat to train
09593                         pSoldier -> bTrainStat = ( INT8 )iParam1;
09594 
09595                         // set dirty flag
09596                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09597                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09598                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
09599                   }
09600                   break;
09601                   case( TRAIN_TEAMMATE ):
09602                   if( CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, ( INT8 )iParam1, FALSE, TRUE ) )
09603                   {
09604 
09605                         pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09606                         // remove from squad
09607                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
09608 
09609                         // remove from any vehicle
09610                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09611                         {
09612                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09613                         }
09614 
09615                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != TRAIN_TEAMMATE ) )
09616                         {
09617                               SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09618                         }
09619 
09620                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_TEAMMATE );
09621                         AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09622 
09623                         // set stat to train
09624                         pSoldier -> bTrainStat = ( INT8 )iParam1;
09625 
09626                         // set dirty flag
09627                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09628                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09629                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
09630                   }
09631             break;
09632             case( TRAIN_BY_OTHER ):
09633                   if( CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, ( INT8 )iParam1, TRUE, FALSE ) )
09634                   {
09635                         // train stat
09636                         pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09637 
09638                         // remove from squad
09639                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
09640 
09641                         // remove from any vehicle
09642                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09643                         {
09644                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09645                         }
09646 
09647                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != TRAIN_BY_OTHER ) )
09648                         {
09649                               SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09650                         }
09651 
09652                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_BY_OTHER );
09653 
09654                         AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09655 
09656                         // set stat to train
09657                         pSoldier -> bTrainStat = ( INT8 )iParam1;
09658 
09659                         // set dirty flag
09660                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09661                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09662                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
09663                   }
09664                   break;
09665             case( REPAIR ):
09666                   if( CanCharacterRepair( pSoldier ) )
09667                   {
09668                         pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;       
09669 
09670                         // remove from squad
09671                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
09672 
09673                         // remove from any vehicle
09674                         if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09675                         {
09676                               TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09677                         }
09678 
09679                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != REPAIR ) ||( pSoldier ->fFixingSAMSite != ( UINT8 )iParam1 ) || ( pSoldier ->fFixingRobot != ( UINT8 )iParam2 ) || ( pSoldier ->bVehicleUnderRepairID != ( UINT8 )iParam3 ) ) 
09680                         {
09681                               SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09682                         }
09683 
09684                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, REPAIR );
09685                         MakeSureToolKitIsInHand( pSoldier );
09686                         AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09687                         pSoldier -> fFixingSAMSite = ( UINT8 )iParam1;
09688                         pSoldier -> fFixingRobot = ( UINT8 )iParam2;
09689                         pSoldier -> bVehicleUnderRepairID = ( INT8 )iParam3;
09690                   }
09691                   break;
09692             case( VEHICLE ):
09693                   if( CanCharacterVehicle( pSoldier ) && IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, iParam1 ) )
09694                   {
09695                         if ( IsEnoughSpaceInVehicle( (INT8) iParam1 ) )
09696                         {
09697                               pSoldier -> bOldAssignment = pSoldier -> bAssignment;
09698 
09699                               // set dirty flag
09700                               fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09701                               fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09702                               gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
09703 
09704 
09705                               if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
09706                               {
09707                                     TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
09708                               }
09709 
09710                               // remove from squad
09711                               RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );    
09712 
09713                               if( PutSoldierInVehicle( pSoldier, ( INT8 )( iParam1 ) ) == FALSE )
09714                               {
09715                                     AddCharacterToAnySquad( pSoldier );
09716                               }
09717                               else
09718                               {
09719                                     if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) || ( pSoldier ->iVehicleId != ( UINT8 )iParam1 ) ) 
09720                                     {
09721                                           SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
09722                                     }
09723 
09724                                     pSoldier -> iVehicleId = iParam1;
09725                                     ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, VEHICLE );
09726                                     AssignMercToAMovementGroup( pSoldier );
09727                               }
09728                         }
09729                         else
09730                         {
09731                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 18 ], zVehicleName[ pVehicleList[ iParam1 ].ubVehicleType ] );
09732                         }
09733                   }
09734             break;
09735       }
09736 
09737       return;
09738 }
09739 
09740 
09741 
09742 /* No point in allowing SAM site repair any more.  Jan/13/99.  ARM
09743 BOOLEAN CanSoldierRepairSAM( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bRepairPoints)
09744 {
09745       INT16 sGridNoA = 0, sGridNoB = 0;
09746       
09747       // is the soldier in the sector as the SAM
09748       if( SoldierInSameSectorAsSAM( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
09749       {
09750             return( FALSE );
09751       }
09752 
09753       // is the soldier close enough to the control panel?
09754       if( IsSoldierCloseEnoughToSAMControlPanel( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
09755       {
09756             return( FALSE );
09757       }
09758 
09759       //can it be fixed?
09760       if( IsTheSAMSiteInSectorRepairable( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY, pSoldier -> bSectorZ ) == FALSE )
09761       {
09762             return( FALSE );
09763       }
09764 
09765       // is he good enough?  (Because of the division of repair pts in SAM repair formula, a guy with any less that this
09766       // can't make any headway
09767       if (bRepairPoints < SAM_SITE_REPAIR_DIVISOR )
09768       {
09769             return( FALSE );
09770       }
09771 
09772       return( TRUE );
09773 }
09774 
09775 BOOLEAN IsTheSAMSiteInSectorRepairable( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ )
09776 {
09777       INT32 iCounter = 0;
09778       INT8 bSAMCondition;
09779 
09780 
09781       // is the guy above ground, if not, it can't be fixed, now can it?
09782       if( sSectorZ != 0 )
09783       {
09784             return( FALSE );
09785       }
09786 
09787       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SAMS; iCounter++ )
09788       {
09789             if( pSamList[ iCounter ] == SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY ) )
09790             {
09791                   bSAMCondition = StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ].bSAMCondition;
09792 
09793                   if( ( bSAMCondition < 100 ) && ( bSAMCondition >= MIN_CONDITION_TO_FIX_SAM ) )
09794                   {
09795                         return( TRUE );
09796                   }
09797                   else
09798                   {
09799                         // it's not broken at all, or it's beyond repair
09800                         return( FALSE );
09801                   }
09802             }
09803       }
09804 
09805       // none found
09806       return( FALSE );
09807 }
09808 
09809 BOOLEAN SoldierInSameSectorAsSAM( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09810 {
09811       INT32 iCounter = 0;
09812 
09813       // is the soldier on the surface?
09814       if( pSoldier -> bSectorZ != 0 )
09815       {
09816             return( FALSE );
09817       }
09818 
09819       // now check each sam site in the list
09820       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SAMS; iCounter++ )
09821       {
09822             if( pSamList[ iCounter] == SECTOR( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY ) )
09823             {
09824                   return( TRUE );
09825             }
09826       }
09827 
09828       return( FALSE );
09829 }
09830 
09831 BOOLEAN IsSoldierCloseEnoughToSAMControlPanel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09832 {
09833 
09834       INT32 iCounter = 0;
09835 
09836             // now check each sam site in the list
09837       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SAMS; iCounter++ )
09838       {
09839             if( pSamList[ iCounter ] == SECTOR( pSoldier -> sSectorX, pSoldier -> sSectorY ) )
09840             {
09841 // Assignment distance limits removed.  Sep/11/98.  ARM
09842 //                if( ( PythSpacesAway( pSamGridNoAList[ iCounter ], pSoldier -> sGridNo ) < MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_REPAIR )||( PythSpacesAway( pSamGridNoBList[ iCounter ], pSoldier -> sGridNo ) < MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_REPAIR ) )
09843                   {
09844                         return( TRUE );
09845                   }
09846             }
09847       }
09848 
09849       return( FALSE );
09850 }
09851 */
09852 
09853 
09854 
09855 BOOLEAN HandleAssignmentExpansionAndHighLightForAssignMenu( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09856 {
09857       if( fShowSquadMenu )
09858       {
09859             // squad menu up?..if so, highlight squad line the previous menu
09860             if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
09861             {
09862                    HighLightBoxLine( ghEpcBox, EPC_MENU_ON_DUTY );
09863             }
09864             else
09865             {                  
09866                   HighLightBoxLine( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_ON_DUTY );
09867             }
09868 
09869             return( TRUE );
09870       }
09871       else if( fShowTrainingMenu )
09872       {
09873             // highlight train line the previous menu
09874             HighLightBoxLine( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_TRAIN );
09875             return( TRUE );
09876       }
09877       else if( fShowRepairMenu )
09878       {
09879             // highlight repair line the previous menu
09880             HighLightBoxLine( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_REPAIR );
09881             return( TRUE );
09882       }
09883       else if( fShowVehicleMenu )
09884       {
09885             // highlight vehicle line the previous menu
09886             HighLightBoxLine( ghAssignmentBox, ASSIGN_MENU_VEHICLE );
09887             return( TRUE );
09888       }
09889 
09890       return( FALSE );
09891 }
09892 
09893 
09894 BOOLEAN HandleAssignmentExpansionAndHighLightForTrainingMenu( void )
09895 {
09896       if( fShowAttributeMenu )
09897       {
09898             switch ( gbTrainingMode )
09899             {
09900                   case TRAIN_SELF:
09901                         HighLightBoxLine( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_SELF );
09902                         return( TRUE );
09903                   case TRAIN_TEAMMATE:
09904                         HighLightBoxLine( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TEAMMATES );
09905                         return( TRUE );
09906                   case TRAIN_BY_OTHER:
09907                         HighLightBoxLine( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TRAIN_BY_OTHER );
09908                         return( TRUE );
09909 
09910                   default:
09911                         Assert( FALSE );
09912                         break;
09913             }
09914       }
09915 
09916       return( FALSE );
09917 }
09918 
09919 
09920 
09921 /*
09922 BOOLEAN HandleShowingOfUpBox( void )
09923 {
09924 
09925       // if the list is being shown, then show it
09926       if( fShowUpdateBox == TRUE )
09927       {
09928             MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
09929             ShowBox( ghUpdateBox );
09930             return( TRUE );
09931       }
09932       else
09933       {
09934             if( IsBoxShown( ghUpdateBox ) )
09935             {
09936                   HideBox( ghUpdateBox );
09937                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
09938                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
09939                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;

09943       }

09945       return( FALSE );
