09948 
09949 
09950 
09951 BOOLEAN HandleShowingOfMovementBox( void )
09952 {
09953 
09954       // if the list is being shown, then show it
09955       if( fShowMapScreenMovementList == TRUE )
09956       {
09957             MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
09958             ShowBox( ghMoveBox );
09959             return( TRUE );
09960       }
09961       else
09962       {
09963             if( IsBoxShown( ghMoveBox ) )
09964             {
09965                   HideBox( ghMoveBox );
09966                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
09967                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
09968                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
09969                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
09970                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
09971             }
09972       }
09973 
09974       return( FALSE );
09975 }
09976 
09977 
09978 void HandleShadingOfLinesForTrainingMenu( void )
09979 {
09980       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
09981       INT32 iCounter = 0;
09982 
09983 
09984       // check if valid
09985       if( ( fShowTrainingMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghTrainingBox == - 1 ) )
09986       {
09987             return;
09988       }
09989 
09990       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
09991 
09992       // can character practise?
09993       if( CanCharacterPractise( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
09994       {
09995             ShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_SELF );
09996       }
09997       else
09998       {
09999             UnShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_SELF );
10000       }
10001 
10002 
10003       // can character EVER train militia?
10004       if( BasicCanCharacterTrainMilitia( pSoldier ) )
10005       {
10006             // can he train here, now?
10007             if( CanCharacterTrainMilitia( pSoldier ) )
10008             {
10009                   // unshade train militia line
10010                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TOWN );
10011                   UnSecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TOWN );
10012             }
10013             else
10014             {
10015                   SecondaryShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TOWN );
10016             }
10017       }
10018       else
10019       {
10020             // shade train militia line
10021             ShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TOWN );
10022       }
10023 
10024 
10025       // can character train teammates?
10026       if( CanCharacterTrainTeammates( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
10027       {
10028             ShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TEAMMATES );
10029       }
10030       else
10031       {
10032             UnShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TEAMMATES );
10033       }
10034 
10035 
10036       // can character be trained by others?
10037       if( CanCharacterBeTrainedByOther( pSoldier ) == FALSE ) 
10038       {
10039             ShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TRAIN_BY_OTHER );
10040       }
10041       else
10042       {
10043             UnShadeStringInBox( ghTrainingBox, TRAIN_MENU_TRAIN_BY_OTHER );
10044       }
10045 
10046       return;
10047 }
10048 
10049 
10050 void HandleShadingOfLinesForAttributeMenus( void )
10051 {
10052       // will do the same as updateassignments...but with training pop up box strings
10053       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
10054       INT8 bAttrib =0;
10055       BOOLEAN fStatTrainable;
10056 
10057 
10058       if( ( fShowTrainingMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghTrainingBox == - 1 ) )
10059       {
10060             return;
10061       }
10062 
10063       if( ( fShowAttributeMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghAttributeBox == - 1 ) )
10064       {
10065             return;
10066       }
10067 
10068 
10069       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
10070 
10071       for( bAttrib = 0; bAttrib < ATTRIB_MENU_CANCEL; bAttrib++ )
10072       {
10073             switch ( gbTrainingMode )
10074             {
10075                   case TRAIN_SELF:
10076                         fStatTrainable = CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, bAttrib, TRUE, FALSE );
10077                         break;
10078                   case TRAIN_TEAMMATE:
10079                         // DO allow trainers to be assigned without any partners (students)
10080                         fStatTrainable = CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, bAttrib, FALSE, TRUE );
10081                         break;
10082                   case TRAIN_BY_OTHER:
10083                         // DO allow students to be assigned without any partners (trainers)
10084                         fStatTrainable = CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, bAttrib, TRUE, FALSE );
10085                         break;
10086                   default:
10087                         Assert( FALSE );
10088                         fStatTrainable = FALSE;
10089                         break;
10090             }
10091 
10092             if ( fStatTrainable )
10093             {
10094                   // also unshade stat
10095                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghAttributeBox, bAttrib );
10096             }
10097             else
10098             {
10099                   // shade stat
10100                   ShadeStringInBox( ghAttributeBox, bAttrib );
10101             }
10102       }
10103 
10104       return;
10105 }
10106 
10107 
10108 void ResetAssignmentsForAllSoldiersInSectorWhoAreTrainingTown( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10109 {
10110       INT16 sSectorX  = 0, sSectorY = 0;
10111       INT32 iNumberOnTeam = 0, iCounter = 0;
10112       SOLDIERTYPE *pCurSoldier = NULL;
10113 
10114       iNumberOnTeam = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
10115 
10116       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOnTeam; iCounter++ )
10117       {
10118             pCurSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
10119             
10120             if( ( pCurSoldier -> bActive ) && ( pCurSoldier -> bLife >= OKLIFE ) )
10121             {
10122                   if( pCurSoldier -> bAssignment == TRAIN_TOWN )
10123                   {
10124                         if( ( pCurSoldier -> sSectorX == pSoldier -> sSectorX ) && ( pCurSoldier -> sSectorY == pSoldier -> sSectorY ) && ( pSoldier -> bSectorZ == 0 ) )
10125                         {
10126                               AddCharacterToAnySquad( pCurSoldier );
10127                         }
10128                   }
10129             }
10130       }
10131 
10132       return;
10133 }
10134 
10135 
10136 void ReportTrainersTraineesWithoutPartners( void )
10137 {
10138       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier = NULL;
10139       INT32 iCounter = 0, iNumberOnTeam = 0;
10140       BOOLEAN fFound =FALSE;
10141 
10142 
10143       iNumberOnTeam = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
10144 
10145       // check for each instructor
10146       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOnTeam; iCounter++ )
10147       {
10148             pTeamSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
10149 
10150             if( ( pTeamSoldier -> bAssignment == TRAIN_TEAMMATE ) && ( pTeamSoldier -> bLife > 0 ) )
10151             {
10152                   if ( !ValidTrainingPartnerInSameSectorOnAssignmentFound( pTeamSoldier, TRAIN_BY_OTHER, pTeamSoldier->bTrainStat ) )
10153                   {
10154                         AssignmentDone( pTeamSoldier, TRUE, TRUE );
10155                   }
10156             }
10157       }
10158 
10159       // check each trainee
10160       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOnTeam; iCounter++ )
10161       {
10162             pTeamSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
10163 
10164             if( ( pTeamSoldier -> bAssignment == TRAIN_BY_OTHER ) && ( pTeamSoldier -> bLife > 0 ) )
10165             {
10166                   if ( !ValidTrainingPartnerInSameSectorOnAssignmentFound( pTeamSoldier, TRAIN_TEAMMATE, pTeamSoldier->bTrainStat ) )
10167                   {
10168                         AssignmentDone( pTeamSoldier, TRUE, TRUE );
10169                   }
10170             }
10171       }
10172 
10173       return;
10174 }
10175 
10176 
10177 BOOLEAN SetMercAsleep( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fGiveWarning )
10178 {
10179       if( CanCharacterSleep( pSoldier, fGiveWarning ) )
10180       {
10181             // put him to sleep
10182             PutMercInAsleepState( pSoldier );
10183 
10184             // successful
10185             return( TRUE );
10186       }
10187       else
10188       {
10189             // can't sleep for some other reason
10190             return( FALSE );
10191       }
10192 }
10193 
10194 
10195 
10196 BOOLEAN PutMercInAsleepState( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10197 {
10198       if( pSoldier -> fMercAsleep == FALSE )
10199       {
10200             if( ( gfWorldLoaded ) && ( pSoldier->bInSector ) )
10201             {
10202                   if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
10203                   {
10204                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GOTO_SLEEP, 1, TRUE );
10205                   }
10206                   else
10207                   {
10208                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, SLEEPING, 1, TRUE );
10209                   }
10210             }
10211 
10212             // set merc asleep
10213             pSoldier -> fMercAsleep = TRUE;
10214 
10215             // refresh panels
10216             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
10217             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
10218       }
10219 
10220       return( TRUE );
10221 }
10222 
10223 
10224 BOOLEAN SetMercAwake( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fGiveWarning, BOOLEAN fForceHim )
10225 {
10226       // forcing him skips all normal checks!
10227       if ( !fForceHim )
10228       {
10229             if ( !CanCharacterBeAwakened( pSoldier, fGiveWarning ) )
10230             {
10231                   return( FALSE );
10232             }
10233       }
10234 
10235       PutMercInAwakeState( pSoldier );
10236       return( TRUE );
10237 }
10238 
10239 
10240 BOOLEAN PutMercInAwakeState( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10241 {
10242       if ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
10243       {
10244             if ( ( gfWorldLoaded ) && ( pSoldier->bInSector ) )
10245             {
10246                   if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
10247                   {
10248                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, WKAEUP_FROM_SLEEP, 1, TRUE );
10249                   }     
10250                   else
10251                   {
10252                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, STANDING, 1, TRUE );
10253                   }
10254             }
10255 
10256             // set merc awake
10257             pSoldier->fMercAsleep = FALSE;
10258 
10259             // refresh panels
10260             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
10261             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
10262 
10263             // determine if merc is being forced to stay awake
10264             if ( pSoldier->bBreathMax < BREATHMAX_PRETTY_TIRED )
10265             {
10266                   pSoldier->fForcedToStayAwake = TRUE;
10267             }
10268             else
10269             {
10270                   pSoldier->fForcedToStayAwake = FALSE;
10271             }
10272       }
10273 
10274       return( TRUE );
10275 }
10276 
10277 BOOLEAN IsThereASoldierInThisSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
10278 {
10279       if( fSectorsWithSoldiers[  sSectorX + sSectorY * MAP_WORLD_X ][ bSectorZ ] == TRUE )
10280       {
10281             return( TRUE );
10282       }
10283       
10284       return( FALSE );
10285 }
10286 
10287 
10288 // set the time this soldier's assignment changed
10289 void SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10290 {
10291       // if someone is being taken off of HOSPITAL then track how much
10292       // of payment wasn't used up
10293       if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL )
10294       {
10295             giHospitalRefund += CalcPatientMedicalCost( pSoldier );
10296             pSoldier->bHospitalPriceModifier = 0;
10297       }
10298 
10299       // set time of last assignment change
10300       pSoldier->uiLastAssignmentChangeMin = GetWorldTotalMin( );
10301 
10302       // assigning new PATIENTs gives a DOCTOR something to do, etc., so set flag to recheck them all.
10303       // CAN'T DO IT RIGHT AWAY IN HERE 'CAUSE WE TYPICALLY GET CALLED *BEFORE* bAssignment GETS SET TO NEW VALUE!!
10304       gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
10305 
10306       return;
10307 }
10308 
10309 // have we spent enough time on assignment for it to count?
10310 BOOLEAN EnoughTimeOnAssignment( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10311 {
10312       if( GetWorldTotalMin() - pSoldier->uiLastAssignmentChangeMin >= (UINT32)gGameExternalOptions.ubMinutesForAssignmentToCount )
10313       {
10314             return( TRUE );
10315       }
10316 
10317       return( FALSE );
10318 }
10319 
10320 
10321 BOOLEAN AnyMercInGroupCantContinueMoving( GROUP *pGroup )
10322 {
10323       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
10324       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
10325       BOOLEAN fMeToo = FALSE;
10326       BOOLEAN fGroupMustStop = FALSE;
10327 
10328 
10329       Assert( pGroup );
10330       Assert( pGroup->fPlayer );
10331 
10332       pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
10333 
10334       while( pPlayer )
10335       {
10336             // if group has player list...  and a valid first soldier
10337             if( pPlayer && pPlayer->pSoldier )
10338             {
10339                   pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
10340 
10341                   if ( PlayerSoldierTooTiredToTravel( pSoldier ) )
10342                   {
10343                         // NOTE: we only complain about it if it's gonna force the group to stop moving!
10344                         fGroupMustStop = TRUE;
10345 
10346                         // say quote
10347                         if( fMeToo == FALSE )
10348                         {
10349                               HandleImportantMercQuote( pSoldier, QUOTE_NEED_SLEEP );
10350                               fMeToo = TRUE;
10351                         }
10352                         else
10353                         {
10354                               HandleImportantMercQuote( pSoldier, QUOTE_ME_TOO );
10355                         }
10356 
10357                         // put him to bed
10358                         PutMercInAsleepState( pSoldier );
10359 
10360                         // player can't wake him up right away
10361                         pSoldier->fMercCollapsedFlag = TRUE;
10362                   }
10363             }
10364 
10365             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
10366       }
10367 
10368       return( fGroupMustStop );
10369 }
10370 
10371 
10372 
10373 BOOLEAN PlayerSoldierTooTiredToTravel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10374 {
10375       Assert( pSoldier );
10376 
10377       // if this guy ever needs sleep at all
10378       if ( CanChangeSleepStatusForSoldier( pSoldier ) )
10379       {
10380             // if walking, or only remaining possible driver for a vehicle group
10381             if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) || SoldierMustDriveVehicle( pSoldier, pSoldier->iVehicleId, TRUE ) )
10382             {
10383                   // if awake, but so tired they can't move/drive anymore
10384                   if ( ( !pSoldier->fMercAsleep ) && ( pSoldier->bBreathMax < BREATHMAX_GOTTA_STOP_MOVING ) )
10385                   {
10386                         return( TRUE );
10387                   }
10388 
10389                   // asleep, and can't be awakened?
10390                   if ( ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep ) && !CanCharacterBeAwakened( pSoldier, FALSE ) )
10391                   {
10392                         return( TRUE );
10393                   }
10394             }
10395       }
10396 
10397       return( FALSE );
10398 }
10399 
10400 
10401 
10402 BOOLEAN AssignMercToAMovementGroup( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10403 {
10404       // if merc doesn't have a group or is in a vehicle or on a squad assign to group
10405       INT8 bGroupId = 0;
10406 
10407       // on a squad?
10408       if( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
10409       {
10410             return( FALSE );
10411       }
10412 
10413       // in a vehicle?
10414       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
10415       {
10416             return( FALSE );
10417       }
10418 
10419       // in transit
10420       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
10421       {
10422             return( FALSE );
10423       }
10424 
10425       // in a movement group?
10426       if( pSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 )
10427       {
10428             return( FALSE );
10429       }
10430       
10431       // create group
10432       bGroupId = CreateNewPlayerGroupDepartingFromSector( ( UINT8 )( pSoldier->sSectorX ), ( UINT8 )( pSoldier->sSectorY ) );
10433 
10434       if( bGroupId )
10435       {
10436             // add merc
10437             AddPlayerToGroup( bGroupId, pSoldier );
10438             
10439             // success
10440             return( TRUE );
10441       }
10442 
10443       return( TRUE );
10444 }
10445 
10446 
10447 void NotifyPlayerOfAssignmentAttemptFailure( INT8 bAssignment )
10448 {
10449       // notify player
10450       if ( guiCurrentScreen != MSG_BOX_SCREEN )
10451       {
10452             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( pMapErrorString[ 18 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
10453       }
10454       else
10455       {
10456             // use screen msg instead!
10457             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMapErrorString[ 18 ] );
10458       }
10459       
10460       if ( bAssignment == TRAIN_TOWN )
10461       {
10462             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMapErrorString[ 48 ] );
10463       }
10464 }
10465 
10466 
10467 BOOLEAN HandleSelectedMercsBeingPutAsleep( BOOLEAN fWakeUp, BOOLEAN fDisplayWarning )
10468 {
10469       BOOLEAN fSuccess = TRUE;
10470       INT32 iCounter = 0;
10471       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
10472       UINT8 ubNumberOfSelectedSoldiers = 0;
10473       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
10474 
10475 
10476       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
10477       {
10478             pSoldier = NULL;
10479 
10480             // if the current character in the list is valid...then grab soldier pointer for the character
10481             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid )
10482             {
10483                   // get the soldier pointer
10484                   pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
10485 
10486                   if( pSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
10487                   {
10488                         continue;
10489                   }
10490 
10491                   if( iCounter == bSelectedInfoChar )
10492                   {
10493                         continue;
10494                   }
10495 
10496                   if( IsEntryInSelectedListSet( ( INT8 )iCounter ) == FALSE )
10497                   {
10498                         continue;
10499                   }
10500 
10501                   // don't try to put vehicles, robots, to sleep if they're also selected
10502                   if ( CanChangeSleepStatusForCharSlot( (INT8) iCounter ) == FALSE )
10503                   {
10504                         continue;
10505                   }
10506 
10507                   // up the total number of soldiers
10508                   ubNumberOfSelectedSoldiers++;
10509 
10510                   if( fWakeUp )
10511                   {
10512                         // try to wake merc up
10513                         if( SetMercAwake( pSoldier, FALSE, FALSE ) == FALSE )
10514                         {
10515                               fSuccess = FALSE;
10516                         }
10517                   }
10518                   else
10519                   {
10520                         // set this soldier asleep
10521                         if( SetMercAsleep( pSoldier, FALSE ) == FALSE )
10522                         {
10523                               fSuccess = FALSE;
10524                         }
10525                   }
10526             }
10527       }
10528 
10529       // if there was anyone processed, check for success and inform player of failure
10530       if( ubNumberOfSelectedSoldiers )
10531       {
10532             if( fSuccess == FALSE )
10533             {
10534                   if( fWakeUp )
10535                   {
10536                         // inform player not everyone could be woke up
10537                         swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 27 ] );
10538                   }
10539                   else
10540                   {
10541                         // inform player not everyone could be put to sleep
10542                         swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 26 ]);
10543                   }
10544 
10545                   if( fDisplayWarning )
10546                   {
10547                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
10548                   }
10549             }
10550       }
10551 
10552       return( fSuccess );
10553 }
10554 
10555 BOOLEAN IsAnyOneOnPlayersTeamOnThisAssignment( INT8 bAssignment )
10556 {
10557       INT32 iCounter = 0;
10558       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
10559 
10560 
10561       for( iCounter = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; iCounter <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; iCounter++ )
10562       {
10563             // get the current soldier 
10564             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
10565             
10566             // active?
10567             if( pSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
10568             {
10569                   continue;
10570             }
10571 
10572             if( pSoldier->bAssignment == bAssignment )
10573             {
10574                   return( TRUE );
10575             }
10576       }
10577 
10578       return( FALSE );
10579 }
10580 
10581 
10582 void RebuildAssignmentsBox( void )
10583 {
10584       // destroy and recreate assignments box
10585       if ( ghAssignmentBox != -1 )
10586       {
10587             RemoveBox( ghAssignmentBox );
10588             ghAssignmentBox = -1;
10589       }
10590 
10591       // WANNE 2 <ab>
10592       CreateAssignmentsBox( );
10593 }
10594 
10595 
10596 
10597 void BandageBleedingDyingPatientsBeingTreated( )
10598 {
10599       INT32 iCounter = 0;
10600       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
10601       SOLDIERTYPE *pDoctor = NULL;
10602       INT32 iKitSlot;
10603       OBJECTTYPE *pKit = NULL;
10604       UINT16 usKitPts;
10605       UINT32 uiKitPtsUsed;
10606       BOOLEAN fSomeoneStillBleedingDying = FALSE;
10607 
10608 
10609       for( iCounter = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; iCounter <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; iCounter++ )
10610       {
10611             // get the soldier
10612             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
10613 
10614             // check if the soldier is currently active?
10615             if( pSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
10616             {
10617                   continue;
10618             }
10619 
10620             // and he is bleeding or dying
10621             if( ( pSoldier->bBleeding ) || ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE ) )
10622             {
10623                   // if soldier is receiving care
10624                   if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == PATIENT ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == DOCTOR ) )
10625                   {
10626                         // if in the hospital
10627                         if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL )
10628                         {
10629                               // this is instantaneous, and doesn't use up any bandages!
10630 
10631                               // stop bleeding automatically
10632                               pSoldier->bBleeding = 0;
10633 
10634                               if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
10635                               {
10636                                     pSoldier->bLife = OKLIFE;
10637                               }
10638                         }
10639                         else  // assigned to DOCTOR/PATIENT
10640                         {
10641                               // see if there's a doctor around who can help him
10642                               pDoctor = AnyDoctorWhoCanHealThisPatient( pSoldier, HEALABLE_EVER );
10643                               if ( pDoctor != NULL )
10644                               {
10645                                     iKitSlot = FindObjClass( pDoctor, IC_MEDKIT );
10646                                     if( iKitSlot != NO_SLOT )
10647                                     {
10648                                           pKit = &( pDoctor->inv[ iKitSlot ] );
10649 
10650                                           usKitPts = TotalPoints( pKit );
10651                                           if( usKitPts )
10652                                           {
10653                                                 uiKitPtsUsed = VirtualSoldierDressWound( pDoctor, pSoldier, pKit, usKitPts, usKitPts );
10654                                                 UseKitPoints( pKit, (UINT16)uiKitPtsUsed, pDoctor );
10655 
10656                                                 // if he is STILL bleeding or dying
10657                                                 if( ( pSoldier->bBleeding ) || ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE ) )
10658                                                 {
10659                                                       fSomeoneStillBleedingDying = TRUE;
10660                                                 }
10661                                           }
10662                                     }
10663                               }
10664                         }
10665                   }
10666             }
10667       }
10668 
10669 
10670       // this event may be posted many times because of multiple assignment changes.  Handle it only once per minute!
10671       DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( EVENT_BANDAGE_BLEEDING_MERCS );
10672 
10673       if ( fSomeoneStillBleedingDying )
10674       {
10675             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_BANDAGE_BLEEDING_MERCS, GetWorldTotalMin() + 1, 0 );
10676       }
10677 }
10678 
10679 
10680 
10681 void ReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo()
10682 {
10683       INT32 iCounter = 0;
10684       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
10685       BOOLEAN fNothingToDo;
10686 
10687 
10688       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; iCounter++ )
10689       {
10690             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
10691 
10692             if( pSoldier->bActive )
10693             {
10694                   switch( pSoldier->bAssignment )
10695                   {
10696                         case DOCTOR:
10697                               fNothingToDo = !CanCharacterDoctor( pSoldier ) || ( GetNumberThatCanBeDoctored( pSoldier, HEALABLE_EVER, FALSE, FALSE ) == 0 );
10698                               break;
10699 
10700                         case PATIENT:
10701                               fNothingToDo = !CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier ) || ( AnyDoctorWhoCanHealThisPatient( pSoldier, HEALABLE_EVER ) == NULL );
10702                               break;
10703 
10704                         case ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL:
10705                               fNothingToDo = !CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier );
10706                               break;
10707 
10708                         case REPAIR:
10709                               fNothingToDo = !CanCharacterRepair( pSoldier ) || HasCharacterFinishedRepairing( pSoldier );
10710                               break;
10711 
10712                         case TRAIN_TOWN:
10713                               fNothingToDo = !CanCharacterTrainMilitia( pSoldier );
10714                               break;
10715 
10716                         case TRAIN_SELF:
10717                               fNothingToDo = !CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, pSoldier->bTrainStat, TRUE, FALSE );
10718                               break;
10719 
10720                         case TRAIN_TEAMMATE:
10721                               fNothingToDo = !CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, pSoldier->bTrainStat, FALSE, TRUE ) ||
10722                                                                          !ValidTrainingPartnerInSameSectorOnAssignmentFound( pSoldier, TRAIN_BY_OTHER, pSoldier->bTrainStat );
10723                               break;
10724 
10725                         case TRAIN_BY_OTHER:
10726                               fNothingToDo = !CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, pSoldier->bTrainStat, TRUE, FALSE ) ||
10727                                                                          !ValidTrainingPartnerInSameSectorOnAssignmentFound( pSoldier, TRAIN_TEAMMATE, pSoldier->bTrainStat );
10728                               break;
10729 
10730                         case VEHICLE:
10731                         default:    // squads
10732                               fNothingToDo = FALSE;
10733                               break;
10734                   }
10735 
10736 
10737                   // if his flag is wrong
10738                   if ( fNothingToDo != pSoldier->fDoneAssignmentAndNothingToDoFlag )
10739                   {
10740                         // update it!
10741                         pSoldier->fDoneAssignmentAndNothingToDoFlag = fNothingToDo;
10742 
10743                         // update mapscreen's character list display
10744                         fDrawCharacterList = TRUE;
10745                   }
10746 
10747                   // if he now has something to do, reset the quote flag
10748                   if ( !fNothingToDo )
10749                   {
10750                         pSoldier->usQuoteSaidExtFlags &= ~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_DONE_ASSIGNMENT;
10751                   }
10752 
10753 
10754             }
10755       }
10756 
10757       // re-evaluation completed
10758       gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = FALSE;
10759 
10760 
10761       // redraw the map, in case we're showing teams, and someone just came on duty or off duty, their icon needs updating
10762       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
10763 }
10764 
10765 
10766 
10767 void SetAssignmentForList( INT8 bAssignment, INT8 bParam )
10768 {
10769       INT32 iCounter = 0;
10770       SOLDIERTYPE *pSelectedSoldier = NULL;
10771       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
10772       BOOLEAN fItWorked;
10773       BOOLEAN fRemoveFromSquad = TRUE;
10774       BOOLEAN fNotifiedOfFailure = FALSE;
10775       INT8 bCanJoinSquad;
10776 
10777       // if not in mapscreen, there is no functionality available to change multiple assignments simultaneously!
10778       if ( !( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
10779       {
10780             return;
10781       }
10782 
10783       // pSelectedSoldier is currently used only for REPAIR, and this block of code is copied from RepairMenuBtnCallback()
10784       if( bSelectedAssignChar != -1 )
10785       {
10786             if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedAssignChar ].fValid == TRUE )
10787             {
10788                   pSelectedSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedAssignChar ].usSolID ];
10789             }
10790       }
10791 
10792       Assert( pSelectedSoldier && pSelectedSoldier->bActive );
10793 
10794 
10795       // sets assignment for the list
10796       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
10797       {
10798             if( ( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid ) &&
10799                         ( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE ) &&
10800                         ( iCounter != bSelectedAssignChar ) &&
10801                         !(Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
10802             {
10803                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
10804 
10805                   // assume it's NOT gonna work
10806                   fItWorked = FALSE;
10807 
10808                   switch( bAssignment )
10809                   {
10810                         case( DOCTOR ):
10811                               // can character doctor?
10812                               if( CanCharacterDoctor( pSoldier ) )
10813                               {
10814                                     // set as doctor
10815                                     pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
10816                                     SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, DOCTOR, 0,0,0 );
10817                                     fItWorked = TRUE;
10818                               }
10819                               break;
10820                         case( PATIENT ):
10821                               // can character patient?
10822                               if( CanCharacterPatient( pSoldier ) )
10823                               {
10824                                     // set as patient
10825                                     pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
10826                                     SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, PATIENT, 0,0,0 );           
10827                                     fItWorked = TRUE;
10828                               }
10829                               break;
10830                         case( VEHICLE ):
10831                               if( CanCharacterVehicle( pSoldier ) && IsThisVehicleAccessibleToSoldier( pSoldier, bParam ) )
10832                               {
10833 //                                  if ( IsEnoughSpaceInVehicle( bParam ) )
10834                                     {
10835                                           // if the vehicle is FULL, then this will return FALSE!
10836                                           fItWorked = PutSoldierInVehicle( pSoldier, bParam );
10837                                           // failure produces its own error popup
10838                                           fNotifiedOfFailure = TRUE;
10839                                     }
10840                               }
10841                               break;
10842                         case( REPAIR ):
10843                               if( CanCharacterRepair( pSoldier ) )
10844                               {
10845                                     BOOLEAN fCanFixSpecificTarget = TRUE;
10846 
10847                                     // make sure he can repair the SPECIFIC thing being repaired too (must be in its sector, for example)
10848 
10849 /*
10850                                     if ( pSelectedSoldier->fFixingSAMSite )
10851                                     {
10852                                           fCanFixSpecificTarget = CanSoldierRepairSAM( pSoldier, SAM_SITE_REPAIR_DIVISOR );
10853                                     }
10854                                     else
10855 */
10856                                     if ( pSelectedSoldier->bVehicleUnderRepairID != -1 )
10857                                     {
10858                                           fCanFixSpecificTarget = CanCharacterRepairVehicle( pSoldier, pSelectedSoldier->bVehicleUnderRepairID );
10859                                     }
10860                                     else if( pSoldier->fFixingRobot )
10861                                     {
10862                                           fCanFixSpecificTarget = CanCharacterRepairRobot( pSoldier );
10863                                     }
10864 
10865                                     if ( fCanFixSpecificTarget )
10866                                     {
10867                                           // set as repair
10868                                           pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
10869                                           SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, REPAIR, pSelectedSoldier->fFixingSAMSite, pSelectedSoldier->fFixingRobot, pSelectedSoldier->bVehicleUnderRepairID );
10870                                           fItWorked = TRUE;
10871                                     }
10872                               }
10873                               break;
10874                         case( TRAIN_SELF ):
10875                               if( CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, bParam , TRUE, FALSE ) )
10876                               {
10877                                     pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
10878                                     SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_SELF, bParam, 0,0 );
10879                                     fItWorked = TRUE;
10880                               }
10881                               break;
10882                         case( TRAIN_TOWN ):
10883                               if( CanCharacterTrainMilitia( pSoldier ) )
10884                               {
10885                                     pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
10886                                     SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_TOWN, 0, 0, 0 );
10887                                     fItWorked = TRUE;
10888                               }
10889                               break;
10890                         case( TRAIN_TEAMMATE ):
10891                               if( CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, bParam, FALSE, TRUE ) )
10892                               {
10893                                     pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
10894                                     SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_TEAMMATE, bParam, 0,0 );
10895                                     fItWorked = TRUE;
10896                               }
10897                               break;
10898                         case TRAIN_BY_OTHER:
10899                               if( CanCharacterTrainStat( pSoldier, bParam, TRUE, FALSE ) )
10900                               {
10901                                     pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
10902                                     SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, TRAIN_BY_OTHER, bParam, 0,0 );
10903                                     fItWorked = TRUE;
10904                               }
10905                               break;
10906 
10907                         case( SQUAD_1 ):
10908                         case( SQUAD_2 ):
10909                         case( SQUAD_3 ):
10910                         case( SQUAD_4 ):
10911                         case( SQUAD_5 ):
10912                         case( SQUAD_6 ):
10913                         case( SQUAD_7 ):
10914                         case( SQUAD_8 ):
10915                         case( SQUAD_9 ):
10916                         case( SQUAD_10 ):
10917                         case( SQUAD_11 ):
10918                         case( SQUAD_12 ):
10919                         case( SQUAD_13 ):
10920                         case( SQUAD_14 ):
10921                         case( SQUAD_15 ):
10922                         case( SQUAD_16 ):
10923                         case( SQUAD_17 ):
10924                         case( SQUAD_18 ):
10925                         case( SQUAD_19 ):
10926                         case( SQUAD_20 ):
10927                               bCanJoinSquad = CanCharacterSquad( pSoldier, ( INT8 )bAssignment );
10928 
10929                               // if already in it, don't repor that as an error...
10930                               if ( ( bCanJoinSquad == CHARACTER_CAN_JOIN_SQUAD ) ||
10931                                            ( bCanJoinSquad == CHARACTER_CANT_JOIN_SQUAD_ALREADY_IN_IT ) )
10932                               {
10933                                     if ( bCanJoinSquad == CHARACTER_CAN_JOIN_SQUAD )
10934                                     {
10935                                           pSoldier->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
10936 
10937                                           // is the squad between sectors
10938                                           if( Squad[ bAssignment ][ 0 ] )
10939                                           {
10940                                                 if( Squad[ bAssignment ][ 0 ]->fBetweenSectors )
10941                                                 {
10942                                                       // between sectors, remove from old mvt group
10943                                                       if ( pSoldier->bOldAssignment >= ON_DUTY )
10944                                                       {
10945                                                             // remove from group
10946                                                             // the guy wasn't in a sqaud, but moving through a sector?
10947                                                             if ( pSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 )
10948                                                             {
10949                                                                   // now remove from mvt group
10950                                                                   RemovePlayerFromGroup( pSoldier->ubGroupID, pSoldier );
10951                                                             }
10952                                                       }
10953                                                 }
10954                                           }
10955 
10956                                           if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
10957                                           {
10958                                                 TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
10959                                           }
10960                                           // remove from current squad, if any
10961                                           RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
10962 
10963                                           // able to add, do it
10964                                           AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, bAssignment );         
10965                                     }
10966 
10967                                     fItWorked = TRUE;
10968                                     fRemoveFromSquad = FALSE;     // already done, would screw it up!
10969                               }
10970                               break;
10971 
10972                         default:
10973                               // remove from current vehicle/squad, if any
10974                               if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
10975                               {
10976                                     TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
10977                               }
10978                               RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
10979 
10980                               AddCharacterToAnySquad( pSoldier );
10981 
10982                               fItWorked = TRUE;
10983                               fRemoveFromSquad = FALSE;     // already done, would screw it up!
10984                               break;
10985                   }
10986 
10987                   if ( fItWorked )
10988                   {
10989                         if ( fRemoveFromSquad )
10990                         {
10991                               // remove him from his old squad if he was on one
10992                               RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
10993                         }
10994 
10995                         MakeSoldiersTacticalAnimationReflectAssignment( pSoldier );
10996                   }
10997                   else
10998                   {
10999                         // didn't work - report it once
11000                         if( !fNotifiedOfFailure )
11001                         {
11002                               fNotifiedOfFailure = TRUE;
11003                               NotifyPlayerOfAssignmentAttemptFailure( bAssignment );
11004                         }
11005                   }
11006             }
11007       }
11008       // reset list
11009 //    ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( );
11010 
11011 
11012       // check if we should start/stop flashing any mercs' assignment strings after these changes
11013       gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
11014 
11015       return;
11016 }
11017 
11018 
11019 BOOLEAN IsCharacterAliveAndConscious( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
11020 {
11021       // is the character alive and conscious?
11022       if( pCharacter -> bLife < CONSCIOUSNESS )
11023       {
11024             return( FALSE );
11025       }
11026 
11027       return ( TRUE );
11028 }
11029 
11030 
11031 
11032 BOOLEAN ValidTrainingPartnerInSameSectorOnAssignmentFound( SOLDIERTYPE *pTargetSoldier, INT8 bTargetAssignment, INT8 bTargetStat )
11033 {
11034       INT32 iCounter = 0;
11035       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11036       BOOLEAN fFound = FALSE;
11037       INT16 sTrainingPts = 0;
11038       BOOLEAN fAtGunRange = FALSE;
11039       UINT16 usMaxPts;
11040 
11041 
11042       // this function only makes sense for training teammates or by others, not for self training which doesn't require partners
11043       Assert( ( bTargetAssignment == TRAIN_TEAMMATE ) || ( bTargetAssignment == TRAIN_BY_OTHER ) );
11044 
11045       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; iCounter++ )
11046       {
11047             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
11048 
11049             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
11050             {
11051                   // if the guy is not the target, has the assignment we want, is training the same stat, and is in our sector, alive
11052                   // and is training the stat we want
11053                   if( ( pSoldier != pTargetSoldier ) &&
11054                               ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == bTargetAssignment ) &&
11055                               // CJC: this seems incorrect in light of the check for bTargetStat and in any case would
11056                               // cause a problem if the trainer was assigned and we weren't!
11057                               //( pSoldier -> bTrainStat == pTargetSoldier -> bTrainStat ) &&
11058                               ( pSoldier -> sSectorX == pTargetSoldier -> sSectorX ) &&
11059                               ( pSoldier -> sSectorY == pTargetSoldier -> sSectorY ) &&
11060                               ( pSoldier -> bSectorZ == pTargetSoldier -> bSectorZ ) &&
11061                               ( pSoldier -> bTrainStat == bTargetStat ) &&
11062                               ( pSoldier -> bLife > 0 ) )
11063                   {
11064                         // so far so good, now let's see if the trainer can really teach the student anything new
11065 
11066                         // are we training in the sector with gun range in Alma?
11067                         if ( ( pSoldier -> sSectorX == GUN_RANGE_X ) && (pSoldier -> sSectorY == GUN_RANGE_Y ) && ( pSoldier -> bSectorZ == GUN_RANGE_Z ) )
11068                         {
11069                               fAtGunRange = TRUE;
11070                         }
11071 
11072                         if ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == TRAIN_TEAMMATE )
11073                         {
11074                               // pSoldier is the instructor, target is the student
11075                               sTrainingPts = GetBonusTrainingPtsDueToInstructor( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier, bTargetStat, fAtGunRange, &usMaxPts );
11076                         }
11077                         else
11078                         {
11079                               // target is the instructor, pSoldier is the student
11080                               sTrainingPts = GetBonusTrainingPtsDueToInstructor( pTargetSoldier, pSoldier, bTargetStat, fAtGunRange, &usMaxPts );
11081                         }
11082 
11083                         if ( sTrainingPts > 0 )
11084                         {
11085                               // yes, then he makes a valid training partner for us!
11086                               return( TRUE );
11087                         }
11088                   }
11089             }
11090       }
11091 
11092       // no one found
11093       return( FALSE );
11094 }
11095 
11096 void UnEscortEPC( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11097 {
11098   if ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
11099   {
11100         BOOLEAN fGotInfo;
11101         UINT16 usQuoteNum;
11102         UINT16 usFactToSetToTrue;
11103 
11104         SetupProfileInsertionDataForSoldier( pSoldier );
11105 
11106         fGotInfo = GetInfoForAbandoningEPC( pSoldier->ubProfile, &usQuoteNum, &usFactToSetToTrue );
11107         if ( fGotInfo )
11108         {
11109               // say quote usQuoteNum
11110               gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_FORCENPCQUOTE;
11111               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, usQuoteNum );
11112                   // the flag will be turned off in the remove-epc event
11113               //gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags &= ~PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_FORCENPCQUOTE; 
11114               SetFactTrue( usFactToSetToTrue );
11115         }
11116         SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_REMOVE_EPC, pSoldier->ubProfile, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
11117 
11118         HandleFactForNPCUnescorted( pSoldier->ubProfile );                                
11119 
11120         if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == JOHN )
11121         {
11122               SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier2;
11123 
11124               // unrecruit Mary as well
11125               pSoldier2 = FindSoldierByProfileID( MARY, TRUE );
11126               if ( pSoldier2 )
11127               {
11128                     SetupProfileInsertionDataForSoldier( pSoldier2 );
11129                         fGotInfo = GetInfoForAbandoningEPC( MARY, &usQuoteNum, &usFactToSetToTrue );
11130                         if ( fGotInfo )
11131                         {
11132                               // say quote usQuoteNum
11133                               gMercProfiles[ MARY ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_FORCENPCQUOTE;
11134                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier2, usQuoteNum );
11135                               // the flag will be turned off in the remove-epc event
11136                               //gMercProfiles[ MARY ].ubMiscFlags &= ~PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_FORCENPCQUOTE;                                          
11137                               SetFactTrue( usFactToSetToTrue );
11138                         }
11139 
11140                     SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_REMOVE_EPC, MARY, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
11141               }
11142         }
11143         else if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == MARY )
11144         {
11145               SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier2;
11146 
11147               // unrecruit John as well
11148               pSoldier2 = FindSoldierByProfileID( JOHN, TRUE );                           
11149               if ( pSoldier2 )
11150               {
11151                     SetupProfileInsertionDataForSoldier( pSoldier2 );
11152                         fGotInfo = GetInfoForAbandoningEPC( JOHN, &usQuoteNum, &usFactToSetToTrue );
11153                         if ( fGotInfo )
11154                         {
11155                               // say quote usQuoteNum
11156                               gMercProfiles[ JOHN ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_FORCENPCQUOTE;
11157                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier2, usQuoteNum );
11158                               // the flag will be turned off in the remove-epc event
11159                               //gMercProfiles[ JOHN ].ubMiscFlags &= ~PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_FORCENPCQUOTE;                                          
11160                               SetFactTrue( usFactToSetToTrue );
11161                         }
11162                     SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_REMOVE_EPC, JOHN, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
11163               }
11164         }
11165         // stop showing menu
11166         giAssignHighLine = -1;
11167 
11168         // set dirty flag
11169         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11170         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
11171         fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
11172   }
11173   else
11174   {
11175         // how do we handle this if it's the right sector?
11176         TriggerNPCWithGivenApproach( pSoldier->ubProfile, APPROACH_EPC_IN_WRONG_SECTOR, TRUE );
11177   }               
11178 }
11179 
11180 
11181 BOOLEAN CharacterIsTakingItEasy( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11182 {
11183       // actually asleep?
11184       if ( pSoldier -> fMercAsleep == TRUE )
11185       {
11186             return( TRUE );
11187       }
11188 
11189       // if able to sleep
11190       if ( CanCharacterSleep( pSoldier, FALSE ) )
11191       {
11192             // on duty, but able to catch naps (either not traveling, or not the driver of the vehicle)
11193             // The actual checks for this are in the "can he sleep" check above
11194             if ( ( pSoldier -> bAssignment < ON_DUTY ) || ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == VEHICLE ) )
11195             {
11196                   return( TRUE );
11197             }
11198 
11199             // and healing up?
11200             if ( ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == PATIENT ) || ( pSoldier -> bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL ) )
11201             {
11202                   return( TRUE );
11203             }
11204 
11205             // on a real assignment, but done with it?
11206             if ( pSoldier -> fDoneAssignmentAndNothingToDoFlag )
11207             {
11208                   return( TRUE );
11209             }
11210       }
11211 
11212 
11213       // on assignment, or walking/driving & unable to sleep
11214       return( FALSE );
11215 }
11216 
11217 
11218 
11219 UINT8 CalcSoldierNeedForSleep( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11220 {
11221       UINT8 ubNeedForSleep;
11222       UINT8 ubPercentHealth;
11223 
11224 
11225       // base comes from profile
11226       ubNeedForSleep = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier -> ubProfile ].ubNeedForSleep;
11227 
11228 
11229       ubPercentHealth = pSoldier->bLife / pSoldier->bLifeMax;
11230 
11231       if ( ubPercentHealth < 75 )
11232       {
11233             ubNeedForSleep++;
11234 
11235             if ( ubPercentHealth < 50 )
11236             {
11237                   ubNeedForSleep++;
11238 
11239                   if ( ubPercentHealth < 25 )
11240                   {
11241                         ubNeedForSleep += 2;
11242                   }
11243             }
11244       }
11245 
11246       // reduce for each Night Ops or Martial Arts trait
11247       ubNeedForSleep -= NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, NIGHTOPS );
11248       ubNeedForSleep -= NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, MARTIALARTS );
11249 
11250       if ( ubNeedForSleep < 4 )
11251       {
11252             ubNeedForSleep = 4;
11253       }
11254 
11255       if ( ubNeedForSleep > 12 )
11256       {
11257             ubNeedForSleep = 12;
11258       }
11259 
11260       return( ubNeedForSleep );
11261 }
11262 
11263 
11264 
11265 UINT32 GetLastSquadListedInSquadMenu( void )
11266 {
11267       UINT32 uiMaxSquad;
11268 
11269       uiMaxSquad = GetLastSquadActive( ) + 1;
11270 
11271       if ( uiMaxSquad >= NUMBER_OF_SQUADS )
11272       {
11273             uiMaxSquad = NUMBER_OF_SQUADS - 1;
11274       }
11275 
11276       return( uiMaxSquad );
11277 }
11278 
11279 
11280 
11281 BOOLEAN CanCharacterRepairAnotherSoldiersStuff( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pOtherSoldier )
11282 {
11283       if ( pOtherSoldier == pSoldier )
11284       {
11285             return( FALSE );
11286       }
11287       if ( !pOtherSoldier->bActive )
11288       {
11289             return( FALSE );
11290       }
11291       if ( pOtherSoldier->bLife == 0 )
11292       {
11293             return( FALSE );
11294       }
11295       if ( pOtherSoldier->sSectorX != pSoldier->sSectorX ||
11296                    pOtherSoldier->sSectorY != pSoldier->sSectorY ||
11297                    pOtherSoldier->bSectorZ != pSoldier->bSectorZ )
11298       {
11299             return( FALSE );
11300       }
11301 
11302       if ( pOtherSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
11303       {
11304             return( FALSE );
11305       }
11306 
11307       if ( ( pOtherSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) ||
11308                    ( pOtherSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) ||
11309                    ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ||
11310                    ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) ) ||
11311                    ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC ) ||
11312                    ( pOtherSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) )
11313       {
11314             return( FALSE );
11315       }
11316 
11317       return( TRUE );
11318 }
11319 
11320 
11321 
11322 SOLDIERTYPE *GetSelectedAssignSoldier( BOOLEAN fNullOK )
11323 {
11324       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11325 
11326       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
11327       {
11328             // mapscreen version
11329             if( ( bSelectedAssignChar >= 0 ) && ( bSelectedAssignChar < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) &&
11330                         ( gCharactersList[ bSelectedAssignChar ].fValid ) )
11331             {
11332                   pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedAssignChar ].usSolID ];
11333             }
11334       }
11335       else
11336       {
11337             // tactical version
11338             pSoldier = &Menptr[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
11339       }
11340 
11341       if ( !fNullOK )
11342       {
11343             Assert( pSoldier );
11344       }
11345 
11346       if ( pSoldier != NULL )
11347       {
11348             // better be an active person, not a vehicle
11349             Assert( pSoldier->bActive );
11350             Assert( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) );
11351       }
11352 
11353       return( pSoldier );
11354 }
11355 
11356 
11357 
11358 void ResumeOldAssignment( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11359 {
11360       BOOLEAN fOldAssignmentInvalid = FALSE;
11361 
11362 
11363       // ARM: I don't think the whole "old assignment" idea is a very good one, and I doubt the code that maintains that
11364       // variable is very foolproof, plus what meaning does the old assignemnt have later, anyway?
11365       // so I'd rather just settle for putting him into any squad:
11366       fOldAssignmentInvalid = TRUE;
11367 
11368 /*
11369       if ( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == pSoldier->bAssigment )
11370       {
11371             // no good: we rely on this to make sure guys training militia STOP training militia!
11372             fOldAssignmentInvalid = TRUE;
11373       }
11374       else if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment == VEHICLE )
11375       {
11376             SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, ( INT8 )( pSoldier->bOldAssignment ), ( pSoldier->iVehicleId ), 0, 0 );
11377 
11378             // it might not work - check
11379             if ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE )
11380             {
11381                   fOldAssignmentInvalid = TRUE;
11382             }
11383       }
11384       else if( pSoldier->bOldAssignment < ON_DUTY )
11385       {
11386             if( AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, pSoldier->bOldAssignment ) == FALSE )
11387             {
11388                   fOldAssignmentInvalid = TRUE;
11389             }
11390       }
11391       else
11392       {
11393             fOldAssignmentInvalid = TRUE;
11394       }
11395 */
11396 
11397       if ( fOldAssignmentInvalid )
11398       {
11399             AddCharacterToAnySquad( pSoldier );
11400       }
11401 
11402 
11403       // make sure the player has time to OK this before proceeding
11404       StopTimeCompression();
11405 
11406       // assignment has changed, redraw left side as well as the map (to update on/off duty icons)
11407       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11408       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
11409       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
11410 }
11411 
11412 
11413 
11414 void RepairItemsOnOthers( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 *pubRepairPtsLeft )
11415 {
11416       UINT8 ubPassType;
11417       INT8 bLoop;
11418       INT8 bPocket;
11419       SOLDIERTYPE * pOtherSoldier;
11420       SOLDIERTYPE * pBestOtherSoldier;
11421       INT8 bPriority, bBestPriority = -1;
11422       BOOLEAN fSomethingWasRepairedThisPass;
11423 
11424 
11425       // repair everyone's hands and armor slots first, then headgear, and pockets last
11426       for ( ubPassType = REPAIR_HANDS_AND_ARMOR; ubPassType <= FINAL_REPAIR_PASS; ubPassType++ )
11427       {
11428             fSomethingWasRepairedThisPass = FALSE;
11429 
11430 
11431             // look for jammed guns on other soldiers in sector and unjam them
11432             for( bLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; bLoop < gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; bLoop++ )
11433             {
11434                   pOtherSoldier = MercPtrs[ bLoop ];
11435 
11436                   // check character is valid, alive, same sector, not between, has inventory, etc.
11437                   if ( CanCharacterRepairAnotherSoldiersStuff( pSoldier, pOtherSoldier ) )
11438                   {
11439                         if ( UnjamGunsOnSoldier( pOtherSoldier, pSoldier, pubRepairPtsLeft ) )
11440                         {
11441                               fSomethingWasRepairedThisPass = TRUE;
11442                         }
11443                   }
11444             }
11445 
11446 
11447             while ( *pubRepairPtsLeft > 0 )
11448             {
11449                   bBestPriority = -1;
11450                   pBestOtherSoldier = NULL;
11451 
11452                   // now look for items to repair on other mercs
11453                   for( bLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; bLoop < gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; bLoop++ )
11454                   {
11455                         pOtherSoldier = MercPtrs[ bLoop ];
11456 
11457                         // check character is valid, alive, same sector, not between, has inventory, etc.
11458                         if ( CanCharacterRepairAnotherSoldiersStuff( pSoldier, pOtherSoldier ) )
11459                         {
11460                               // okay, seems like a candidate!
11461                               if ( FindRepairableItemOnOtherSoldier( pOtherSoldier, ubPassType ) != NO_SLOT )
11462                               {
11463                                     bPriority = pOtherSoldier->bExpLevel;
11464                                     if ( bPriority > bBestPriority )
11465                                     {
11466                                           bBestPriority = bPriority;
11467                                           pBestOtherSoldier = pOtherSoldier;
11468                                     }
11469                               }
11470                         }
11471                   }
11472 
11473                   // did we find anyone to repair on this pass?
11474                   if ( pBestOtherSoldier != NULL )
11475                   {
11476                         // yes, repair all items (for this pass type!) on this soldier that need repair
11477                         do
11478                         {
11479                               bPocket = FindRepairableItemOnOtherSoldier( pBestOtherSoldier, ubPassType );
11480                               if ( bPocket != NO_SLOT )
11481                               {
11482                                     if ( RepairObject( pSoldier, pBestOtherSoldier, &(pBestOtherSoldier->inv[ bPocket ]), pubRepairPtsLeft ) )
11483                                     {
11484                                           fSomethingWasRepairedThisPass = TRUE;
11485                                     }
11486                               }
11487                         }
11488                         while ( bPocket != NO_SLOT && *pubRepairPtsLeft > 0 );
11489                   }
11490                   else
11491                   {
11492                         break;
11493                   }
11494             }
11495 
11496             if ( fSomethingWasRepairedThisPass && !DoesCharacterHaveAnyItemsToRepair( pSoldier, ubPassType ) )
11497             {
11498                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, sRepairsDoneString[ 1 + ubPassType ], pSoldier->name );
11499 
11500                   // let player react
11501                   StopTimeCompression();
11502             }
11503       }
11504 }
11505 
11506 
11507 
11508 BOOLEAN UnjamGunsOnSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pOwnerSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pRepairSoldier, UINT8 *pubRepairPtsLeft )
11509 {
11510       BOOLEAN fAnyGunsWereUnjammed = FALSE;
11511       INT8  bPocket;
11512 
11513 
11514       // try to unjam everything before beginning any actual repairs.. successful unjamming costs 2 points per weapon
11515       for (bPocket = HANDPOS; bPocket <= SMALLPOCK8POS; bPocket++)
11516       {
11517             // the object a weapon? and jammed?
11518             if ( ( Item[ pOwnerSoldier->inv[ bPocket ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN ) && ( pOwnerSoldier->inv[ bPocket ].bGunAmmoStatus < 0 ) )
11519             {
11520                   if ( *pubRepairPtsLeft >= gGameExternalOptions.ubRepairCostPerJam )
11521                   {
11522                         *pubRepairPtsLeft -= gGameExternalOptions.ubRepairCostPerJam;
11523 
11524                         pOwnerSoldier->inv [ bPocket ].bGunAmmoStatus *= -1;
11525 
11526                         // MECHANICAL/DEXTERITY GAIN: Unjammed a gun
11527                         StatChange( pRepairSoldier, MECHANAMT, 5, FALSE );
11528                         StatChange( pRepairSoldier, DEXTAMT, 5, FALSE );
11529 
11530                         // report it as unjammed
11531                         if ( pRepairSoldier == pOwnerSoldier )
11532                         {
11533                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 53 ], pRepairSoldier->name, ItemNames[ pOwnerSoldier->inv[ bPocket ].usItem ] );
11534                         }
11535                         else
11536                         {
11537                               // NOTE: may need to be changed for localized versions
11538                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 54 ], pRepairSoldier->name, pOwnerSoldier->name, ItemNames[ pOwnerSoldier->inv[ bPocket ].usItem ] );
11539                         }
11540 
11541                         fAnyGunsWereUnjammed = TRUE;
11542                   }
11543                   else
11544                   {
11545                         // out of points, we're done for now
11546                         break;
11547                   }
11548             }
11549       }
11550 
11551       return ( fAnyGunsWereUnjammed );
11552 }
11553
